atk-s0519a0:20_0: Tena yā bhāsitā netti, satthārā anumoditā;
atk-s0519a0:34_2: Yathā hi taṇhā satte kāmādibhavaṃ nayatīti “bhavanettī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:34_3: evamayampi veneyyasatte ariyadhammaṃ nayatīti saddhammanayanaṭṭhena “nettī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:34_5: Nettippakaraṇena hi karaṇabhūtena dhammakathikā veneyyasatte dassanamaggaṃ nayanti sampāpentīti,
atk-s0519a0:34_6: nīyanti vā ettha etasmiṃ pakaraṇe adhiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāpetvā veneyyā nibbānaṃ sampāpiyantīti netti.
atk-s0519a0:34_7: Na hi nettiupadesasannissayena vinā aviparītasuttatthāvabodho sambhavati.
atk-s0519a0:35_0: Sā panāyaṃ netti pakaraṇaparicchedato tippabhedā hāranayapaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena.
atk-s0519a0:35_5: Sabbāpi hi netti saṅgahavāro vibhāgavāroti vāradvayameva hoti.
atk-s0519a0:36_0: Tattha saṅgahavāro ādito pañcahi gāthāhi paricchinno.
atk-s0519a0:36_1: Sabbo hi pakaraṇattho “yaṃ loko pūjayate”tiādīhi pañcahi gāthāhi apariggahito nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a0:36_7: Mūlapadapaṭṭhānāni hi atthanayasaṅkhārattikā viya aññamaññaṃ saṅgahitāni.
atk-s0519a0:37_1: Tesu “tattha katame soḷasa hārā”ti ārabhitvā yāva “bhavanti aṭṭhārasa padānī”ti ayaṃ uddesavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_2: “Assādādīnavatā”ti ārabhitvā yāva “tettiṃsā ettikā nettī”ti ayaṃ niddesavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_3: Paṭiniddesavāro pana hāravibhaṅgavāro hārasampātavāro nayasamuṭṭhānavāro sāsanapaṭṭhānavāroti catubbidho.
atk-s0519a0:37_4: Tesu “tattha katamo desanāhāro”ti ārabhitvā yāva “ayaṃ pahānena samāropanā”ti ayaṃ hāravibhaṅgavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_5: Tattha “katamo desanāhārasampāto”ti ārabhitvā yāva “anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti ayaṃ hārasampātavāro. Etthāha –
atk-s0519a0:37_7: yattha anekehipi udāharaṇasuttehi eko hāro niddisīyati,
atk-s0519a0:37_9: Yattha pana ekasmiṃ sutte aneke hārā sampatanti,
atk-s0519a0:38_0: “Yattha ca sabbe hārā, sampatamānā nayanti suttatthaṃ;
atk-s0519a0:40_1: Sāsanapaṭṭhānavāro pana saṅgahavāre viya uddesaniddesavāresupi na sarūpato uddhaṭoti. Etthāha –
atk-s0519a0:40_5: Na hi pāḷito aññaṃ pamāṇataraṃ atthi.
atk-s0519a0:40_6: Yā hi catūhi mahāpadesehi aviruddhā pāḷi,
atk-s0519a0:40_8: Tathā hi agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya peṭakopadeso viya idaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ ābhataṃ.
atk-s0519a0:40_9: Yadi evaṃ kasmāssa nidānaṃ na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:40_14: Sāvakabhāsitānaṃ buddhabhāsitānampi hi ekaccānaṃ paṭisambhidāmagganiddesādīnaṃ dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādīnañca nidānaṃ na bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:41_0: Nidānañca nāma suttavinayānaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaupālittherādīhi mahāsāvakeheva bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:41_2: theraṃ muñcitvā anaññavisayattā imissā vicāraṇāyāti kimetena nidānagavesanena,
atk-s0519a0:41_5: Atha vā pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato na imassa pakaraṇassa visuṃ nidānavacanakiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0519a0:42_0: Idāni etasmiṃ pakaraṇe nānappakārakosallatthaṃ ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo –
atk-s0519a0:43_0: Tividhaṃ puggalattayaniddesato tividhakalyāṇavibhāgato pariññattayakathanato pahānattayūpadesato sikkhattayasaṅgahaṇato
atk-s0519a0:44_1: Pañcavidhaṃ abhiññeyyādidhammavibhāgato pañcakkhandhaniddesato pañcagatiparicchedato pañcanikāyatthavivaraṇato ca.
atk-s0519a0:45_0: Tattha sāsanapariyeṭṭhibhāvatoti sakalaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahassa navaṅgassa satthusāsanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato.
atk-s0519a0:45_3: Byañjanatthavicārabhāvatoti hārabyañjanapadakammanayānaṃ byañjanavicārattā atthapadaatthanayānaṃ atthavicārattā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:45_6: Lakkhaṇalakkhiyabhāvatoti nettivacanassa lakkhaṇattā udāharaṇasuttānañca lakkhiyattā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:45_10: Sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇadhammavibhāgatoti pahānekaṭṭhasahajekaṭṭhatādisāmaññena ye dhammā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ nāmavatthādinā
atk-s0519a0:46_9: vasena cuddasavidhassa suttādhiṭṭhānassa vibhāgavacanato cuddasavidhanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:48_0: Evaṃ anekabhedavibhatte nettippakaraṇe yadidaṃ vuttaṃ “saṅgahavibhāgavāravasena duvidha”nti,
atk-s0519a0:48_2: Tassāpi “yaṃ loko pūjayate”ti ayaṃ gāthā ādi.
atk-s0519a0:49_0: Tattha lokiyanti ettha puññāpuññāni tabbipāko cāti loko, pajā,
atk-s0519a0:49_2: saddo hi jātisaddatāya sāmaññavasena niravasesato satte saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a0:49_4: pūjanakiriyāyogyabhūtatāvasena pana sattalokavacano eva idha gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:50_5: Atha vā issariyādhipaccena taṃtaṃsattalokassa pālanato rakkhaṇato khattiyacatumahārājasakkasuyāmasantusitasunimmitaparanimmitavasavattimahābrahmādayo lokapālā.
atk-s0519a0:50_6: Tehi saha taṃtaṃsattanikāyo salokapālo lokoti vutto.
atk-s0519a0:50_9: sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālentī”ti vacanato hirottappadhammā lokapālā.
atk-s0519a0:50_11: Hirottappasampannā hi pāpagarahino sappurisā dhammacchandavantatāya bhagavati pūjānamakkāraparā hontīti.
atk-s0519a0:51_1: sadāti vā bhagavato dharamānakāle tato parañca.
atk-s0519a0:51_2: Atha vā sadāti abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva sāsanantaradhānā,
atk-s0519a0:51_4: Mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya hi mahābodhisattā bodhiyā niyatatāya buddhaṅkurabhūtā sadevakassa lokassa pūjanīyā ceva vandanīyā ca honti.
atk-s0519a0:55_0: Devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamu”nti. ;
atk-s0519a0:56_0: Namassati cāti keci kesañci pūjāsakkārādīni karontāpi tesaṃ apākaṭaguṇatāya namakkāraṃ na karonti,
atk-s0519a0:56_2: yathābhūtaabbhuggatakittisaddatāya pana bhagavantaṃ sadevako loko pūjayati ceva namassati cāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:56_5: Tassāti yaṃ sadevako loko pūjayati ceva namassati ca, tassa.
atk-s0519a0:56_6: Etanti idāni vattabbaṃ buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānaṃ sāmaññena dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:56_8: Tattha diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ satte sāsati vineti etenāti sāsanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:56_9: tadeva ekantaniyyānaṭṭhena anaññasādhāraṇaguṇatāya ca uttamaṭṭhena taṃtaṃabhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya paṇḍitehi varitabbato vā varaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:56_11: Vidūhīti yathāsabhāvato kammakammaphalāni kusalādibhede ca dhamme vidantīti vidū,
atk-s0519a0:57_1: yo anaññasādhāraṇamahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiguṇavisesayogena sadevakena lokena pūjanīyo namassanīyo ca bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0519a0:57_2: tassa loke uttamapuggalassa etaṃ idāni amhehi vibhajitabbahāranayapaṭṭhānavicāraṇavisayabhūtaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0519a0:57_3: ādikalyāṇatādiguṇasampattiyā varaṃ aggaṃ uttamaṃ nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya paṇḍitavedanīyamevāti.
atk-s0519a0:57_10: Atha vā bhagavato sāsanaṃ pariññākkamena lakkhaṇāvabodhappaṭipattiyā suññatamukhādīhi ogāhitabbattā aviññūnaṃ supinantenapi na visayo hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:58_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yaṃ sāsanavaraṃ salokapālo loko pūjayati namassati ca,
atk-s0519a0:58_12: saddāpekkhatāya sāmibhāvena sambandhīvisesabhūto padhānabhūto viya paṭiniddesaṃ arahatīti.
atk-s0519a0:59_0: Kathaṃ pana sayaṃ dhammassāmī bhagavā dhammaṃ pūjayatīti?
atk-s0519a0:59_6: tameva dhammaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyya”nti.
atk-s0519a0:60_0: Api ca bhagavato dhammapūjanā sattasattāhappaṭipattiādīhi dīpetabbā.
atk-s0519a0:60_1: Dhammassāmīti ca dhammena sadevakassa lokassa sāmīti attho,
atk-s0519a0:60_6: Na hi namassatīti padassa namakkāraṃ karotīti ayameva attho,
atk-s0519a0:60_7: atha kho garukaraṇena tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāroti ayampi attho labbhati.
atk-s0519a0:60_8: Bhagavā ca dhammagarutāya sabbakālaṃ dhammaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena viharatīti.
atk-s0519a0:60_9: Ayañca attho “yena sudaṃ svāhaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti evamādīhi suttapadehi dīpetabbo.
atk-s0519a0:60_11: tassa paṇḍitehi saparasantānesu netabbaṃ pāpetabbanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:61_0: Evaṃ bhagavato sadevakassa lokassa pūjanīyavandanīyabhāvo aggapuggalabhāvo ca vuccamāno guṇavisiṭṭhataṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0519a0:61_4: Na hi savāsananiravasesakilesappahānaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇañca vinā tādisī dhammadesanā sambhavati.
atk-s0519a0:61_7: Etādisī ca guṇavibhūti mahākaruṇāpubbaṅgamaṃ abhinīhārasampattiṃ purassaraṃ katvā sampāditaṃ samattiṃsapāramisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a0:61_8: puññañāṇasambhāramantarena na upalabbhatīti hetusampadāpi atthato vibhāvitā hotīti evaṃ bhagavato tīsupi
atk-s0519a0:61_9: avatthāsu sabbasattānaṃ ekantahitappaṭilābhahetubhūtā ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā niravasesā buddhaguṇā
atk-s0519a0:62_0: Dutiyanaye pana yasmā sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ saphalaṃ ariyamaggasāsanaṃ tassa ārammaṇabhūtañca amatadhātuṃ
atk-s0519a0:62_1: tadadhigamūpāyañca pubbabhāgapaṭipattisāsanaṃ tadatthaparidīpanañca pariyattisāsanaṃ yathārahaṃ saccābhisamayavasena
atk-s0519a0:62_2: abhisamento svākkhātatādiguṇavisesayuttataṃ manasikaronto sakkaccaṃ savanadhāraṇaparipucchādīhi paricayaṃ
atk-s0519a0:62_3: karonto ca sadevako loko pūjayati nāma.
atk-s0519a0:62_4: Lokanātho ca sammāsambodhippattiyā veneyyānaṃ sakkaccaṃ dhammadesanena “ariyaṃ vo,
atk-s0519a0:62_17: desessāmi ādikalyāṇa”ntiādīhi vacanehi thomanena ca pūjayati nāma.
atk-s0519a0:62_18: Tasmā sāsanavarassa pūjanīyabhāvo idha vuccamāno anavasesato dhammaguṇe dīpetīti ye ariyabhāvādayo niyyānādayo
atk-s0519a0:62_19: khayavirāgādayo madanimmadanādayo asaṅkhatādayo svākkhātatādayo ādikalyāṇatādayo ca anekehi suttapadehi
atk-s0519a0:62_21: te niravasesato imāya gāthāya pakāsitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a0:63_0: Yasmā pana ariyasaccappaṭivedhena samugghāṭitasammohāyeva paramatthato paṇḍitā bālyādisamatikkamanato,
atk-s0519a0:63_1: tasmā bhāvitalokuttaramaggā sacchikatasāmaññaphalā ca ariyapuggalā visesato vidūti vuccanti.
atk-s0519a0:63_2: Te hi yathāvuttasāsanavaraṃ aviparītato ñātuṃ netuñca saparasantāne sakkuṇantīti aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūhassa
atk-s0519a0:63_3: paramatthasaṅghassāpi idha gahitattā ye suppaṭipannatādayo anekehi suttapadehi saṃvaṇṇitā ariyasaṅghaguṇā,
atk-s0519a0:64_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya sātisayaṃ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanaṃ katvā idāni –
atk-s0519a0:67_1: taṃ pana sikkhattayaṃ ñāṇavisesavisayabhāvabhedato avatthābhedato ca tividhaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0519a0:67_3: Cintāmayañāṇagocaro ca yo ākāraparivitakkadiṭṭhinijjhānakkhantīhi gahetabbākāro vimuttāyatanaviseso “paṭipattisaddhammo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:67_5: Evaṃ tividhampi sāsanaṃ sāsanavaranti padena saṅgaṇhitvā tattha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:67_6: taṃ itaresaṃ adhigamūpāyoti sabbasāsanamūlabhūtaṃ attano pakaraṇassa ca visayabhūtaṃ pariyattisāsanameva
atk-s0519a0:68_2: Tesu byañjanapadāni pajjati attho etehīti padāni.
atk-s0519a0:68_4: Ubhayampi vā ubhayathā yojetabbaṃ byañjanapadānampi aviparītaṃ paṭipajjitabbattā,
atk-s0519a0:68_6: tāni padāni parato pāḷiyaññeva āvi bhavissantīti tattheva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0519a0:71_4: Taṃ sabbanti taṃ “sutta”nti vuttaṃ sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:71_5: Byañjanañca attho cāti byañjanañceva tadattho ca.
atk-s0519a0:71_9: tañca sabbaṃ atthato dvādasa padāni cha byañjanapadāni ceva cha atthapadāni cāti.
atk-s0519a0:71_16: Taṃ viññeyyaṃ ubhayanti yasmiṃ byañjane atthe ca vacanavacanīyabhāvena sambandhe suttavohāro,
atk-s0519a0:71_17: tadubhayaṃ sarūpato viññātabbaṃ tattha katamaṃ byañjanaṃ katamo atthoti?
atk-s0519a0:72_0: Evaṃ “sāsanavara”nti vuttassa suttassa pariyattibhāvaṃ tassa ca atthabyañjanapadabhāvena veditabbataṃ
atk-s0519a0:72_1: dassetvā idāni tassa pavicayupāyaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ padatthavibhāgena dassetuṃ “soḷasahārā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0519a0:73_4: Hāranayamūlapadāni eva hi saṅkhepato vitthārato ca bhāsitāni nettīti.
atk-s0519a0:73_14: Ayañca gāthā nettiṃ saṅgāyantehi pakaraṇatthasaṅgaṇhanavasena ṭhapitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a0:73_17: hārādisamudāyabhūtāyaṃ nettiyaṃ byañjanatthasamudāye ca sutte kiṃ kena viciyatīti vicāraṇāyaṃ āha –
atk-s0519a0:74_0: Tattha soḷasapi hārā mūlapadaniddhāraṇamantarena byañjanamukheneva suttassa saṃvaṇṇanā honti,
atk-s0519a0:74_1: na nayā viya mūlapadasaṅkhātasabhāvadhammaniddhāraṇamukhenāti te “byañjanavicayo suttassā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:74_2: Atthanayā pana yathāvuttaatthamukheneva suttassa atthasampaṭipattiyā hontīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:74_7: Ubhayaṃ pariggahītanti hārā nayā cāti etaṃ ubhayaṃ suttassa atthaniddhāraṇavasena parisamantato gahitaṃ sabbathā sutte yojitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:74_14: Nettinayena hi saṃvaṇṇetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ nāma suttaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0519a0:75_2: tattha nettisaṃvaṇṇanāya visayabhūtaṃ pariyattidhammameva pakārantarena niyametvā dassetuṃ “yā cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:76_3: Tadubhayañca vimuttāyatanasīsena paricayaṃ karontānaṃ anupādāparinibbānapariyosānānaṃ sampattīnaṃ hetubhāvato ekantena viññeyyaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:76_4: tadubhayavinimuttassa vā ñeyyassa abhāvato tadeva dvayaṃ viññeyyanti imamatthaṃ dasseti yā ceva…pe…
atk-s0519a0:76_8: Ayamānupubbīti ayaṃ vakkhamānā anupubbi hāranayānaṃ anukkamo,
atk-s0519a0:76_12: Sāmiatthe vā etaṃ paccattaṃ navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhiyā anupubbīti.
atk-s0519a0:76_15: yathāvuttavijānane sādhetabbe vakkhamānāya hāranayānupubbiyā ayaṃ navavidhasuttantassa atthapariyesanāti.
atk-s0519a0:77_2: suttabhāve ca tesaṃ kathaṃ sāsanassa navaṅgabhāvo.
atk-s0519a0:77_5: tathā ca sati suttaṅgameva na siyā.
atk-s0519a0:80_0: Sabbassāpi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi.
atk-s0519a0:80_1: Tathā hi “ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:80_3: sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”tiādivacanato vinayābhidhammapariyattivisesepi suttavohāro dissati.
atk-s0519a0:80_4: Tadekadesesu pana geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0519a0:80_6: Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ geyya”nti vadanti.
atk-s0519a0:80_7: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchitvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa.
atk-s0519a0:80_10: Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pañhāvissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
atk-s0519a0:80_13: Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāyuttesu “vuttañheta”ntiādivacanasambandhesu
atk-s0519a0:80_14: abbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0519a0:80_15: tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā.
atk-s0519a0:80_16: Satipi pañhāvissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti
atk-s0519a0:80_17: evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyaṅgādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo
atk-s0519a0:81_3: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā evāti?
atk-s0519a0:81_6: Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittanti.
atk-s0519a0:81_8: “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, tampi na,
atk-s0519a0:81_11: na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni,
atk-s0519a0:82_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā”ti,
atk-s0519a0:82_4: Sahabhāvo ca nāma atthato aññena hoti,
atk-s0519a0:82_5: na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi.
atk-s0519a0:82_7: na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi.
atk-s0519a0:82_13: Ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:82_14: Yasmā pana sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ yathāvuttanayena atthānaṃ sūcanādiatthena suttantveva vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:85_1: Evaṃ saṅgahavārena saṅkhepato dassite hārādayo idāni vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tattha katame soḷasa hārā”tiādidesanā āraddhā.
atk-s0519a0:85_9: Pucchā ca nāmesā pañcavidhā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
atk-s0519a0:85_12: Tena nesaṃ na tato uddhaṃ adho cāti etaparamataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:86_5: Atha vā harīyanti voharīyanti dhammasaṃvaṇṇakadhammapaṭiggāhakehi dhammassa dānaggahaṇavasenāti hārā.
atk-s0519a0:86_7: Yathā hi anekaratanāvalisamūho hārasaṅkhāto attano avayavabhūtaratanasamphassehi samuppajjanīyamānahilādasukho
atk-s0519a0:86_11: Atha vā hārayanti aññāṇādīnaṃ hāraṃ apagamaṃ karonti ācikkhantīti vā hārā.
atk-s0519a0:86_12: Atha vā sotujanacittassa haraṇato ramaṇato ca hārā niruttinayena, yathā –
atk-s0519a0:87_0: Asādhāraṇato pana desīyati saṃvaṇṇīyati etāya suttatthoti desanā,
atk-s0519a0:87_2: Nanu ca aññepi hārā desanāsaṅkhātassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanato desanāsahacārinovāti?
atk-s0519a0:87_4: ayaṃ pana hāro yebhuyyena yathārutavaseneva viññāyamāno desanāya saha caratīti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0519a0:88_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana vicinatīti vicayoti ayamattho dassito.
atk-s0519a0:89_1: idha pana yuttivicāraṇā yutti uttarapadalopena “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti yathā,
atk-s0519a0:90_0: Padaṭṭhānanti āsannakāraṇaṃ, idhāpi padaṭṭhānavicāraṇātiādi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:91_0: Lakkhīyanti etena, ettha vā ekalakkhaṇā dhammā avuttāpi ekavacanenāti lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:92_2: Nibbacanādīnaṃ sutte dassiyamānānaṃ catunnaṃ byūhoti catubyūho,
atk-s0519a0:93_0: Āvaṭṭīyanti etena, ettha vā sabhāgā visabhāgā ca dhammā, tesaṃ vā āvaṭṭananti āvaṭṭo.
atk-s0519a0:94_1: ettha vā sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇānaṃ saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ bhūmiyoti vibhatti,
atk-s0519a0:96_2: vividhaṃ vuccati etena atthoti vā vivacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:97_0: Pakārehi pabhedato vā ñāpīyanti iminā, ettha vā atthāti paññatti.
atk-s0519a0:98_0: Otārīyanti anuppavesīyanti etena, ettha vā suttāgatā dhammā paṭiccasamuppādādīsūti otaraṇo.
atk-s0519a0:99_0: Sodhīyanti samādhīyanti etena, ettha vā sutte padapadatthapañhārambhāti sodhano.
atk-s0519a0:100_0: Adhiṭṭhīyanti anupavattīyanti etena, ettha vā sāmaññavisesabhūtā dhammā vinā vikappenāti adhiṭṭhāno.
atk-s0519a0:102_2: Sabbattha ca bhāvasādhanavasenāpi attho sambhavatīti tassāpi vasena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:103_2: tāsu osānagāthāya atthato asaṃkiṇṇāti padatthena saṅkararahitā,
atk-s0519a0:103_3: tena yadipi keci hārā aññamaññaṃ avisiṭṭhā viya dissanti,
atk-s0519a0:103_4: tathāpi tesaṃ atthato saṅkaro natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:103_5: So ca nesaṃ asaṅkaro lakkhaṇaniddese supākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0519a0:104_1: Evaṃ hāre uddisitvā idāni naye uddisituṃ “tattha katame”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:104_2: Tattha nayanti saṃkilese vodānāni ca vibhāgato ñāpentīti nayā,
atk-s0519a0:104_6: nīyanti vā sayaṃ dhammakathikehi upanīyanti suttassa atthapavicayatthanti nayā.
atk-s0519a0:104_8: Yathā hi ekattādayo nayā sammā paṭivijjhiyamānā paccayapaccayuppannadhammānaṃ yathākkamaṃ sambandhavibhāgabyāpāravirahānurūpaphalabhāvadassanena
atk-s0519a0:104_9: asaṅkarato sammutisaccaparamatthasaccānaṃ sabhāvaṃ pavedayantā paramatthasaccappaṭivedhāya saṃvattanti,
atk-s0519a0:104_10: evametepi kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgadhammavibhāgadassanena aviparītasuttatthāvabodhāya abhisambhuṇantā veneyyānaṃ catusaccappaṭivedhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0519a0:104_11: Atha vā pariyattiatthassa nayanato saṃkilesato yamanato ca nayā niruttinayena.
atk-s0519a0:105_0: Nandiyāvaṭṭotiādīsu nandiyāvaṭṭassa viya āvaṭṭo etassāti nandiyāvaṭṭo,
atk-s0519a0:105_1: yathā hi nandiyāvaṭṭo antoṭhitena padhānāvayavena bahiddhā āvaṭṭati,
atk-s0519a0:105_3: Atha vā nandiyā taṇhāya pamodassa vā āvaṭṭo etthāti nandiyāvaṭṭo.
atk-s0519a0:105_4: Tīhi avayavehi lobhādīhi saṃkilesapakkhe alobhādīhi ca vodānapakkhe pukkhalo sobhanoti tipukkhalo.
atk-s0519a0:105_6: tassa vikkīḷitaṃ desanāvacīkammabhūto vihāroti katvā vipallāsatappaṭipakkhaparidīpanato sīhassa vikkīḷitaṃ etthāti sīhavikkīḷito, nayo.
atk-s0519a0:105_11: Tathā ālocitānaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthanayattayayojane samānayanato aṅkuso viya aṅkuso.
atk-s0519a0:105_13: nayo ca so lañjako cāti nayalañjako.
atk-s0519a0:106_1: Evaṃ nayepi uddisitvā idāni mūlapadāni uddisituṃ “tattha katamānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:106_2: Tattha mūlāni ca tāni nayānaṃ paṭṭhānabhāgānañca patiṭṭhābhāvato padāni ca adhigamūpāyabhāvato koṭṭhāsabhāvato cāti mūlapadāni.
atk-s0519a0:106_7: kusena vā ñāṇena lātabbato pavattetabbato kusalāni,
atk-s0519a0:107_0: Evaṃ gaṇanaparicchedato jātibhedato ca mūlapadāni dassetvā idāni sarūpato dassento saṃkilesapakkhaṃyeva paṭhamaṃ uddisati “taṇhā”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:109_0: Idaṃ uddānanti idaṃ vuttasseva atthassa vippakiṇṇabhāvena nassituṃ adatvā uddhaṃ dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ uddānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:112_1: Evaṃ uddiṭṭhe hārādayo niddisituṃ “tattha saṅkhepato”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:112_3: Saṅkhepato netti kittitāti samāsato nettippakaraṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:114_0: Ettāvatā ca hetvādī, veditabbā hi viññunā.
atk-s0519a0:115_0: Tesu avisesato visesato ca hāranayānaṃ attho dassito.
atk-s0519a0:115_1: Lakkhaṇādīsu pana avisesato sabbepi hārā nayā ca yathākkamaṃ byañjanatthamukhena navaṅgassa sāsanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a0:115_2: Visesato pana tassa tassa hārassa nayassa ca lakkhaṇaṃ niddese eva kathayissāma.
atk-s0519a0:115_3: Kamādīni ca yasmā nesaṃ lakkhaṇesu ñātesu viññeyyāni honti,
atk-s0519a0:117_21: Taṇhāya hi kāraṇabhūtāya puggalo sukhampi sukhārammaṇampi assādeti.
atk-s0519a0:117_24: Vipallāsavasena hi sattā aniṭṭhampi ārammaṇaṃ iṭṭhākārena assādenti,
atk-s0519a0:117_25: evaṃ vedanāya sabbesaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhārānaṃ taṇhāya vipallāsānañca assādavicāro veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:118_11: vipallāsānaṃ sukhasaññādivasena dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatavasena ca vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:119_0: Ādīnavo dukkhā vedanā tissopi vā dukkhatā.
atk-s0519a0:119_1: Atha vā sabbepi tebhūmakā saṅkhārā ādīnavo.
atk-s0519a0:119_2: Ādīnaṃ ativiya kapaṇaṃ vāti pavattatīti hi ādīnavo,
atk-s0519a0:119_5: Yato tattha ādīnavānupassanā āraddhavipassakānaṃ yathābhūtanayoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:119_10: Tasmā ādīnavo dukkhasaccaniddesabhūtānaṃ jātiyādīnaṃ aniccatādīnaṃ dvācattālīsāya ākārānañca vasena vibhajitvā niddisitabbo.
atk-s0519a0:120_3: Ubhayampi sāmaññaniddesena ekasesena vā “nissaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Pi-
atk-s0519a0:120_5: Tattha ariyamaggapakkhe satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ kāyānupassanādīnañca tadantogadhabhedānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:121_0: Nibbānapakkhe pana kiñcāpi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā nippariyāyena vibhāgo natthi.
atk-s0519a0:121_3: tesaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge dassitappabhedānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ dvārānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ channaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:121_5: channaṃ dhātūnaṃ dasannaṃ kasiṇāyatanānaṃ asubhānaṃ kesādīnaṃ dvattiṃsāya ākārānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:121_6: dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ lokiyānaṃ indriyānaṃ kāmadhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ
atk-s0519a0:121_7: kāmabhavādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ appamaññānaṃ āruppānaṃ dvādasannaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānañcāti
atk-s0519a0:121_8: evamādīnaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ nissaraṇabhāvena ca vibhajitvā niddisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:122_3: Nanu ca nibbānādhigamo bhagavato desanāya nipphādīyati.
atk-s0519a0:122_10: Yañca tasmiṃ khaṇe maggaṃ anabhisambhuṇantassa kālantare tadadhigamakāraṇabhūtaṃ sampattibhavahetu ca siyā.
atk-s0519a0:122_14: “dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti idaṃ phala”nti ca.
atk-s0519a0:122_15: Etena nayena devesu ca mānusesu ca āyuvaṇṇabalasukhayasaparivāraādhipateyyasampattiyo upadhisampattiyo
atk-s0519a0:122_16: cakkavattisirī devarajjasirī cattāri sampatticakkāni sīlasampadā samādhisampadā tisso vijjā cha abhiññā
atk-s0519a0:122_17: catasso paṭisambhidā sāvakabodhi paccekabodhi sammāsambodhīti sabbāpi sampattiyo puññasambhārahetukā
atk-s0519a0:123_1: Sā hi purimā purimā pacchimāya pacchimāya adhigamūpāyabhāvato paramparāya magganibbānādhigamassa ca hetubhāvato upāyo.
atk-s0519a0:123_3: Keci pana “saha vipassanāya maggo upāyo”ti vadanti,
atk-s0519a0:123_4: tesaṃ matena nissaraṇanti nibbānameva vuttaṃ siyā.
atk-s0519a0:123_5: Phalaṃ viya upāyopi pubbabhāgoti vuttaṃ siyā,
atk-s0519a0:123_8: Etthāpi pubbabhāgappaṭipadā eva udāhaṭāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
atk-s0519a0:123_9: Yasmā pana “te pahāya tare oghanti idaṃ nissaraṇa”nti ariyamaggassa nissaraṇabhāvaṃ vakkhati.
atk-s0519a0:124_0: Āṇattīti āṇārahassa bhagavato veneyyajanassa hitasiddhiyā “evaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti vidhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:125_2: Desanāhāroti etesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ assādādīnaṃ vibhajanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso desanāhāro nāmāti attho. Etthāha –
atk-s0519a0:125_3: kiṃ panetesaṃ assādādīnaṃ anavasesānaṃ vacanaṃ desanāhāro,
atk-s0519a0:125_10: Tattha anāgataṃ atthavasena niddhāretvā hāro yojetabbo.
atk-s0519a0:125_11: Ayañca attho desanāhāravibhaṅge āgamissatīti idha na papañcito.
atk-s0519a0:126_9: Etena sutte āgataṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ vicetabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:126_10: Yā ca anugītiti vuttasseva atthassa yā anu pacchā gīti anugīti,
atk-s0519a0:126_14: Byākaraṇassa hi pucchānurūpatā idha pubbāparaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:126_18: Ettāvatā vicayahārassa visayo niravasesena dassito hoti.
atk-s0519a0:127_0: Tattha sutte sabbesaṃ padānaṃ anupubbena atthaso byañjanaso ca vicayo padavicayo.
atk-s0519a0:127_1: “Ayaṃ pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā vimaticchedanā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā sattādhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0519a0:127_2: dhammādhiṭṭhānā ekādhiṭṭhānā anekādhiṭṭhānā sammutivisayā paramatthavisayā atītavisayā anāgatavisayā
atk-s0519a0:127_4: “Idaṃ vissajjanaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sāvasesaṃ niravasesaṃ
atk-s0519a0:128_1: etena na sametī”ti pucchitatthaṃ ānetvā vicayo pubbenāparaṃ saṃsanditvā ca vicayo pubbāparavicayo.
atk-s0519a0:128_2: “Ayaṃ anugīti vuttatthasaṅgahā avuttatthasaṅgahā tadubhayatthasaṅgahā kusalatthasaṅgahā akusalatthasaṅgahā”tiādinā anugītivicayo.
atk-s0519a0:128_6: avasiṭṭhānaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ “yathāsakalakkhaṇā”tiādinā sabbesañca dvāvīsatiyā tikesu dvācattālīsādhike
atk-s0519a0:129_2: aniccatādīnaṃ ādiantavantatāya aniccantikatāya ca “aniccā”tiādinā sabbesañca lokiyadhammānaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyahānabhāgiyatādivasena
atk-s0519a0:129_6: Phalādīnaṃ taṃtaṃsuttadesanāya sādhetabbaphalassa tadupāyassa tattha tattha suttavidhivacanassa ca vibhāganiddhāraṇavasena vicayo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:129_7: Evaṃ padapucchāvissajjanapubbāparānugītīnaṃ assādādīnañca visesaniddhāraṇavaseneva vicayalakkhaṇo “vicayo hāro”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:130_3: Byañjanañhi mūlapadāni viya nayānaṃ hārānaṃ bhūmi pavattiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:130_14: Yuttāyuttaparikkhāti yuttassa ca ayuttassa ca upaparikkhā.
atk-s0519a0:130_19: Tattha byañjanassa tāva sabhāvaniruttibhāvo adhippetatthavācakabhāvo ca yuttabhāvo.
atk-s0519a0:130_23: Hāro yuttīti niddiṭṭhoti evaṃ sutte byañjanatthānaṃ yuttāyuttabhāvavibhāvanalakkhaṇo yuttihāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:131_4: yonisomanasikārādi sutte āgataṃ vā anāgataṃ vā sambhavato niddhāretvā kathetabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:131_7: Yāva sabbadhammāti yattakā tasmiṃ sutte āgatā dhammā,
atk-s0519a0:131_8: tesaṃ sabbesampi yathānurūpaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretvā kathetabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:131_9: Atha vā yāva sabbadhammāti suttāgatassa dhammassa yaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:131_10: tassapi yaṃ padaṭṭhānanti sambhavato yāva sabbadhammā padaṭṭhānavicāraṇā kātabbāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:131_11: Eso hāro padaṭṭhānoti evaṃ sutte āgatadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūtā dhammā tesañca padaṭṭhānabhūtāti sambhavato
atk-s0519a0:132_1: Vuttamhi ekadhammeti kusalādīsu khandhādīsu vā yasmiṃ kismiñci ekadhamme,
atk-s0519a0:132_3: Ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kecīti ye keci dhammā kusalādibhāvena rūpakkhandhādibhāvena vā tena dhammena samānalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a0:132_4: Vuttā bhavanti sabbeti te sabbepi kusalādisabhāvā,
atk-s0519a0:132_5: khandhādisabhāvā vā dhammā sutte avuttāpi tāya samānalakkhaṇatāya vuttā bhavanti ānetvā saṃvaṇṇanāvasenāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:132_7: Tena sahacāritā samānakiccatā samānahetutā samānaphalatā samānārammaṇatāti evamādīhi avuttānampi vuttānaṃ viya niddhāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:132_8: So hāro lakkhaṇo nāmāti evaṃ sutte anāgatepi dhamme vuttappakārena āgate viya niddhāretvā yā saṃvaṇṇanā,
atk-s0519a0:133_3: Adhippāyoti buddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ vā tassa suttassa desakānaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:133_7: ayaṃ pana visesato byañjanadvāreneva atthapariyesanāti katvā “byañjana”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:133_9: “byañjanena suttassa neruttañca adhippāyo ca nidānañca pubbāparānusandhi ca gavesitabbā”ti.
atk-s0519a0:133_14: Pubbāparānusandhīti pubbena ca aparena ca anusandhi.
atk-s0519a0:133_16: suttassa pubbabhāgena aparabhāgaṃ saṃsanditvā kathananti attho.
atk-s0519a0:133_17: Saṅgītivasena vā pubbāparabhūtehi suttantarehi saṃvaṇṇiyamānassa suttassa saṃsandanaṃ pubbāparānusandhi.
atk-s0519a0:133_20: Eso hāro catubyūhoti evaṃ nibbacanādhippāyādīnaṃ catunnaṃ vibhāvanalakkhaṇo catubyūho hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:134_1: Ekamhi padaṭṭhāneti ekasmiṃ ārambhadhātuādike parakkamadhātuādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūte dhamme desanāruḷhe sati.
atk-s0519a0:134_2: Pariyesati sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānanti tassa visabhāgatāya aggahaṇena vā sesakaṃ pamādādīnaṃ āsannakāraṇattā
atk-s0519a0:134_3: padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kosajjādikaṃ dhammantaraṃ pariyesati paññāya gavesati,
atk-s0519a0:134_4: pariyesitvā ca saṃvaṇṇanāya yojento desanaṃ āvaṭṭati paṭipakkheti vīriyārambhādimukhena āraddhasuttaṃ
atk-s0519a0:134_5: vuttanayena pamādādivasena niddisanto desanaṃ paṭipakkhato āvaṭṭeti nāma.
atk-s0519a0:134_6: Āvaṭṭo nāma so hāroti desanāya gahitadhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena āvaṭṭanalakkhaṇo āvaṭṭo hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:135_3: Padaṭṭhānanti yasmiṃ patiṭṭhite uttari guṇavisese adhigacchati,
atk-s0519a0:135_7: Sādhāraṇeti dassanapahātabbādināmavasena vā puthujjanasotāpannādivatthuvasena vā sādhāraṇe avisiṭṭhe samāneti attho.
atk-s0519a0:135_9: Neyyo vibhattīti yathāvuttadhammādīnaṃ vibhajano ayaṃ hāro vibhattīti ñātabboti attho.
atk-s0519a0:135_10: Tasmā saṃkilesadhamme vodānadhamme ca sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato padaṭṭhānato bhūmito ca vibhajanalakkhaṇo “vibhattihāro”ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:136_6: Parivattati paṭipakkheti vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ ye paṭipakkhā,
atk-s0519a0:136_8: Evaṃ niddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhato parivattanalakkhaṇo “parivattano hāro”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:137_7: Tena bahū eva pariyāyasaddā vevacanahārayojanāyaṃ kathetabbā,
atk-s0519a0:137_9: Sutte vuttānīti navavidhasuttantasaṅkhāte tepiṭake buddhavacane bhāsitāni.
atk-s0519a0:137_12: tena pāḷiyaṃ āgatāniyeva vevacanāni gahetabbānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:137_14: Yo jānāti suttavidūti yathā “sappissa jānāhī”ti vutte “sappinā vicārehi,
atk-s0519a0:137_17: evaṃ yo suttakovido dhammakathiko ekassa atthassa bahūpi pariyāyasadde vicāreti vibhāveti yojetīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:137_18: Vevacano nāma so hāroti tassa atthassa vuttappakārapariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo vevacanahāro nāma.
atk-s0519a0:138_5: So ākāroti yo ekassevatthassa nikkhepappabhavapaññattiādivasena anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpanākāro.
atk-s0519a0:138_6: Ñeyyo paññatti nāma hāroti paññattihāro nāmāti ñātabbo.
atk-s0519a0:138_7: Tasmā ekekassa dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpetabbākāravibhāvanalakkhaṇo “paññattihāro”ti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:139_4: Etehīti yo dvādasapadiko paccayākāro yāni ca dvāvīsatindriyāni ye ca pañcakkhandhā yā ca aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo yāni ca dvādasāyatanāni,
atk-s0519a0:139_8: Otaraṇo nāma so hāroti yo yathāvutto saṃvaṇṇanāviseso,
atk-s0519a0:139_10: saddena cettha suññatamukhādīnaṃ gāthāyaṃ avuttānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:139_11: Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo otaraṇo hāro nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:140_4: Idañca pucchantā yebhuyyena gāthābandhavasena pucchantīti katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:140_5: Yamārabbhāti sā pana gāthā yaṃ atthaṃ ārabbha adhikicca pucchitā,
atk-s0519a0:140_9: padañca sodhitaṃ ārambho ca sodhitoti evaṃ padādīnaṃ sodhitāsodhitabhāvavicāro.
atk-s0519a0:140_10: Hāro so sodhano nāmāti yathāvuttavicāro sodhano hāro nāma.
atk-s0519a0:140_11: Evaṃ sutte padapadatthapañhārambhānaṃ sodhanalakkhaṇo “sodhano hāro”ti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:141_11: Te na vikappayitabbāti ye dhammā “dukkhaṃ samudayo”tiādinā sāmaññena,
atk-s0519a0:141_12: “jāti jarā kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā”tiādinā visesena ca sutte desitā,
atk-s0519a0:141_14: ko vā viseso”ti evaṃ sāmaññavisesavikappanavasena na vikappayitabbā. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:141_15: Sāmaññavisesakappanāya vohārabhāvena anavaṭṭhānato kāladisāvisesādīnaṃ viya apekkhāsiddhito ca.
atk-s0519a0:141_16: Yathā hi “ajja hiyyo sve”ti vuccamānā kālavisesā anavaṭṭhitasabhāvā “purimā disā pacchimā disā”ti vuccamānā disāvisesā ca,
atk-s0519a0:141_18: Tathā hi “idaṃ dukkha”nti vuccamānaṃ jātiādiapekkhāya sāmaññampi samānaṃ saccāpekkhāya viseso hoti.
atk-s0519a0:141_20: Eso hāro adhiṭṭhānoti evaṃ suttāgatānaṃ dhammānaṃ avikappanavasena sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo adhiṭṭhāno hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:142_9: Hetumavakaḍḍhayitvāti taṃ yathāvuttapaccayasaṅkhātaṃ janakādibhedabhinnaṃ hetuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā suttato niddhāretvā yo saṃvaṇṇanāsaṅkhāto,
atk-s0519a0:142_10: eso hāro parikkhāroti evaṃ sutte āgatadhammānaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhāte hetupaccaye niddhāretvā saṃvaṇṇanalakkhaṇo parikkhāro hāroti attho.
atk-s0519a0:143_3: te tesaṃ samādhiādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvena samāropayitabbāti sambandho.
atk-s0519a0:143_4: Ye cekatthā pakāsitā munināti ye ca rāgavirāgācetovimuttisekkhaphalakāmadhātusamatikkamanādisaddā anāgāmiphalatthatāya
atk-s0519a0:143_7: Samāropanañcettha sutte yathārutavasena niddhāraṇavasena vā gayhamānassa sikkhattayasaṅkhātassa sīlādikkhandhattayassa
atk-s0519a0:143_9: bhāvanāpāripūrī ca pahātabbassa pahānenāti pahānasamāropanāpi atthato dassitā eva hoti.
atk-s0519a0:143_10: Esa samāropano hāroti esa sutte āgatadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānavevacanabhāvanāpahānasamāropanavicāraṇalakkhaṇo samāropano nāma hāroti attho.
atk-s0519a0:145_1: Evaṃ gāthābandhavasena soḷasapi hāre niddisitvā idāni naye niddisituṃ “taṇhañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:145_2: Tattha taṇhañca avijjampi cāti sutte āgataṃ atthato niddhāraṇavasena vā gahitaṃ taṇhaṃ avijjañca yo netīti sambandho.
atk-s0519a0:145_3: Yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso taṃ neti saṃkilesapakkhaṃ pāpeti saṃkilesavasena suttatthaṃ yojetīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:145_8: Saccehi yojayitvāti nayanto ca taṇhā ca avijjā ca bhavamūlakattā samudayasaccaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:145_11: tena pattabbā asaṅkhatadhātu nirodhasaccanti evaṃ imehi catūhi saccehi yojetvā.
atk-s0519a0:145_12: Ayaṃ nayo nandiyāvaṭṭoti yo taṇhāvijjāhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa
atk-s0519a0:145_15: Ettha ca nayassa bhūmi gāthāyaṃ “nayo”ti vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:145_19: Tassa pana yā ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ vasena taṇhādimukhena nayabhūmiracanā,
atk-s0519a0:146_6: Nayanto ca kusalākusalaṃ māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtaṃ na hotīti bhūtaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:146_8: Akusalassa iṭṭhavipākatābhāvato kusalassa ca aniṭṭhavipākatābhāvato vipāke sati avisaṃvādakattā avitathaṃ neti.
atk-s0519a0:146_10: Atha vā akusalamūlehi akusalāni kusalamūlehi ca kusalāni nayanto ayaṃ nayo bhūtaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ neti,
atk-s0519a0:146_18: Tipukkhalaṃ taṃ nayaṃ āhūti yo akusalamūlehi saṃkilesapakkhassa kusalamūlehi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa
atk-s0519a0:147_10: Etaṃ nayanti yo subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi sakalassa saṃkilesapakkhassa saddhindriyādīhi vodānapakkhassa
atk-s0519a0:147_13: atthanayakusalā eva vā sīhavikkīḷitaṃ nayanti vadantīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:148_1: Veyyākaraṇesūti tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ katesu suttassa atthavissajjanesūti attho.
atk-s0519a0:148_3: Kusalākusalāti vodāniyā saṃkilesikā ca tassa tassa nayassa disābhūtadhammā.
atk-s0519a0:148_5: Manasā volokayateti te yathāvuttadhamme citteneva “ayaṃ paṭhamā disā ayaṃ dutiyā disā”tiādinā tassa tassa nayassa disābhāvena upaparikkhati,
atk-s0519a0:148_11: Taṃ khu disālocanaṃ āhūti olokayateti ettha yadetaṃ olokanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:148_12: taṃ disālocanaṃ nāma nayaṃ vadanti. Khu-
atk-s0519a0:149_3: Yena hi vidhinā tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanāya disā olokīyanti,
atk-s0519a0:149_4: so vidhi disālocananti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:149_12: sammā vā āneti tassa tassa nayassa yojanāvasena.
atk-s0519a0:149_15: Ayaṃ nayoti samānetīti ettha yadetaṃ taṃtaṃnayadisābhūtadhammānaṃ samānayanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:150_1: Evaṃ hāre naye ca niddisitvā idāni nesaṃ yojanakkamaṃ dassento “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:152_1: Idāni yesaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ atthapadānañca vasena dvādasa padāni suttanti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:152_3: Tattha apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato asañcaraṇato.
atk-s0519a0:152_7: Vaṇṇo eva hi ittarakhaṇatāya aparāparabhāvena pavatto padādibhāvena gayhamāno yathāsambandhaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vadati.
atk-s0519a0:152_9: keci pana “manasā desanāvācāya akkharaṇato akkhara”nti vadanti.
atk-s0519a0:153_1: taṃ nāmapadaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ upasaggapadaṃ nipātapadanti catubbidhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:153_2: Tattha “phasso vedanā citta”nti evamādikaṃ satvappadhānaṃ nāmapadaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:153_5: Kiriyāya satvassa ca sarūpavisesappakāsanahetubhūtaṃ “eva”nti evamādikaṃ nipātapadaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:154_0: Byañjananti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjayatīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:154_2: Padamattasavanepi hi adhikārādivasena labbhamānehi padantarehi anusandhānaṃ katvāva atthasampaṭipatti hotīti vākyameva atthaṃ byañjayati.
atk-s0519a0:155_2: Yadi evaṃ padato ākārassa ko visesoti?
atk-s0519a0:155_3: Apariyosite vākye avibhajjamāne vā tadavayavo padaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:155_4: Uccāraṇavasena pariyosite vākye vibhajjamāne vā tadavayavo ākāroti ayametesaṃ viseso.
atk-s0519a0:155_8: Ettha ca byañjananti imassa padassa anantaraṃ vattabbaṃ ākārapadaṃ niddesapadānantaraṃ vadantena “ākārachaṭṭhavacana”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:155_9: padānupubbikaṃ pana icchantehi taṃ byañjanapadānantarameva kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:155_10: Tathā hi vakkhati “aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā ākārāti,
atk-s0519a0:155_13: Ettāva byañjanaṃ sabbanti yānimāni akkharādīni niddiṭṭhāni,
atk-s0519a0:155_15: etehi asaṅgahitaṃ byañjanaṃ nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:156_4: Iminā hi atthapadadvayena akkharapadehi vibhāviyamāno atthākāro gahito.
atk-s0519a0:156_5: Yasmā akkharehi suyyamānehi suṇantānaṃ visesavidhānassa katattā padapariyosāne padatthasampaṭipatti hoti.
atk-s0519a0:156_6: Tathā hi vakkhati “tattha bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāseti padehi pakāsetīti,
atk-s0519a0:157_1: Vibhajanā ca uttānīkammañca paññatti ca vibhajanuttānīkammapaññatti.
atk-s0519a0:157_4: Idha purimanayeneva byañjanākārehi niddisiyamāno atthākāro dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:157_8: Etthāpi niruttiniddesasaṅkhātehi byañjanapadehi niddisiyamāno atthākāro vutto,
atk-s0519a0:157_10: Etehīti etehi eva saṅkāsanādivinimuttassa desanātthassa abhāvato.
atk-s0519a0:157_13: Suttatthena hi desanāya pavattiyamānena ugghaṭitaññuādiveneyyānaṃ cittasantānassa pabodhanakiriyānibbatti.
atk-s0519a0:158_4: Attho samāyuttoti attho sammā yutto na vinā vattati.
atk-s0519a0:158_5: Sabbassa hi buddhavacanassa catusaccappakāsanato atthanayānañca catusaccayojanavasena pavattanato sabbo
atk-s0519a0:159_1: Idāni yathāniddiṭṭhe desanāhārādike nettippakaraṇassa padatthe sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gaṇanavasena paricchinditvā dassento “atthassā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:159_2: Tattha catubbīsāti soḷasa hārā cha byañjanapadāni dve kammanayāti evaṃ catubbīsa.
atk-s0519a0:159_3: Ubhayanti cha atthapadāni tayo atthanayāti idaṃ navavidhaṃ yathāvuttaṃ catubbīsavidhañcāti etaṃ ubhayaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:159_8: ito vinimutto koci nettipadatthā natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:160_0: Evaṃ tettiṃsapadatthāya nettiyā suttassa atthapariyesanāya yo “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti nayehi paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0519a0:160_3: Evaṃ siddhe sati ayaṃ ārambho imamatthaṃ dīpeti –
atk-s0519a0:160_4: sabbepime hārā nayā ca iminā dassitakkameneva suttesu saṃvaṇṇanāvasena yojetabbā,
atk-s0519a0:161_1: yadete hārā nayā ca imināva kamena desitāti?
atk-s0519a0:161_3: api ca dhammadesanāya nissayaphalatadupāyasarīrabhūtānaṃ assādādīnaṃ vibhāvanasabhāvattā pakatiyā sabbasuttānurūpāti
atk-s0519a0:161_4: suviññeyyabhāvato paresañca saṃvaṇṇanāvisesānaṃ vicayahārādīnaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvato paṭhamaṃ desanāhāro dassito.
atk-s0519a0:162_0: Padapucchāvissajjanapubbāparānugītīhi saddhiṃ desanāhārapadatthānaṃ pavicayasabhāvatāya tassa anantaraṃ vicayo.
atk-s0519a0:163_0: Vicayena hārena pavicitānaṃ atthānaṃ yuttāyuttivicāraṇā yuttāti yuttivicāraṇabhāvato vicayānantaraṃ yuttihāro vutto.
atk-s0519a0:164_0: Yuttāyuttānaṃyeva atthānaṃ upapattianurūpaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya niddhāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ padaṭṭhānacintanaṃ
atk-s0519a0:164_3: “yo koci upanissayo yo koci paccayo ca,
atk-s0519a0:165_0: Yuttāyuttānaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya pariggahitasabhāvānaṃyeva ca dhammānaṃ avuttānampi ekalakkhaṇatāya gahaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a0:165_1: kātabbanti dassanatthaṃ padaṭṭhānānantaraṃ lakkhaṇo hāro vutto.
atk-s0519a0:165_2: Tathā hi lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅge “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā paṭiccasamuppādaṃ dassetvā “evaṃ ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:166_1: na sutte sarūpato āgatānamevāti dassanatthaṃ lakkhaṇānantaraṃ catubyūho vutto.
atk-s0519a0:166_3: evañca katvā “yadā hi bhikkhu atthassa ca nāmaṃ jānāti dhammassa ca nāmaṃ jānāti tathā tathā naṃ abhiniropetī”ti anavasesapariyādānaṃ vakkhati.
atk-s0519a0:166_4: Tathā “punappunaṃ gabbhamupetī”ti ettha “ye jarāmaraṇena aṭṭiyitukāmā bhavissanti,
atk-s0519a0:166_5: te bhavissanti bhojane mattaññuno indriyesu guttadvārā”tiādinā sammāpaṭipattiṃ adhippāyabhāvena vakkhati.
atk-s0519a0:167_0: Nibbacanādhippāyanidānavacanehi saddhiṃ sutte padatthānaṃ suttantarasaṃsandanasaṅkhāte pubbāparavicāre
atk-s0519a0:167_1: dassite tesaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammantarāvaṭṭanaṃ sukhena sakkā dassetunti catubyūhānantaraṃ āvaṭṭo vutto.
atk-s0519a0:167_2: Teneva hi “ārambhatha nikkamathā”ti gāthāyaṃ ārambhanikkamanabuddhasāsanayogadhunanehi vīriyasamādhipaññindriyāni
atk-s0519a0:167_3: niddhāretvā tadanuyogassa mūlaṃ “pamādo”ti suttantare dassito pamādo āvaṭṭito.
atk-s0519a0:168_1: bhūmito ca vibhāgo sakkā sukhena yojitunti āvaṭṭānantaraṃ vibhattihāro vutto.
atk-s0519a0:168_4: nāmasādhāraṇā vatthusādhāraṇā cā”ti ārabhitvā “micchattaniyatānaṃ sattānaṃ aniyatānañca sattānaṃ dassanappahātabbā kilesā sādhāraṇā,
atk-s0519a0:168_5: puthujjanassa sotāpannassa ca kāmarāgabyāpādā sādhāraṇā”tiādinā sabhāgavisabhāgapariyāyavanteyeva dhamme vibhajissati.
atk-s0519a0:169_0: Sāvajjānavajjadhammānaṃ sappaṭibhāgābhāvato tesaṃ vibhāge kate suttāgate dhamme akasirena paṭipakkhato
atk-s0519a0:169_2: Tathā hi “sammādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā bhavatī”ti paṭivibhattasabhāve eva dhamme parivattanahāravibhaṅge udāharissati.
atk-s0519a0:170_1: na sutte āgatāyevāti dassanatthaṃ parivattanānantaraṃ vevacanahāro vutto.
atk-s0519a0:171_0: Evaṃ te dhammā pariyāyasaddatopi vibhāvitā hontīti pariyāyato pakāsitānaṃ dhammānaṃ pabhedato paññattivasena
atk-s0519a0:171_1: vibhajanaṃ sukhena sakkā ñātunti vevacanahārānantaraṃ paññattihāro vutto.
atk-s0519a0:171_2: Tathā hi sutte āgatadhammānaṃ pariyāyapaññattivibhāgaṃ subodhanañca paññattihāravibhaṅge vakkhati.
atk-s0519a0:172_1: paṭiccasamuppādādimukhena avadhāraṇaṃ sakkā dassetunti paññattianantaraṃ otaraṇo hāro vutto.
atk-s0519a0:172_2: Tathā hi “uddhaṃ adho”ti gāthaṃ uddisitvā “vippamutto”ti padena asekkhaṃ vijjaṃ niddhāretvā “vijjuppādā
atk-s0519a0:173_0: Dhātāyatanādīsu otāritānaṃ sutte padatthānaṃ pucchārambhavisodhanaṃ sakkā sukhena sampādetunti otaraṇānantaraṃ sodhano hāro vutto.
atk-s0519a0:174_0: Visodhitesu sutte padapadatthesu tattha labbhamānasāmaññavisesabhāvo sukaro hotīti dassetuṃ sodhanānantaraṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro dassito.
atk-s0519a0:174_2: tato eva hi “yathā yathā vā pana pucchitaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:175_0: Sāmaññavisesabhūtesu sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu dhammesu paveditesu parikkhārasaṅkhātassa sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇarūpassa
atk-s0519a0:175_1: paccayaheturāsissa pabhedo suviññeyyoti adhiṭṭhānānantaraṃ parikkhāro vutto.
atk-s0519a0:176_0: Asādhāraṇe sādhāraṇe ca kāraṇe dassite tassa attano phalesu kāraṇākāro tesaṃ hetuphalānaṃ pabhedato desanākāro
atk-s0519a0:176_1: bhāvetabbapahātabbadhammānaṃ bhāvanāpahānāni ca niddhāretvā vuccamānāni sammā suttassa atthaṃ tathattāvabodhāya
atk-s0519a0:177_0: Nayānaṃ pana veneyyattayappayojitattā atthanayattayūpadesassa tadanukkameneva nandiyāvaṭṭādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ kamo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:177_1: Ugghaṭitaññuādayo hi tayo veneyyā nandiyāvaṭṭādayo payojenti.
atk-s0519a0:177_2: Tasmā te uddesaniddesapaṭiniddesā viya yathākkamaṃ tesaṃ upakārāya savaṃttantīti.
atk-s0519a0:177_3: Tathā hi nesaṃ cattāro cha aṭṭha ca mūlapadā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0519a0:177_4: Itarassa pana nayadvayassa atthanayattayassa bhūmiyā ālocanaṃ tassa tattha samānayanañcāti iminā kāraṇena uddesakkamo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:178_0: Etaparamatā ca hārānaṃ ettakehi pakāravisesehi atthanayattayasahitehi suttassa attho niddhāriyamāno veneyyānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:178_3: Atha vā etadantogadhattā sabbesaṃ suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāvisesānaṃ ettāvatā hārānaṃ daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a0:179_0: Tathā hi ye keci suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāpakārā niddisīyanti.
atk-s0519a0:179_8: Tathā suttassa payojanaṃ piṇḍattho padattho anusandhi codanā parihāro ca atthaṃ vadantena vattabbāti.
atk-s0519a0:180_0: Tathā tisso kathā ekanāḷikā caturassā nisinnavattikā.
atk-s0519a0:180_1: Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṃ ekanāḷikā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:181_0: Paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā paṭipakkhassa upamaṃ dassetvā sapakkhaṃ dassetvā sapakkhassa upamaṃ dassetvā kathanaṃ caturassā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:182_0: Visabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānaṃ gantvā puna sabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānagamanaṃ nisinnavattikā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:183_0: Bhedakathāya tatvakathāya pariyāyavacanehi ca suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbanti ca evamādayo.
atk-s0519a0:184_0: Nayānaṃ pana yasmā ugghaṭitaññuādayo tayo eva veneyyā saccābhisamayabhāgino tadatthāya ca atthanayadesanā,
atk-s0519a0:184_1: tasmā satipi saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ yathāvuttamūlapadabhedato vaḍḍhetvā vibhajitabbappakāre tathā mūlapadāni
atk-s0519a0:184_3: Navasu navasu eva hi mūlapadesu sabbesaṃ saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ antogadhabhāvato na tāni vaḍḍhetabbāni
atk-s0519a0:184_4: veneyyattayādhikārato na hāpetabbānīti nayānaṃ etaparamatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a0:185_0: Kammanayānaṃ pana ālocanasamānayanato aññassa pakārantarassa asambhavato etaparamatā.
atk-s0519a0:185_8: Paccayadhammo kusalo akusalo saddo ariyamaggoti pañcavidho.
atk-s0519a0:185_9: Tathā sabhāgahetu asabhāgahetu ajjhattikahetu bāhirahetu janakahetu pariggāhakahetu sādhāraṇahetu asādhāraṇahetu
atk-s0519a0:185_10: samanantarahetu paramparahetu sahajātahetu asahajātahetu sāsavahetu anāsavahetūtiādinā anekavidho cāti
atk-s0519a0:186_1: Adhigantabbatopi sampāpakahetuvasena phalapariyāyo labbhatīti nibbattetabbaadhigantabbabhāvato duvidhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:187_0: Bhūmīti sāsavabhūmi anāsavabhūmi saṅkhatabhūmi asaṅkhatabhūmi dassanabhūmi bhāvanābhūmi puthujjanabhūmi
atk-s0519a0:187_1: sekkhabhūmi asekkhabhūmi sāvakabhūmi paccekabuddhabhūmi sammāsambuddhabhūmi jhānabhūmi asamāhitabhūmi
atk-s0519a0:187_2: paṭipajjamānabhūmi paṭipannabhūmi paṭhamābhūmi yāva catutthībhūmi kāmāvacarabhūmi yāva lokuttarabhūmīti
atk-s0519a0:187_11: Sekkhabhūmi cattāro ariyamaggadhammā heṭṭhimā ca tayo phaladhammā.
atk-s0519a0:187_18: Paṭhamādibhūmiyo saha phalena cattāro maggā apariyāpannā dhammā “paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā”tiādivacanato.
atk-s0519a0:187_20: Ye ca dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ hāranayānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāvena suttesu niddhārīyanti,
atk-s0519a0:188_2: Yañca sandhāya sutte “dukkhūpanisā saddhā saddhūpanisaṃ ‘sīla’nti yāva vimuttūpanisaṃ vimuttiñāṇadassana”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:188_3: Api ca upanisāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye siddhante hadayabhūtaṃ abbhantaraṃ vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:188_5: yaṃ sammā pariggaṇhantā dhammakathikā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatadhammamukhena sabbahāranayayojanāya samatthā honti.
atk-s0519a0:189_5: ayañca attho desanāhāravicayahāraniddesavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārato pakāsito eva.
atk-s0519a0:190_0: Sabhāgavisabhāgadhammā ca tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anukūlapaṭikūladhammā yathākkamaṃ veditabbā. Yathā –
atk-s0519a0:190_2: micchāsaṅkappo visabhāgoti iminā nayena sabbaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgato veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:191_0: Lakkhaṇanti sabhāvo. So hāranayānaṃ niddese vibhāvito eva.
atk-s0519a0:192_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ hetuādivisesavinimuttaṃ hāranayānaṃ yojanānibandhanaṃ, so nayo. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a0:192_1: lakkhaṇahāre “evaṃ ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kiccato ca lakkhaṇato ca sāmaññato cā”tiādi.
atk-s0519a0:192_2: Tathā vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabbāti.
atk-s0519a0:193_0: Evaṃ hetuphalādīni upadhāretvā nesaṃ vasena tattha tattha sutte labbhamānapadatthaniddhāraṇamukhena yathālakkhaṇaṃ ete hārā nayā ca yojetabbā.
atk-s0519a0:195_0: Ettāvatā ca hetvādī, veditabbā hi viññunā”ti.
atk-s0519a0:200_1: Evaṃ hārādayo sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gāthābandhavasena sarūpato niddisitvā idāni tesu hāre tāva paṭiniddesavasena
atk-s0519a0:200_6: paṭiniddesassa pana visayaṃ dassento “assādādīnavatā”ti gāthaṃ ekadesena paccāmasati.
atk-s0519a0:200_8: Tattha pubbāpekkhatte “katamo desanāhāro”ti pucchitvā “assādādīnavatā”ti sarūpato dassitassa nigamanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:200_9: Parāpekkhatte pana “ayaṃ desanāhāro kiṃ desayatī”ti desanākiriyāya kattuniddeso hoti.
atk-s0519a0:201_3: “Kattha pana āgate assādādike ayaṃ hāro saṃvaṇṇetī”ti anuyogaṃ manasikatvā desanāhārena saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammaṃ dassento “dhammaṃ vo,
atk-s0519a0:201_5: desessāmī”tiādikaṃ sabbapariyattidhammasaṅgāhakaṃ bhagavato chachakkadesanaṃ ekadesena dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:204_2: Atha vā saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhantīti bhikkhū.
atk-s0519a0:204_4: Tena te dhammassavane niyojento attano mukhābhimukhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0519a0:204_6: Tena nāhaṃ dhammissaratāya tumhe aññaṃ kiñci kāreyyāmi,
atk-s0519a0:204_7: anāvaraṇañāṇena sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ paccakkhakāritāya pana dhammaṃ desessāmīti idāni pavattiyamānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0519a0:205_9: Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ brahmūnaṃ vā seṭṭhānaṃ ariyānaṃ cariyaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsayissāmi paridīpayissāmīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:206_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā desito pakāsito ca sāsanadhammo yesaṃ assādādīnaṃ dassanavasena pavatto,
atk-s0519a0:206_1: te assādādayo desanāhārassa visayabhūtā yattha yattha pāṭhe savisesaṃ vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:206_2: tato tato niddhāretvā udāharaṇavasena idhānetvā dassetuṃ “tattha katamo assādo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:206_5: Tassa cetaṃ samijjhatīti tassa kāmayamānassa sattassa taṃ kāmasaṅkhātaṃ vatthu samijjhati ce,
atk-s0519a0:206_6: sace so taṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:206_7: Addhā pītimano hotīti ekaṃsena tuṭṭhacitto hoti.
atk-s0519a0:206_13: Ayaṃ assādoti yāyaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanā icchitalābhe pītimanatā somanassaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:207_0: Tassa ce kāmayānassāti tassa puggalassa kāme icchamānassa,
atk-s0519a0:207_4: Te kāmā parihāyantīti te vatthukāmā kenaci antarāyena vinassanti ce.
atk-s0519a0:207_5: Sallaviddhova ruppatīti atha ayomayādinā sallena viddho viya pīḷiyatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:207_6: Ayaṃ ādīnavoti yāyaṃ kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā kāmayānassa sattassa ruppanā domanassuppatti,
atk-s0519a0:208_0: Yo kāme parivajjetīti yo bhikkhu yathāvutte kāme tattha chandarāgassa vikkhambhanena vā samucchindanena vā sabbabhāgena vajjeti.
atk-s0519a0:208_3: yathā koci puriso jīvitukāmo kaṇhasappaṃ paṭipathe passitvā attano pādena tassa siraṃ parivajjeti, somaṃ…pe…
atk-s0519a0:208_4: samativattatīti so bhikkhu sabbaṃ lokaṃ visaritvā ṭhitattā loke visattikāsaṅkhātaṃ imaṃ taṇhaṃ satimā hutvā samatikkamatīti.
atk-s0519a0:208_5: Idaṃ nissaraṇanti yadidaṃ visattikāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nibbānārammaṇena ariyamaggena samativattanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:209_2: Hiraññaṃ vāti kahāpaṇasaṅkhātaṃ suvaṇṇasaṅkhātañca hiraññaṃ. Vā-
atk-s0519a0:209_5: Gavāssanti gāvo ca asse cāti gavāssaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:209_6: Dāsaporisanti dāse ca porise cāti dāsaporisaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:209_9: Puthū kāmeti aññepi vā manāpiyarūpādike bahū kāmaguṇe.
atk-s0519a0:209_10: Yo naro anugijjhatīti yo satto anu anu abhikaṅkhati patthetīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:210_0: Abalā naṃ balīyantīti khettādibhede kāme anugijjhantaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ kusalehi pahātabbattā abalasaṅkhātā kilesā balīyanti abhibhavanti,
atk-s0519a0:210_1: saddhābalādivirahena vā abalaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ abalā kilesā balīyanti,
atk-s0519a0:210_3: Maddantenaṃ parissayāti enaṃ kāmagiddhaṃ kāme pariyesantaṃ rakkhantañca sīhādayo ca pākaṭaparissayā kāyaduccaritādayo ca apākaṭaparissayā maddanti.
atk-s0519a0:210_5: dakanti tato tehi pākaṭāpākaṭaparissayehi abhibhūtaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ samudde bhinnanāvaṃ udakaṃ viya anveti anugacchatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:211_0: Tasmāti yasmā kāmagiddhassa vuttanayena dukkhānubandho vijjati, tasmā.
atk-s0519a0:211_2: Sadā satoti pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogena sato hutvā.
atk-s0519a0:211_3: Kāmāni parivajjayeti vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca rūpādīsu vatthukāmesu sabbappakāraṃ kilesakāmaṃ anuppādento kāmāni parivajjaye pajaheyya.
atk-s0519a0:211_4: Te pahāya tare oghanti evaṃ te kāme pahāya tappahānakaraariyamaggeneva catubbidhampi oghaṃ tareyya,
atk-s0519a0:211_6: Nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragūti yathā puriso udakaggahaṇena garubhāraṃ nāvaṃ udakaṃ bahi siñcitvā lahukāya nāvāya appakasireneva pāragū bhaveyya,
atk-s0519a0:211_8: evameva attabhāvanāvaṃ kilesūdakagarukaṃ siñcitvā lahukena attabhāvena pāragū bhaveyya,
atk-s0519a0:211_9: pāraṃ nibbānaṃ arahattappattiyā gaccheyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānenāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:211_10: Idaṃ nissaraṇanti yaṃ kāmappahānamukhena caturoghaṃ taritvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:212_2: Rakkhati dhammacārinti yo taṃ dhammaṃ appamatto carati,
atk-s0519a0:212_3: taṃ dhammacāriṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhedena duvidhatopi anatthato rakkhati pāleti.
atk-s0519a0:212_4: Chattaṃ mahantaṃ yatha vassakāleti vassakāle deve vassante yathā mahantaṃ chattaṃ kusalena purisena dhāritaṃ taṃ vassatemanato rakkhati.
atk-s0519a0:212_5: Tattha yathā taṃ chattaṃ appamatto hutvā attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ chādentañca vassādito rakkhati,
atk-s0519a0:212_6: evaṃ dhammopi attasammāpaṇidhānena appamatto hutvā dhammacariyāya attānaṃ rakkhantaṃyeva rakkhatīti adhippāyo. Esā…pe…
atk-s0519a0:212_9: Idaṃ phalanti diṭṭhadhammikehi samparāyikehi ca anatthehi yadidaṃ dhammassa rakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ rakkhāvasānassa ca abbhudayassa nipphādanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:212_10: idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ anāmasitvā desanāya nibbattetabbatāya phalanti.
atk-s0519a0:213_4: Yadā paññāya passatīti yasmiṃ kāle vipassanaṃ ussukkāpento anattānupassanāsaṅkhātāya paññāya passati.
atk-s0519a0:213_5: Atha nibbindati dukkheti atha anattānupassanāya pubbe eva aniccatādukkhatānaṃ suparidiṭṭhattā nibbidānupassanāvasena
atk-s0519a0:213_7: Esa maggo visuddhiyāti yā vuttalakkhaṇā nibbidānupassanā sabbakilesavisujjhanato visuddhisaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a0:213_8: ariyamaggassa accantavisuddhiyā vā amatadhātuyā maggo upāyo.
atk-s0519a0:213_9: Ayaṃ upāyoti yadidaṃ anattānupassanāmukhena sabbasmiṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ nibbindanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:214_2: yathā cakkhumā puriso sarīre vahante visamāni bhūmippadesāni caṇḍatāya vā visame hatthiādayo parivajjeti,
atk-s0519a0:214_3: evaṃ loke sappañño puriso sappaññatāya hitāhitaṃ jānanto pāpāni lāmakāni duccaritāni parivajjeyyāti.
atk-s0519a0:214_4: Ayaṃ āṇattīti yā ayaṃ “pāpāni parivajjetabbānī”ti dhammarājassa bhagavato āṇā,
atk-s0519a0:215_0: Evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ suttesu āgatā phalūpāyāṇattiyo udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā idāni tā ekato āgatā dassetuṃ “suññato”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0519a0:216_2: sabbampi saṅkhāralokaṃ avasavattitāsallakkhaṇavasena vā tucchabhāvasamanupassanavasena vā suññoti passā”ti
atk-s0519a0:216_4: Sabbadā satikiriyāya taṃsuññatādassanaṃ sampajjatīti “sadā satoti upāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:216_5: Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccāti vīsativatthukaṃ sakkāyadassanaṃ uddharitvā samucchinditvā.
atk-s0519a0:216_7: Idaṃ phalanti yaṃ evaṃ vuttena vidhinā maccutaraṇaṃ maccuno visayātikkamanaṃ tassa yaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāpaṭipajjanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:216_9: Yathā pana assādādayo sutte katthaci sarūpato katthaci niddhāretabbatāya katthaci visuṃ visuṃ katthaci ekato dassitā,
atk-s0519a0:216_11: Phalādayo pana sabbattha sutte gāthāsu vā ekato dassetabbāti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
atk-s0519a0:216_12: udāharitvāpi puna “suññato loka”ntiādinā ekato udāharaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:217_1: Evaṃ assādādayo udāharaṇavasena sarūpato dassetvā idāni tattha puggalavibhāgena desanāvibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:218_0: Tattha ugghaṭitaṃ ghaṭitamattaṃ uddiṭṭhamattaṃ yassa niddesapaṭiniddesā na katā,
atk-s0519a0:218_5: Dhammo hi desiyamāno desakato desanābhājanaṃ saṅkamanto viya hoti,
atk-s0519a0:218_8: Sassatādiākārassa hi veneyyānaṃ āsayassa buddhāveṇikā dhammadesanā taṅkhaṇapatitā eva calanāya hoti,
atk-s0519a0:218_10: tatthāyaṃ ugghaṭite calitamatteyeva āsaye dhammaṃ jānāti avabujjhatīti ugghaṭitaññū,
atk-s0519a0:218_14: vipañcitaṃ vā mandaṃ saṇikaṃ dhammaṃ jānātīti vipañcitaññū,
atk-s0519a0:218_17: Netabbo dhammassa paṭiniddisena atthaṃ pāpetabboti neyyo,
atk-s0519a0:218_18: mudindriyatāya vā paṭilomaggahaṇato netabbo anunetabboti neyyo,
atk-s0519a0:218_19: tassa neyyassa assādaṃ ādīnavaṃ nissaraṇañca desayati,
atk-s0519a0:219_1: Yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti.
atk-s0519a0:220_1: Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti.
atk-s0519a0:221_1: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato evaṃ anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti.
atk-s0519a0:222_0: Padaparamo panettha nettiyaṃ paṭivedhassa abhājananti na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:222_6: assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañcāti ete satta paṭṭhānanayā.
atk-s0519a0:223_2: Na hi kevalena assādena ādīnavena tadubhayena vā kathitena veneyyavinayanaṃ sambhavati,
atk-s0519a0:223_5: Na hi vimuttirasā bhagavato desanā vimuttiṃ tadupāyañca anāmasantī pavattati.
atk-s0519a0:223_7: Sace pana padaparamassa puggalassa vasena pavattaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ tadubhayabhāge ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0519a0:223_8: desanaṃ suttekadesaṃ gāthaṃ vā tādisaṃ etesaṃ nayānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena uddharati,
atk-s0519a0:223_9: evaṃ sati sattannampi nayānaṃ gahaṇaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0519a0:223_10: Veneyyavinayanaṃ pana tesaṃ santāne ariyamaggassa uppādanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:225_0: Yāni karoti puriso, tāni attani passati;
atk-s0519a0:233_3: yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti anaññā…pe…
atk-s0519a0:240_0: Tattha katamo assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañca?
atk-s0519a0:241_0: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
atk-s0519a0:242_0: Tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyoti. ;
atk-s0519a0:243_0: Ayaṃ assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:243_1: Tasmā tepi nayā idha niddhāretvā veditabbā.
atk-s0519a0:243_3: Yasmā peṭake “tattha katamaṃ phalañca upāyo ca?
atk-s0519a0:246_0: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā rahoti. ;
atk-s0519a0:248_0: Tattha katamo upāyo ca āṇatti ca?
atk-s0519a0:250_0: Yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena, jitañca rakkhe anivesano siyā”ti. ;
atk-s0519a0:251_3: so ugghaṭitaññūtiādinā yathā desanāvibhāgena puggalavibhāgasiddhi hoti,
atk-s0519a0:251_4: evaṃ ugghaṭitaññussa bhagavā nissaraṇaṃ desetītiādinā puggalavibhāgena desanāvibhāgo sambhavatīti so tathā dassito.
atk-s0519a0:252_0: Evaṃ yesaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena desanāvibhāgo dassito,
atk-s0519a0:252_1: te puggale paṭipadāvibhāgena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “catasso paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:252_2: Tattha paṭipadābhiññākato vibhāgo paṭipadākato hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:252_4: Tā panetā ca samathavipassanāpaṭipattivasena duvidhā honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0519a0:252_5: Samathapakkhe tāva paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0519a0:252_7: Upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā tāva pavattā paññā “abhiññā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:253_0: Sā panāyaṃ paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammasamudācāragahaṇatāya kicchā asukhasevanāti attho,
atk-s0519a0:253_2: Abhiññāpi ekaccassa dandhā hoti mandā asīghappavatti,
atk-s0519a0:253_4: Tasmā yo ādito kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti,
atk-s0519a0:253_6: Yo pana vikkhambhitakileso appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a0:253_10: Yo kilese vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti,
atk-s0519a0:254_0: Vipassanāpakkhe pana yo rūpārūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggahetvā upādārūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti arūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti,
atk-s0519a0:254_1: rūpārūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0519a0:254_3: Pariggahitarūpārūpassa pana vipassanāparivāse maggapātubhāvadandhatāya dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a0:254_4: Yopi rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapento dukkhena kasirena kilamanto vavatthapeti,
atk-s0519a0:254_5: vavatthapite ca nāmarūpe vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0519a0:254_6: Tassāpi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a0:255_0: Aparo nāmarūpampi vavatthapetvā paccaye pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggaṇhāti,
atk-s0519a0:255_1: paccaye ca pariggahetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0519a0:255_2: Evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a0:256_0: Aparo paccayepi pariggahetvā lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0519a0:256_1: paṭividdhalakkhaṇo ca vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0519a0:256_2: Evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a0:257_0: Aparo lakkhaṇānipi paṭivijjhitvā vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre suppasanne vahante uppannaṃ vipassanānikantiṃ
atk-s0519a0:257_2: nikantiñca pariyādiyitvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0519a0:257_3: Evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a0:257_5: Vipassanāpakkhikā eva panettha catasso paṭipadā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a0:258_1: Taṃ pana paṭipadāvibhāgaṃ saddhiṃ hetupāyaphalehi dassetuṃ “taṇhācarito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:260_2: Yasmā taṇhācaritatāya pubbabhāge kosajjābhibhavena na vīriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:260_8: Taṇhācaritatāya cassa kilesavikkhambhanaṃ na sukaranti dukkhā paṭipadā,
atk-s0519a0:260_9: avisadañāṇatāya dandhābhiññāti pubbe vuttanayaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:261_2: Paññāsahāyapaṭilābhena cassa samādhi tikkho hoti sampayuttesu ādhipaccaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0519a0:261_6: Samādhipadhānattā jhānānaṃ jhānehi nissayehīti ayaṃ viseso.
atk-s0519a0:261_8: Diṭṭhicarito aniyyānikamaggampi niyyānikanti maññamāno tattha ussāhabahulattā vīriyādhiko hoti.
atk-s0519a0:261_9: Vīriyādhikatāyeva cassa kilesavikkhambhanaṃ sukaranti sukhā paṭipadā,
atk-s0519a0:261_10: avisadañāṇatāya pana dandhābhiññāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “diṭṭhicarito mando”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:262_1: Ariyasaccāni hi lokiyāni pubbabhāgañāṇassa sammasanaṭṭhānatāya lokuttarāni adhimuccanatāya maggañāṇassa abhisamayaṭṭhānatāya ca nissayāni hontīti.
atk-s0519a0:262_5: Itare dvepi vipañcitaññūti evaṃ yena veneyyattayena pubbe desanāvibhāgo dassito,
atk-s0519a0:262_6: tadeva veneyyattayaṃ iminā paṭipadāvibhāgena dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:263_0: Idāni taṃ veneyyupuggalavibhāgaṃ atthanayayojanāya visayaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “ubho taṇhācaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:263_1: Taṇhāya samādhipaṭipakkhattā taṇhācarito visujjhamāno samādhimukhena visujjhatīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:263_3: “Samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti vacanato pana sammādiṭṭhisahiteneva sammāsamādhinā niyyānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:264_1: tadapadesena cettha samādhi vuccati “yathā cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti.
atk-s0519a0:264_6: Yathā hi lokiyakathāyaṃ saññā cittañca desanāsīsaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a0:264_9: evaṃ lokuttarakathāyaṃ paññā samādhi ca. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a0:264_11: Tesu idha rāgassa ujuvipaccanīkato samathapubbaṅgamatāvacanato ca cetoggahaṇena samādhi vutto.
atk-s0519a0:264_14: Ceto ca taṃ vimutti cāti cetovimutti.
atk-s0519a0:264_15: Atha vā vuttappakārasseva cetaso paṭipakkhato vimutti vimokkhoti cetovimutti,
atk-s0519a0:264_16: cetasi vā phalaviññāṇe vuttappakārāva vimuttīti cetovimutti,
atk-s0519a0:264_17: cetaso vā phalaviññāṇassa paṭipakkhato vimutti vimokkho etasminti cetovimutti,
atk-s0519a0:264_19: Paññāvimuttiyāti etthāpi ayaṃ nayo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
atk-s0519a0:265_0: Diṭṭhiyā savisaye paññāsadisī pavattīti diṭṭhicarito visujjhamāno paññāmukhena visujjhatīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:265_3: Samathaggahaṇena tappaṭipakkhato taṇhaṃ vipassanāggahaṇena avijjañca niddhāretvā paṭhamanayassa bhūmiṃ sakkā sukhena dassetunti āha –
atk-s0519a0:266_0: Tattha samathapubbaṅgamā paṭipadāti purimā dve paṭipadā,
atk-s0519a0:266_4: Vipassanāya aniccadukkhaanattasaññābhāvato dukkhasaññāparivārattā ca asubhasaññāya imā catasso saññā dassitā honti.
atk-s0519a0:266_5: Tappaṭipakkhena ca cattāro vipallāsāti sakalassa sīhavikkīḷitanayassa bhūmiṃ sukhena sakkā dassetunti āha –
atk-s0519a0:267_1: Evaṃ paṭipadāvibhāgena veneyyapuggalavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ ñāṇavibhāgena dassento yasmā bhagavato desanā yāvadeva veneyyavinayanatthā,
atk-s0519a0:267_2: vinayanañca nesaṃ sutamayādīnaṃ tissannaṃ paññānaṃ anukkamena nibbattanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:267_4: tasmā imassa hārassa samuṭṭhitappakāraṃ tāva pucchitvā yena puggalavibhāgadassanena desanābhājanaṃ vibhajitvā
atk-s0519a0:267_5: tattha desanāyaṃ desanāhāraṃ niyojetukāmo taṃ dassetuṃ “svāyaṃ hāro kattha sambhavatī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:268_0: Tattha yassāti yo so aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vimutto sotāvadhānapariyosānāhi ca sampattīti samannāgato yassa.
atk-s0519a0:268_2: Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo,
atk-s0519a0:268_7: Sabrahmacārīti brahmaṃ vuccati seṭṭhaṭṭhena sakalaṃ satthusāsanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:268_8: Samaṃ saha vā brahmaṃ carati paṭipajjatīti sabrahmacārī.
atk-s0519a0:268_9: Saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā yo evarūpassa dhammassa desetā”ti tathāgate,
atk-s0519a0:268_10: “svākkhāto vatāyaṃ dhammo yo evaṃ ekantaparipuṇṇo ekantaparisuddho”tiādinā dhamme ca saddhaṃ labhati uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:269_3: Sā hi yathāvuttavīmaṃsane saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā ussahanavasena ussāhanā,
atk-s0519a0:269_8: Ussāhanāti vīriyena upatthambhitā dhammassa dhāraṇaparicayasādhikā paññā.
atk-s0519a0:269_10: desanāya vā desanantaraṃ tulayitvā saṃsanditvā gahaṇapaññā.
atk-s0519a0:269_11: Upaparikkhāti mahāpadese otāretvā pāḷiyā pāḷiatthassa ca upaparikkhaṇapaññā.
atk-s0519a0:269_23: Tathāti yathā sutamayī paññā vīmaṃsādipariyāyavatī vīmaṃsādivibhāgavatī ca,
atk-s0519a0:269_25: Yathā vā sutamayī oramattikā anavaṭṭhitā ca,
atk-s0519a0:270_0: Sutena nissayenāti sutena pariyattidhammena pariyattidhammassavanena vā upanissayena itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:270_5: ime pañcakkhandhā”ti tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvavīmaṃsanabhūtā paññā vīmaṃsā.
atk-s0519a0:270_6: Tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ vacanatthaṃ muñcitvā sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa tulayitvā viya gahaṇapaññā tulanā.
atk-s0519a0:270_7: Tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ avijahitvā aniccatādiruppanasappaccayādiākāre ca takketvā vitakketvā ca upaparikkhaṇapaññā upaparikkhā,
atk-s0519a0:270_8: tathā upaparikkhite dhamme saviggahe viya upaṭṭhahante evametehi nijjhānakkhame katvā cittena anu anu pekkhaṇā manasānupekkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a0:270_9: Ettha ca yathā sutamayī paññā yathāsutassa dhammassa dhāraṇaparicayavasena pavattanato ussāhajātā “ussāhanā”ti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0519a0:270_10: na evaṃ cintāmayīti idha “ussāhanā”ti padaṃ na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:271_0: Imāhi dvīhi paññāhīti yathāvuttāhi dvīhi paññāhi kāraṇabhūtāhi.
atk-s0519a0:271_6: sampa ādanena vipassanaṃ ussukkantassa yaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhisaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0519a0:271_8: Taṃ pana dassanaṃ bhāvanāti duvidhanti āha –
atk-s0519a0:271_13: paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato pana “dassana”nti vuttanti saphalo paṭhamamaggo dassanabhūmi.
atk-s0519a0:272_1: Idāni imā tisso paññā pariyāyantarena dassetuṃ “paratoghosā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:272_6: Atha vā parato ghoso etissāti paratoghosā, yā paññā,
atk-s0519a0:272_8: Paccattasamuṭṭhitāti paccattaṃ tassa tassa attani sambhūtā.
atk-s0519a0:272_9: Yonisomanasikārāti tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvapariggaṇhanādinā yathāvuttena upāyena pavattamanasikārā.
atk-s0519a0:273_2: Tattha imā dveti gaṇanavasena vatvā puna tā sutamayī cintāmayī cāti sarūpato dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:273_3: Ayaṃ ugghaṭitaññūti ayaṃ sutamayacintāmayañāṇehi āsayapayogapabodhassa nipphāditattā uddesamatteneva jānanato “ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:273_4: Ayaṃ vipañcitaññūti cintāmayañāṇena āsayassa aparikkhatattā uddesaniddesehi jānanato vipañcitaññū.
atk-s0519a0:273_5: Ayaṃ neyyoti sutamayañāṇassāpi abhāvato niravasesaṃ vitthāradesanāya netabbato neyyo.
atk-s0519a0:274_1: Evaṃ desanāpaṭipadāñāṇavibhāgehi desanābhājanaṃ veneyyattayaṃ vibhajitvā idāni tattha pavattitāya bhagavato
atk-s0519a0:274_2: dhammadesanāya desanāhāraṃ niddhāretvā yojetuṃ “sāyaṃ dhammadesanā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:275_3: desessāmī”tiādinā paṭiniddesavārassa ādito desanāhārassa visayabhāvena nikkhittā pāḷi,
atk-s0519a0:275_5: Kiṃ desayatīti kathetukamyatāvasena desanāya piṇḍatthaṃ pucchitvā taṃ gaṇanāya paricchinditvā sāmaññato dasseti “cattāri saccānī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:275_8: Pavattipavattakanivattitadupāyavimuttassa neyyassa abhāvato cattāri aviparītabhāvena saccānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:275_9: Tāni “dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ magga”nti sarūpato dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:276_0: Tattha anekupaddavādhiṭṭhānabhāvena kucchitattā bālajanaparikappitadhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahena tucchattā ca dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:276_3: etasmiṃ vā adhigate saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvotipi nirodho,
atk-s0519a0:276_10: Evaṃ yasmiṃ sutte cattāri saccāni sarūpato āgatāni,
atk-s0519a0:276_12: Yattha pana sutte cattāri saccāni sarūpato na āgatāni,
atk-s0519a0:276_13: tattha atthato cattāri saccāni uddharitvā tesaṃ vasena assādādayo niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0519a0:276_17: tattha atthato uddharitvā tesaṃ vasena cattāri saccāni niddhāretabbāni.
atk-s0519a0:276_18: Idha pana assādādayo udāharaṇavasena sarūpato dassitāti tehi saccāni niddhāretuṃ “ādīnavo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:277_0: Tattha “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti vacanato taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:277_5: Assādoti taṇhāvipallāsānampi icchitattā te sandhāya “assādo samudayo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:277_6: Saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo desanā ca desanāphalādhigamassa upāyoti katvā “upāyo āṇatti ca maggo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:277_9: Yathā hi saccavibhaṅge “taṇhā avasiṭṭhā kilesā avasiṭṭhā akusalā dhammā sāsavāni kusalamūlāni sāsavā
atk-s0519a0:277_10: ca kusalā dhammā samudayasaccabhāvena vibhattā”ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ naye taṃtaṃavasiṭṭhā tebhūmakadhammā
atk-s0519a0:277_14: Idaṃ dhammacakkanti yāyaṃ bhagavato catusaccavasena sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā,
atk-s0519a0:278_0: Idāni tassā dhammadesanāya dhammacakkabhāvaṃ saccavibhaṅgasuttavasena dassetuṃ “yathāha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:278_1: Tattha idaṃ dukkhanti idaṃ jātiādivibhāgaṃ saṅkhepato pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ taṇhāvajjaṃ tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ
atk-s0519a0:278_2: dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvena dukkhadukkhādibhāvena ca dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:278_6: Migānaṃ tattha abhayassa dinnattā migadāyanti ca laddhanāme assame.
atk-s0519a0:278_11: Kiñcāpi bhagavato dhammadesanā anekāsu devamanussaparisāsu anekasatakkhattuṃ tesaṃ ariyasaccappaṭivedhasampādanavasena pavattitā,
atk-s0519a0:278_12: tathāpi sabbapaṭhamaṃ aññāsikoṇḍaññappamukhāya aṭṭhārasaparimāṇāya brahmakoṭiyā catusaccappaṭivedhavibhāvanīyā dhammadesanā,
atk-s0519a0:279_0: Tattha satipaṭṭhānādidhammo eva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:279_2: Dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:279_7: Appaṭivattiyanti dhammissarassa bhagavato sammāsambuddhabhāvato dhammacakkassa ca anuttarabhāvato appaṭisedhanīyaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:280_2: aparimāṇā akkharāti uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ yebhuyyena padasaṅgahitāni akkharānīti dassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:280_3: Padā akkharā byañjanāti liṅgavipallāso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:280_10: imināpi imināpi pakārena idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ veditabbanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:280_11: Tena jātiādibhedena yathāvuttassa dukkhasaccassa anekabhedataṃ taṃdīpakānaṃ akkharapadādīnaṃ vuttappakāraṃ aparimāṇatañca samattheti.
atk-s0519a0:281_0: Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti ayaṃ kāmataṇhādibhedā taṇhāvaṭṭassa mūlabhūtā yathāvuttassa dukkhassa nibbattihetubhāvato dukkhasamudayo.
atk-s0519a0:281_1: Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti ayaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭā asaṅkhatadhātu yathāvuttassa dukkhassa anuppādanirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodho.
atk-s0519a0:281_2: Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādiaṭṭhaṅgasamūho dukkhanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:281_3: gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhībhūtattā paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyāti dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā.
atk-s0519a0:282_0: Evaṃ “dvādasa padāni sutta”nti gāthāya sakalassa sāsanassa channaṃ atthapadānaṃ channañca byañjanapadānaṃ vasena yā dvādasapadatā vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:282_3: desessāmī”tiādinā desanāhārassa visayadassanavasena chachakkapariyāyaṃ ekadesena uddisitvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttena
atk-s0519a0:282_4: tadatthassa saṅgahitabhāvadassanamukhena sabbassāpi bhagavato vacanassa catusaccadesanābhāvaṃ tadatthassa
atk-s0519a0:282_7: bārāṇasiya”ntiādinā saccavibhaṅgasuttaṃ uddesato dassetvā “tattha aparimāṇā padā”tiādinā byañjanatthapadāni
atk-s0519a0:282_8: vibhajanto dvādasapadabhāvaṃ dīpetvā idāni tesaṃ aññamaññavisayivisayabhāvena sambandhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a0:283_1: gahite ca pade padatthāvabodho gahitapubbasaṅketassa hoti.
atk-s0519a0:283_5: Yasmā pana akkharehi saṃkhittena dīpiyamāno attho padapariyosāne vākyassa apariyositattā padeneva pakāsito dīpito hoti,
atk-s0519a0:283_7: Vākyapariyosāne pana so attho vivarito vivaṭo kato hotīti vuttaṃ “byañjanehi vivaratī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:283_8: Yasmā ca pakārehi vākyabhede kate tadattho vibhatto nāma hoti,
atk-s0519a0:283_10: Tathā vākyāvayavānaṃ paccekaṃ nibbacanavibhāge kate so attho pākaṭo hotīti vuttaṃ “niruttīhi uttānīkarotī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:283_11: Katanibbacanehi vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ buddhinisānañca kataṃ hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:283_13: Ettha ca akkharehi eva saṅkāsetīti avadhāraṇaṃ akatvā akkharehi saṅkāsetiyevāti evaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:283_14: Evañhi sati atthapadānaṃ nānāvākyavisayatāpi siddhā hoti.
atk-s0519a0:283_16: nānānusandhike pana anusandhimhi anusandhimhi cha cha atthapadāni niddhāretabbāni.
atk-s0519a0:284_0: “Akkharehi ca padehi ca ugghaṭetī”tiādinā byañjanapadānaṃ kiccasādhanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:284_2: Aṭṭhānabhāvato pana saccappaṭivedhassa padaparamo na idha vutto.
atk-s0519a0:284_3: Neyyaggahaṇeneva vā tassāpi idha gahaṇaṃ sekkhaggahaṇena viya kalyāṇaputhujjanassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:284_10: Ugghaṭetīti sotāvadhānaṃ katvā samāhitacittānaṃ veneyyānaṃ saṅkāsanavasena akkharehi visesaṃ ādahanto yathā padapariyosāne āsayappaṭibodho hoti,
atk-s0519a0:284_11: tathā yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ saṅkhepena katheti uddisatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:285_0: Evaṃ “akkharehi saṅkāsetī”tiādinā channaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ byāpāraṃ dassetvā idāni atthapadānaṃ byāpāraṃ dassetuṃ “soyaṃ dhammavinayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:285_1: Tattha sīlādidhammo eva pariyattiatthabhūto veneyyavinayanato dhammavinayo.
atk-s0519a0:286_3: desessāmī”ti uddiṭṭhāya pāḷiyā tividhakalyāṇataṃ dassetvā idāni atthabyañjanasampattiṃ dassetuṃ “cha padāni attho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:286_5: “Tenāha bhagavā”tiādinā desanāhārassa visayabhāvena uddiṭṭhaṃ pāḷiṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:286_7: Tattha upaṭṭhitaṃ sabbavisesānanti sabbesaṃ uttarimanussadhammasaṅkhātānaṃ visesānaṃ adhisīlasikkhādivisesānaṃ vā upatiṭṭhanaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:286_8: “Idaṃ nesaṃ padakkanta”ntiādīnaṃ viya etassa saddasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0519a0:286_9: “Idaṃ vuccati tathāgatapadaṃ itipī”tiādīsu idaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ tathāgatagandhahatthino
atk-s0519a0:286_12: Tassa mahāvajirañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇadantehi ārañjitaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ ārañjanaṭṭhānantipi vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:286_14: ato aneneva kāraṇena brahmuno sabbasattuttamassa bhagavato,
atk-s0519a0:286_15: brahmaṃ vā sabbaseṭṭhaṃ cariyanti paññāyati yāvadeva manussehi suppakāsitattā yathāvuttappakārehi ñāyati.
atk-s0519a0:286_16: Tenāha bhagavāti yathāvuttatthaṃ pāḷiṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:287_0: Anupādāparinibbānatthatāya bhagavato desanāya yāvadeva ariyamaggasampāpanattho desanāhāroti dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a0:287_4: Idaṃ vacanaṃ desanāhāravibhaṅgassa yathānusandhinā sammā ṭhapitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pakaraṇaṃ saṅgāyantehi ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:287_6: Niyuttoti pāḷito assādādipadatthe niddhāretvā yojitoti attho.
atk-s0519a0:290_3: kiṃ vicinatīti ettha “vicinatī”ti etena vicayasaddassa kattuniddesataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:290_4: Kinti panatthassa hārassa visayo pucchitoti taṃ tassa visayaṃ dassetuṃ “padaṃ vicinatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:290_5: Tattha padaṃ vicinatīti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva nigamanā suttassa sabbaṃ padaṃ vicinati.
atk-s0519a0:290_6: Ayañca vicayo duvidho saddato atthato ca.
atk-s0519a0:290_27: So panāyaṃ padavicayo aviparītasabhāvaniruttisallakkhaṇeneva sampajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:290_28: Atthato pana vicayo tena tena padena vattabbaatthasaṃvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0519a0:290_30: tassa tadatthassa ca pucchādibhāvo vicetabboti imamatthaṃ dassento “pañhaṃ vicinatī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:291_0: Yasmā ca sabbo desanāhāro vicayahārassa visayo suttassa vicayoti katvā,
atk-s0519a0:291_3: Yasmā pana anugītīti ettha anurūpā gīti anugītīti ayampi attho icchito,
atk-s0519a0:291_4: tasmā viciyamānassa suttapadassa anurūpato suttantarapadānipi atthuddhāravasena vā paduddhāravasena vā
atk-s0519a0:291_5: ānetvā vicetabbānīti dassento “sabbe nava suttante vicinatī”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:292_0: Evaṃ niddesavāre vicayahāro saṅkhepato niddiṭṭhoti taṃ vibhāgena niddisitvā paṭiniddesavasena vibhajanto
atk-s0519a0:292_1: yasmā padavicayo suttassa anupadaṃ pavattetabbatāya atibhāriko na sukaro cāti taṃ anāmasitvā pañhavissajjanavicaye
atk-s0519a0:292_3: Tattha yathā kiṃ bhaveti yena pakārena so vicayo pavattetabbo,
atk-s0519a0:292_8: Āyasmāti piyavacanaṃ ajitoti bāvarībrāhmaṇassa paricārakabhūtānaṃ soḷasannaṃ aññataro.
atk-s0519a0:292_10: tassa adhigamūpāyadesanattā kiñcāpi sabbaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ “pārāyana”nti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0519a0:292_11: saṅgītikārehi pana vatthugāthānugītigāthādīhi saddhiṃ ajitasuttādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ suttānaṃ idaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0519a0:292_14: Te kira tāpasapabbajjūpagamanato pubbe pārāyanaṃ adhīyantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0519a0:292_15: Tasmā ayampi pārāyanaṃ vattetīti pārāyanikoti vutto.
atk-s0519a0:292_19: pucchanākāraṃ pana buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānaṃ katvā evamāha.
atk-s0519a0:293_0: Pucchā ca nāmesā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā vimaticchedanā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā
atk-s0519a0:293_1: ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyā vibhajjabyākaraṇīyā paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyā ṭhapanīyā dhammādhiṭṭhānā sattādhiṭṭhānāti
atk-s0519a0:293_3: Tasmā “kimayaṃ pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā”tiādinā yathāsambhavaṃ pucchā vicetabbā.
atk-s0519a0:293_7: Idha pana vimaticchedanaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ pucchaṃ udāharitvā tattha vicayanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “kenassu nivuto loko”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:294_8: Kissābhilepanaṃ brūsīti kiṃ assa lokassa abhilepanaṃ vadasi.
atk-s0519a0:295_0: Padānīti pajjati etehi atthoti padāni, vākyāni.
atk-s0519a0:295_2: Eko pañhoti yadipi cattāri padāni pucchanavasena vuttāni,
atk-s0519a0:295_3: ñātuṃ icchito pana attho eko evāti “eko pañho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:295_6: kiñcāpi nivāraṇaappakāsanaabhilepanamahābhayasaṅkhātā pucchāya gahitā cattāro ete atthā,
atk-s0519a0:295_8: loko padhānabhāvena gahitoti tabbasena ekovāyaṃ pañhoti.
atk-s0519a0:296_7: Tattha ye vimuttiparipācakehi indriyehi samannāgatā sattā,
atk-s0519a0:296_9: Pariyāpannadhammavasena lokasamaññāti ariyapuggalā idha na saṅgayhanti.
atk-s0519a0:297_0: Avijjāya nivuto lokoti caturaṅgasamannāgatena andhakārena viya rathaghaṭādidhammasabhāvappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya avijjāya nivuto paṭicchādito loko.
atk-s0519a0:297_4: Jappābhilepananti jappā taṇhā assa lokassa makkaṭālepo viya makkaṭassa abhilepanaṃ silesoti brūmi.
atk-s0519a0:297_7: Imāni cattāri padāni pucchāgāthāyaṃ vuttāni “imehī”ti vissajjanagāthāyaṃ vuttehi imehi catūhi padehi vissajjitāni.
atk-s0519a0:298_0: Idāni taṃ yathākkamaṃ pucchaṃ vissajjanañca sarūpato dassetuṃ gāthāya ca atthaṃ vivarituṃ “kenassū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:298_1: Tattha “nīvaraṇehī”ti padena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “avijjānīvaraṇā hi sabbe sattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:298_2: Ettha ca “yathāhā”tiādinā suttantaradassanena imasmiṃ pañhavissajjanavicaye anugītivicayaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:298_4: Nīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ kāmacchandādīnampi kāraṇabhāvato paṭicchādanabhāvato ca ekaṃyeva nīvaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
atk-s0519a0:298_5: na pana aññesaṃ nīvaraṇasabhāvānaṃ abhāvāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:298_6: Yathā ca avijjāya sati nīvaraṇānaṃ bhāvo,
atk-s0519a0:298_7: evaṃ avijjāya asati na santi nīvaraṇānīti dassetuṃ “sabbaso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:299_4: Etena pucchānurūpatā vissajjanassa dassitāti pubbāparavicayo vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:299_5: “Yo puggalo nīvaraṇehi nivuto”tiādinā vivicchāpamādānaṃ avijjāya paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:299_13: Ayaṃ pana anekaṃsaggāhabhāvato “niccaṃ nu kho aniccaṃ nu kho”tiādinā vividhaṃ viruddhaṃ vā icchati esatīti vivicchāti.
atk-s0519a0:299_15: Sukke dhamme na uppādiyatīti na samādāya vattati.
atk-s0519a0:299_16: Nappakāsantīti te attano santāne anuppādiyamānā kusalā dhammā taṃ puggalaṃ pakāsaṃ loke abhiññātaṃ na karontīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:299_17: Abhilimpatīti makkaṭālepo viya makkaṭaṃ dārusilādīsu purisaṃ rūpādivisaye allīyāpetīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:299_19: Evaṃ abhijappāti karitvāti evaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhāyinīti iminā kāraṇena.
atk-s0519a0:299_21: Loko abhilitto silesena makkhito viya hotīti attho.
