atk-s0519a0:300_4: Dukkhaṃ domanassanti dukkhameva vibhattanti sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tisso dukkhatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:300_5: Odhasoti kadāci attūpakkamamūlāya kadāci parūpakkamamūlāyātiādinā vibhāgena dukkhadukkhatāya muccanakā visesena rūpāvacarā.
atk-s0519a0:300_6: Tathāti odhaso kadāci karahacīti evaṃ ākaḍḍhati.
atk-s0519a0:300_12: Yasmā ca dukkhā vedanāpi saṅkhatattā aniccatādisaṅkhāradukkhasabhāvā eva,
atk-s0519a0:301_8: Tasmāti yasmā sakalalokabyāpinī sabbasaṅgāhinī ca saṅkhāradukkhatā, tasmā.
atk-s0519a0:301_12: samayantaraparicayena vā tattha saṃsayapakkhandena ekaṃseneva byākātabbattā sattādhiṭṭhānā pucchā katā,
atk-s0519a0:301_15: Pāḷiyaṃ pana nīvaraṇādīnaṃ loko ādhārabhāvena gāthāyaṃ vuttoti eko pañhoti dassitanti.
atk-s0519a0:301_17: Vissajjanavicayopi adiṭṭhajotinī vissajjanā vimaticchedinī cātiādinā pucchāvicaye vuttanayānusārena veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:302_0: Evaṃ ekādhāraṃ pucchaṃ dassetvā idāni anekādhāraṃ dassetuṃ “savanti sabbadhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:302_4: Kiṃ nivāraṇanti tesaṃ kiṃ āvaraṇaṃ kā rakkhā.
atk-s0519a0:302_5: Saṃvaraṃ brūhīti taṃ nesaṃ nīvaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaraṃ kathehi.
atk-s0519a0:302_6: Kena sotā pidhīyareti kena dhammena taṇhādisotā pidhiyyanti pacchijjantīti ayamettha padattho.
atk-s0519a0:303_0: Te dve pañhāti yadipi imissā gāthāya pucchāvasena pavattāya cattāri padāni cattāri vākyāni.
atk-s0519a0:303_1: Ñātuṃ icchitassa pana atthassa duvidhattā te dve pañhā.
atk-s0519a0:303_5: ime etāya gāthāya gahitā atthā yasmā bahūni adhikicca pavattavacanena pucchitā,
atk-s0519a0:303_10: yāhi ñātibyasanādisaṅkhātāhi pāṇavadhādīhi eva vā duggatihetubhūtāhi āpadāhi samaṃ saha,
atk-s0519a0:303_11: sabbathā vā ayaṃ loko āpanno ajjhotthaṭo.
atk-s0519a0:303_13: tassa taṃ āpannākāraṃ saṃkiliṭṭhākārañca buddhiyaṃ katvā āha –
atk-s0519a0:303_17: Vuṭṭhāti etena nimittato pavattato cāti vuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:304_8: Ettha ca cakkhādayo sotānaṃ dvārabhāvena pavattamānā upacāravasena sayaṃ savantā viya vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:304_12: Idaṃ vodānanti idaṃ “pariyuṭṭhānavighāta”nti vuttaṃ pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ vodānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:305_0: Vissajjanagāthāya sati tesaṃ nivāraṇanti vipassanāsampayuttā sati kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā tesaṃ sotānaṃ nivāraṇanti.
atk-s0519a0:305_1: Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmīti tameva satiṃ sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi.
atk-s0519a0:305_2: Paññāyete pidhīyareti rūpādīsu aniccatādipaṭivedhasādhikāya maggapaññāya ete sotā sabbaso pidhiyyanti,
atk-s0519a0:306_4: Yasmā anusayanimittaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ anusayābhāve na hotīti āha “anusayesū”tiādi.
atk-s0519a0:306_5: Idāni tamevatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento “taṃ yathā khandhavantassā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:306_6: Etthāpi sotānaṃ nivāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaraṃ pidhānañca ajānantena tattha vā saṃsayitena ekaṃsikattā dhammādhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0519a0:306_7: pucchā katāti idha pucchāvicayo vuttanayeneva vissajjanavicayo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:307_0: Ettha ca yena adhippāyena “kenassu nivuto loko”ti gāthāya satipi nivāraṇādīnaṃ catunnaṃ pucchitabbabhāve eko pañhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:307_1: Tena tāva sotānaṃyeva saṃvaro pidhānañca pucchitanti sote ekatthavasena gahetvā pucchāya ekādhiṭṭhānabhāvato eko pañhoti vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-s0519a0:307_2: Sotānaṃ vā bahubhāvato bahūti yattakā sotā,
atk-s0519a0:307_4: Yena pana adhippāyena “savanti sabbadhi sotā”ti gāthāyaṃ sote anāmasitvā saṃvarapidhānānaṃ vasena “dve pañhā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:307_5: Tena paṭhamagāthāyaṃ satipi nivāraṇādīnaṃ lokādhārabhāve lokaṃ anāmasitvā nivāraṇādīnaṃ vibhāgena cattāro
atk-s0519a0:307_6: pañhātipi vattabbanti ayaṃ nayo dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:308_0: Idāni yasmā pucchanto na kevalaṃ pubbe attanā racitaniyāmeneva pucchati,
atk-s0519a0:308_1: atha kho desanākāle vuttadhammassa anusandhiṃ gahetvāpi pucchati,
atk-s0519a0:308_2: tasmā tassa anusandhiṃ pucchāya vicetabbākāraṃ dassento “yāni sotānī”ti gāthāya anantaraṃ “paññā ceva sati cā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0519a0:308_5: yā ca sati yañca tadavasesaṃ nāmarūpaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:309_0: Vissajjanagāthāyaṃ panassa yasmā paññāsatiyo nāmeneva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a0:309_8: Tassa tassa hi viññāṇassa nirodhena saheva apubbaṃ acarimaṃ etthetaṃ uparujjhati,
atk-s0519a0:309_10: etaṃ viññāṇanirodhaṃ tassa nirodho nātivattatīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0519a0:309_11: Ayaṃ pañhe anusandhiṃ pucchatīti anantaragāthāyaṃ sotānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānānusayappahānakiccena saddhiṃ sati paññā ca vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:309_12: taṃ sutvā tappahāne paññāsatīsu tiṭṭhantīsu tāsaṃ sannissayena nāmarūpena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:309_14: Kattha nu kho imāsaṃ sanissayānaṃ paññāsatīnaṃ asesanirodhoti iminā adhippāyena ayaṃ pucchā katāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:310_1: taṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ paṭipadaṃ saha visayena dassetuṃ “tīṇi ca saccānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:310_2: Tattha saṅkhatānīti samecca sambhūya paccayehi katānīti saṅkhatāni.
atk-s0519a0:310_6: So hi kenaci paccayena na saṅkhatoti asaṅkhato.
atk-s0519a0:310_7: Saha visayena pahātabbapahāyakasabhāvesu ariyasaccesu pahāyakavibhāgamukhena pahātabbavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha samudayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:311_0: Tattha avijjāvasesāti dassanamaggena pahīnāvasesā avijjāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:311_2: saddo kāmacchando byāpādo māno uddhaccanti etthāpi yojetabbo.
atk-s0519a0:311_4: evaṃ etepi dhammā apāyagamanīyasabhāvā paṭhamamaggena pahīyanti evāti.
atk-s0519a0:311_10: Tedhātuke imāni dasa saṃyojanānīti ettha tedhātuketi saṃyojanānaṃ visayadassanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:312_2: Yaṃ panāti ettha yanti hetuatthe nipāto.
atk-s0519a0:312_3: Idaṃ khaye ñāṇanti yena ñāṇena hetubhūtena “khīṇā me jātī”ti attano jātiyā khīṇabhāvaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0519a0:312_4: idaṃ evaṃ paccavekkhaṇassa nimittabhūtaṃ arahattaphalañāṇaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a0:312_5: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātīti etthāpi yanti ānetabbaṃ “yaṃ nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:312_6: Idaṃ anuppāde ñāṇanti idhāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva arahattaphalañāṇavasena attho yojetabbo.
atk-s0519a0:312_7: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana “khaye ñāṇaṃ kilesakkhayakare ariyamagge ñāṇanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:312_8: Anuppāde ñāṇaṃ paṭisandhivasena anuppādabhūte taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesānaṃ anuppādapariyosāne uppanne ariyaphale ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:313_1: uparimesu ca tīsu maggesu uppattiyā punappunaṃ uppajjamānampi anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ viya paṭhamaphaluppattiyā
atk-s0519a0:313_4: Etena pahātabbadhammā viya dassanabhāvanāhi aggaphaluppattiyā tadavasesaphaladhammāpi anuppādanirodhena nirujjhanti.
atk-s0519a0:313_9: Sā pajānanaṭṭhena paññāti yā pubbe sotānaṃ pidhānakiccā vuttā paññā,
atk-s0519a0:313_11: Itarā pana yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāgahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ apilāpanaṭṭhena ogāhanaṭṭhena satīti.
atk-s0519a0:314_1: Evaṃ “paññā ceva sati cā”ti padassa atthaṃ vivaritvā idāni “nāmarūpa”nti padassa atthaṃ vivaranto “tattha ye pañcupādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0519a0:314_3: Nāmarūpañca vibhāgena dassento sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pākaṭanāmarūpameva vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:314_4: Taggahaṇeneva hi sahacaraṇādinā tadaññe cittacetasikā rūpadhammā ca gahitā hontīti.
atk-s0519a0:314_5: Nāmaggahaṇena cettha khandhattayameva gahitanti “nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayutta”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:314_8: Pacurajanassa pana avibhāgena gahaṇīyasabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:315_0: Gāthāya anupādisesā nibbānadhātu pucchitāti taṃ caturiddhipādamukhena ariyamaggādhigamena pattabbanti
atk-s0519a0:315_1: dassento iddhipādabhāvanāmūlabhūtāni indriyāni satipaññāhi niddhāretuṃ “tattha sati ca paññā ca cattāri
atk-s0519a0:315_3: Kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā sati sijjhantī ekantena samādhiṃ nipphādeti.
atk-s0519a0:315_7: Tathā anusayasamugghātavidhāyinī paññā sijjhamānā na vinā catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyaṃ sijjhatīti vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:316_0: Yā imesu catūsu indriyesūti imesu satiādīsu catūsu indriyesu nissayapaccayatāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtesu taṃsahajātā eva yā saddahanā.
atk-s0519a0:316_2: tassā imehi catūhi indriyehi sampayuttāti vacanaseso,
atk-s0519a0:316_3: ārammaṇe abhippasādalakkhaṇā saddhā kattukāmatāsabhāvassa chandassa visesapaccayo hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:316_7: Idaṃ pahānanti vikkhambhanappahānasādhako samādhi pahānanti vutto pajahati etenāti katvā.
atk-s0519a0:317_1: Te hi yāva bhāvanānipphatti tāva ekarasena saraṇato saṅkappetabbato ca sarasaṅkappā”ti vuttā “evaṃ me bhāvanā hotū”ti yathā icchitā,
atk-s0519a0:317_3: Tadubhayanti chandasamādhisaṅkhātañca padhānasaṅkhārasaṅkhātañca vīriyanti taṃ ubhayaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:317_4: Ubhayameva hi upacāravasena aññaṃ viya katvā “chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipāda”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:317_5: Abhinnampi hi upacāravasena bhinnaṃ viya katvā voharanti,
atk-s0519a0:318_2: Ijjhanti vā tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi,
atk-s0519a0:318_4: paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo,
atk-s0519a0:318_6: Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamūpāyoti iddhipādo.
atk-s0519a0:318_7: Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0519a0:318_8: Vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ samucchedavivekanissitaṃ nissaraṇavivekanissitañca iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:318_9: Tathā hi ayaṃ iddhipādabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:318_10: Maggakkhaṇe pana kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṃ ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti.
atk-s0519a0:319_1: kevalañcettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0519a0:319_7: Tathā hi ayaṃ paṭhamiddhipādo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati nibbānañca pakkhandati.
atk-s0519a0:319_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:319_9: Ayañhi iddhipādabhāvanānuyutto yogī yathā paṭhamo iddhipādo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati,
atk-s0519a0:319_14: yathā chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pavattito samādhi chandasamādhi.
atk-s0519a0:319_15: Evaṃ vīriyaṃ cittaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pavattito samādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti.
atk-s0519a0:320_2: atha kho sabbopīti dassetuṃ “sabbo samādhi ñāṇamūlako ñāṇapubbaṅgamo ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:320_3: Yadi evaṃ kasmā so eva vīmaṃsāsamādhīti vuttoti?
atk-s0519a0:321_0: Yathā pureti yathā samādhissa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇānuparivattibhāvena pure pubbe atītāsu jātīsu asaṅkhyeyyesupi
atk-s0519a0:321_1: saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu attano paresañca khandhaṃ khandhūpanibaddhañca duppaṭivijjhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0519a0:321_2: tathā pacchā samādhissa anāgataṃsañāṇānuparivattibhāvena anāgatāsu jātīsu asaṅkhyeyyesupi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu
atk-s0519a0:321_3: attano paresañca khandhaṃ khandhūpanibaddhañca duppaṭivijjhaṃ nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:322_0: Yathā pacchāti yathā samādhissa cetopariyañāṇānuparivattibhāvena anāgatesu sattasu divasesu parasattānaṃ cittaṃ duppaṭivijjhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0519a0:322_1: tathā pure atītesu sattasu divasesu parasattānaṃ cittaṃ duppaṭivijjhaṃ nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:322_2: Yathā divāti yathā divasabhāge sūriyālokena andhakārassa vidhamitattā cakkhumantānaṃ sattānaṃ āpāthagataṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ suviññeyyaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:322_3: Tathā rattinti tathā rattibhāge caturaṅgasamannāgatepi andhakāre vattamāne samādhissa dibbacakkhuñāṇānuparivattitāya
atk-s0519a0:323_0: Yathā rattiṃ tathā divāti yathā ca rattiyaṃ tathā divāpi atisukhumaṃ kenaci tirohitaṃ yañca atidūre,
atk-s0519a0:323_3: tathā samādhissa dibbasotañāṇānuparivattitāya saddāyatane ca netabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:323_7: Eteneva samādhissa iddhividhañāṇānuparivattitāpi vuttā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:323_8: Pañcindriyānīti iddhipādasampayuttāni sekkhassa pañcindriyāni adhippetānīti āha “kusalānī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:323_12: atha kho nāmarūpañca viññāṇahetukaṃ viññāṇassa nirodhā nirujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:324_3: Anabhinanditanti abhinandanabhūtāya taṇhāya pahīnattā eva apatthitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:324_4: Tato eva appaṭisandhikaṃ viññāṇaṃ taṃ nirujjhati.
atk-s0519a0:324_6: evaṃ nāmarūpampi viññāṇasaṅkhātassa hetuno paccayassa ca abhāvā tappaccayānaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ abhāvā ahetu appaccayaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:325_0: Evaṃ anusandhipucchampi dassetvā heṭṭhā sattādhiṭṭhānā dhammādhiṭṭhānā ca pucchā visuṃ visuṃ dassitāti
atk-s0519a0:325_1: idāni tā saha dassetuṃ “ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:325_8: puṭṭho pabrūhīti tesaṃ sekhāsekhānaṃ nipako paṇḍito tvaṃ bhagavā paṭipattiṃ puṭṭho me brūhīti.
atk-s0519a0:326_3: Sekhāsekhavipassanā pubbaṅgamappahānayogenāti sekhe asekhe vipassanāpubbaṅgamappahāne ca pucchanayogena,
atk-s0519a0:327_0: Vissajjanagāthāyaṃ kāmesu nābhigijjheyyāti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena na abhigijjheyya.
atk-s0519a0:327_1: Manasānāvilo siyāti byāpādavitakkādayo kāyaduccaritādayo ca manaso āvilabhāvakare dhamme pajahanto cittena anāvilo bhaveyya.
atk-s0519a0:327_2: Yasmā pana asekkho aniccatādivasena sabbadhammānaṃ paritulitattā kusalo sabbadhammesu kāyānupassanāsatiādīhi
atk-s0519a0:327_3: ca sato sabbakilesānaṃ bhinnattā uttamabhikkhubhāvaṃ patto ca hutvā sabbairiyāpathesu pavattati,
atk-s0519a0:328_2: bhagavato ca nepakkaṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇadassanena dīpetabbanti anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ tāva kammadvārabhedehi
atk-s0519a0:328_3: vibhajitvā sekhāsekhapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:328_4: Tena sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇadassanena tathāgatassa sekhāsekhapaṭipattidesanākosallameva vibhāveti.
atk-s0519a0:328_7: Taṃ visayaṃ dasseti “yaṃ anicce dukkhe anattani cā”ti.
atk-s0519a0:328_9: ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma uppajjamānaṃ “sabbaṃ saṅkhataṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ sabbe dhammā anattā”ti uppajjati,
atk-s0519a0:328_10: tassa pana tasmiṃ visaye yena appavatti,
atk-s0519a0:328_13: Lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanena hi bhagavato catusaccappaṭivedhaṃ sammāsambodhiñca paṇḍitā paṭijānanti.
atk-s0519a0:329_0: Aññāṇaṃ adassananti taṃ paṭighātaṃ sarūpato dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:329_9: tassa purisassa tārakarūpānaṃ dassanaṃ viya lokassa cakkhuviññāṇādīhi yathārahaṃ chaḷārammaṇajānanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:329_11: ettakāni sahassānī”tiādinā gaṇanasaṅketena ajānanaṃ viya lokassa rūpādiārammaṇaṃ kathañci jānantassāpi aniccādilakkhaṇattayānavabodhoti.
atk-s0519a0:330_0: Idāni yehi padehi bhagavatā āyasmato ajitassa sekhāsekhapaṭipadā vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:331_0: Ettha ca gedhapaṭisedhacodanāyaṃ gedhanimitto doso gedhe sati hotīti tatopi cittassa rakkhitabbatā niddhāretvā vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:331_2: tasmā “tattha yā icchā”tiādinā gedhavasena niddeso kato.
atk-s0519a0:331_3: Atha vā dosato cittassa rakkhitabbatā gāthāya dutiyapādena vuttāyevāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a0:331_5: Tathā hi uppannānuppannabhedato sammāvāyāmassa visayabhāvena sabbe saṃkilesavodānadhamme catudhā vibhajitvā
atk-s0519a0:331_6: sammappadhānamukhena sekhapaṭipadaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ “sekho abhigijjhanto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:331_7: Tattha anāvilasaṅkappoti āvilānaṃ kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ abhāvena anāvilasaṅkappo.
atk-s0519a0:332_8: Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipati.
atk-s0519a0:332_10: Vāyamatītiādīni pana cattāri padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.
atk-s0519a0:332_11: Uppannānaṃ pāpakānanti anuppannāti avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:333_1: “Katame anuppannā”tiādi akusaladhammā kusaladhammā ca yādisā anuppannā yādisā ca uppannā,
atk-s0519a0:333_3: Tattha ime anuppannāti ime kāmavitakkādayo asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vā anuppannā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:333_4: Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā nāma akusalā dhammā natthi.
atk-s0519a0:333_6: Akusalamūlānīti anusayā eva sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ mūlabhāvato evaṃ vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:333_8: Ime uppannā anusayā bhūmiladdhuppannā asamugghāṭituppannātiādiuppannapariyāyasabbhāvato nāmavasena uppannā nāma,
atk-s0519a0:333_10: Ime anuppannā kusalā dhammāti ime sotāpannassa saddhādayo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa anuppannā kusalā dhammā nāma,
atk-s0519a0:333_12: Kusalasaddo cettha bāhitikasutte viya anavajjapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:333_13: Ime uppannā kusalā dhammāti ime paṭhamamagge saddhādayo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa uppannā kusalā dhammā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:334_3: Anavajjasukhapadaṭṭhānena avikkhepena cetodukkhasannissayo vikkhepapaccayo byāpādavitakko suniggahitoti vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:334_6: Kusalesu dhammesu āraddhavīriyo parāparādhaṃ sukhena sahatīti vīriyena vihiṃsāvitakko suniggahitoti āha –
atk-s0519a0:334_9: Samādhiādīnampi yathāsakaṃpaṭipakkhappahānaṃ paññavantasseva ijjhatīti imamatthaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0519a0:335_0: Etesaṃ yathāniddhāritānaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ savisaye jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhindriyaṃ kattha daṭṭhabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:335_2: Imesañca saddhādīnaṃ sekhānaṃ indriyānaṃ nibbattiyā sabbepi sekhā dhammā matthakappattā hontīti dassento “evaṃ sekho”tiādinā sekhapaṭipadaṃ nigameti.
atk-s0519a0:336_1: Evaṃ sekhapaṭipadaṃ vibhajitvā idāni asekhapaṭipadaṃ vibhajituṃ “kusalo sabbadhammāna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:336_2: Tattha sabbadhammānanti iminā padena vuttadhamme tāva vibhajitvā tattha asekkhassa kosallaṃ dassetuṃ “loko nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:336_4: Kilesalokena bhavaloko samudāgacchatīti kāmāvacaradhammaṃ nissāya rūpārūpāvacaradhamme samudāgametīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:336_7: Indriyāni nibbattetīti sīlasamādhayo nibbedhabhāgiye katvā vimuttiparipācanīyāni saddhādīni indriyāni uppādeti.
atk-s0519a0:336_8: Indriyesu bhāviyamānesūti yathāvuttaindriyesu vaḍḍhiyamānesu rūpārūpapariggahādivasena neyyassa pariññā bhavati.
atk-s0519a0:337_2: “Sā duvidhenā”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ “yadā hi sekho”tiādinā vivarati.
atk-s0519a0:337_4: Yadā hi sekhoti cettha sikkhanasīlatāya kalyāṇaputhujjanopi sekhapadena saṅgahitoti katvā “dve dhammā
atk-s0519a0:337_7: yadā kalyāṇaputhujjano pubbabhāgasikkhaṃ sikkhanto nibbidāsahagatehi saññāmanasikārehi ñeyyaṃ parijānāti,
atk-s0519a0:337_8: tadā tassa te vipassanādhammā dassanakosallaṃ paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ gacchanti sampāpuṇanti tena saddhiṃ ghaṭenti.
atk-s0519a0:337_9: Yadā pana sotāpannādisekho vuttanayena neyyaṃ parijānāti,
atk-s0519a0:337_10: tadā tassa te vipassanādhammā bhāvanākosallaṃ gacchantīti.
atk-s0519a0:338_0: Taṃ ñāṇanti yā pubbe neyyassa pariññā vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:338_2: Pañcavidhena veditabbanti visayabhedena tassa bhedaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:338_3: Dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇe ñāṇanti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādisalakkhaṇe ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:338_4: Taṃ pana yasmā sabbaṃ neyyaṃ hetuhetuphalabhedato duvidhameva hoti,
atk-s0519a0:339_1: Yasmā panassa rūpārūpadhamme salakkhaṇato paccayato ca abhijānitvā kusalādivibhāgehi te pariggahetvā aniccādivasena jānanā hoti,
atk-s0519a0:339_4: Tattha evaṃgahitāti evaṃ aniccādito kalāpasammasanādivasena gahitā sammasitā.
atk-s0519a0:339_5: Idaṃ phalaṃ nibbattentīti idaṃ udayabbayañāṇādikaṃ phalaṃ paṭipāṭiyā uppādenti,
atk-s0519a0:339_6: nimittassa kattubhāvena upacaraṇato yathā ariyabhāvakarāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti.
atk-s0519a0:339_9: Ayaṃ atthoti ayaṃ saccānaṃ anubodhapaṭivedho attho.
atk-s0519a0:339_10: Yathā hi pariññāpaññā sammasitabbadhamme sammasanadhamme tattha sammasanākāraṃ parijānāti,
atk-s0519a0:339_11: evaṃ sammasanaphalampi parijānātīti katvā ayaṃ nayo dassito.
atk-s0519a0:340_17: Upāyoti sattānaṃ accāyike kicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanasamatthaṃ ṭhānuppattikāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:340_19: Khīṇāsavo hi sabbaso avijjāya pahīnattā paññāvepullappatto etesu āyādīsu kusaloti.
atk-s0519a0:340_20: Evaṃ asekhassa kosallaṃ ekadesena vibhāvetvā puna anavasesato dassento “mahatā kosallena samannāgato”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:341_0: Pariniṭṭhitasikkhassa asekhassa satokāritāya aññaṃ payojanaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārattha”nti.
atk-s0519a0:341_1: Idāni yathāniddiṭṭhaṃ sekhāsekhapaṭipadaṃ nigamento “imā dve cariyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:341_5: Evaṃ jānātīti evaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena yo jānāti.
atk-s0519a0:341_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ asekho sativepullappatto nippariyāyena “sato abhikkamatī”tiādinā vuccatīti.
atk-s0519a0:342_0: Ettāvatā ca mahāthero vicayahāraṃ vibhajanto ajitasuttavasena pucchāvicayaṃ vissajjanavicayañca dassetvā
atk-s0519a0:342_1: idāni suttantaresupi pucchāvissajjanavicayānaṃ nayaṃ dassento “evaṃ pucchitabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:342_9: Anugīti atthato ca byañjanato ca samānetabbāti suttantaradesanāsaṅkhātā anugīti atthato byañjanato ca saṃvaṇṇiyamānena suttena samānā sadisī kātabbā,
atk-s0519a0:343_0: Evaṃ anugītivicayaṃ dassetvā niddesavāre “suttassa yo pavicayo”ti saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ vibhajituṃ
atk-s0519a0:343_1: “suttañca pavicinitabba”nti vatvā tassa vicinanākāraṃ dassento “kiṃ idaṃ suttaṃ āhaccavacana”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:343_2: Tattha āhaccavacananti bhagavato ṭhānakaraṇāni āhacca abhihantvā pavattavacanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:343_5: Tañhi bhagavato vacanaṃ anusandhetvā pavattanato “anusandhivacana”nti vuttanti.
atk-s0519a0:343_8: Saṃkilesabhāgiyantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho paṭṭhānavāravaṇṇanāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0519a0:343_9: Yasmā pana bhagavato desanā soḷasavidhe sāsanapaṭṭhāne ekaṃ bhāgaṃ abhajantī nāma natthi,
atk-s0519a0:343_10: tasmā sopi nayo vicetabbabhāvena idha nikkhitto.
atk-s0519a0:344_0: Kuhiṃ imassa suttassāti imassa suttassa kasmiṃ padese ādimajjhapariyosānesu.
atk-s0519a0:344_1: Sabbāni saccāni passitabbānīti dukkhasaccaṃ suttassa “kuhiṃ kasmiṃ padese kasmiṃ vā pade passitabbaṃ niddhāretvā vicetuṃ,
atk-s0519a0:344_2: samudayasaccaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ maggasaccaṃ kuhiṃ passitabbaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ niddhāretvā vicetu”nti evaṃ sabbāni saccāni uddharitvā vicetabbānīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:344_3: Ādimajjhapariyosāneti evaṃ suttaṃ pavicetabbanti ādito majjhato pariyosānato ca evaṃ iminā pucchāvicayādinayena suttaṃ pavicitabbanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:344_4: Ettha ca pucchāvissajjanapubbāparānugītivicayā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpeneva dassitā.
atk-s0519a0:347_2: Tattha kiṃ yojayatīti yuttihārassa visayaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0519a0:347_5: te hi tena sātisayaṃ yāthāvato yuttiniddhāraṇena yojetabbā.
atk-s0519a0:347_8: Yasmā panāyaṃ yuttigavesanā nāma na mahāpadesena vinā,
atk-s0519a0:347_9: tasmā yuttihāraṃ vibhajanto tassa lakkhaṇaṃ tāva upadisituṃ “cattāro mahāpadesā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:348_1: buddhādayo mahante apadisitvā vuttāni mahākāraṇānīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:348_8: “Sammukhā metaṃ bhagavato suta”ntiādinā kenaci ābhatassa ganthassa dhammoti vā adhammoti vā vinicchayane kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:348_13: Dhammassa hi dve sampadāyo bhagavā sāvakā ca.
atk-s0519a0:348_15: “Evamamumhā mayāyaṃ dhammo paṭiggahito”ti apadisitabbānaṃ bhedena cattāro. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a0:348_18: Tāni padabyañjanānīti kenaci ābhatasuttassa padāni byañjanāni ca,
atk-s0519a0:349_1: Tattha yasmā bhagavato vacanaṃ ekagāthāmattampi saccavinimuttaṃ natthi,
atk-s0519a0:349_2: tasmā sutteti padassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “catūsu ariyasaccesū”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:349_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tīṇi piṭakāni suttanti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:349_4: taṃ iminā nettivacanena aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:349_6: sā ekantena rāgādikilesavūpasamaṃ vadatīti vinayetipadassa atthaṃ dassento “rāgavinaye”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:349_7: Vinayoti hi kāraṇaṃ rāgādivūpasamanimittaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a0:350_2: ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
atk-s0519a0:350_14: dhamme jāneyyāsi ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya,
atk-s0519a0:350_18: santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no asantuṭṭhiyā pavivekāya saṃvattanti no saṅgaṇikāya,
atk-s0519a0:351_1: Paṭiccasamuppādo hi ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatāti vutto.
atk-s0519a0:351_4: Ettha ca pavattiṃ nivattiṃ tadupāyañca bādhakādibhāve niyataṃ paridīpento sutte otarati nāma.
atk-s0519a0:351_5: Ekantena rāgādikilesavinayaṃ vadanto vinaye sandissati nāma.
atk-s0519a0:351_6: Tathā sassataṃ ucchedañca vajjetvā ekattanayādiparidīpanena sabhāvadhammānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvaṃ vibhāvento dhammataṃ na vilometi nāma.
atk-s0519a0:352_0: Evaṃvidho ca kāmāsavādikaṃ āsavaṃ na uppādetīti imamatthaṃ dassento “yadi catūsu ariyasaccesū”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:352_2: paṭilomato nivattīti so cattāri ariyasaccāni anupaviṭṭho kasmā idha visuṃ gahitoti?
atk-s0519a0:352_4: Idha pana visuṃ gahaṇaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayāyattavuttidassanena aniccapaccayalakkhaṇaṃ asamatthapaccayalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a0:352_5: nirīhapaccayalakkhaṇañca vibhāvetvā tesaṃ udayavantatā tato eva vayavantatā tadubhayena aniccatā udayabbayapaṭipīḷanena
atk-s0519a0:352_6: dukkhatā anattatāti tilakkhaṇasamāyogaparidīpanī sabbadiṭṭhigatakumatividdhaṃsanī anaññasādhāraṇā sāsanasampatti
atk-s0519a0:353_0: Ettha ca suttaṃ suttānulomaṃ ācariyavādo attanomatīti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:353_1: tattha suttaṃ nāma tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāni tīṇi piṭakāni.
atk-s0519a0:353_5: Attanomati nāma nayaggāhena anubuddhiyā attano paṭibhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:353_10: Ācariyavādopi suttena samento eva gahetabbo, na itaro.
atk-s0519a0:354_0: Idāni yadatthaṃ idha cattāro mahāpadesā ābhatā,
atk-s0519a0:354_2: Tattha yaṃ yanti yaṃ yaṃ atthajātañca dhammajātañca.
atk-s0519a0:354_6: Taṃ taṃ gahetabbanti saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte ābhatena kāraṇena pasaṅgena pakārena ca suttato uddharitvā saṃvaṇṇanāvasena gahetabbanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:354_7: Tena catumahāpadesāviruddhāya yuttiyā suttato atthe niddhāretvā yuttihārayojanā kātabbāti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:355_1: Idāni taṃ yuttiniddhāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “pañhaṃ pucchitenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:355_5: tattakāni padāni tadatthassekassa ñātuṃ icchitattā “eko pañho”ti vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:355_6: tāni pana ekagāthāyaṃ yadi vā sabbāni padāni yāva yadi vā ekaṃ padaṃ ekaṃ atthaṃ abhivadati,
atk-s0519a0:355_7: ekoyeva so pañhoti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yadi sabbānī”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:356_1: kenassubbhāhato lokoti ayaṃ sattaloko coro viya coraghātakena kena abhihato vadhīyatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:356_2: Kenassu parivāritoti māluvalatāya viya nissitarukkho kena loko ajjhotthaṭo.
atk-s0519a0:356_3: Kena sallena otiṇṇoti kena visapītakhurappena viya sarīrabbhantaranimuggena sallena anupaviṭṭho.
atk-s0519a0:356_4: Kissa dhūpāyitoti kissa kena kāraṇena dhūpāyito santāpito loko.
atk-s0519a0:356_8: “Vissajjetī”ti etena vissajjanato tayo pañhāti ñāyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:357_1: Tatthāti vissajjanagāthāyaṃ dutiyapāde vuttā jarā ca paṭhamapāde vuttaṃ maraṇañcāti imāni dve saṅkhatassa
atk-s0519a0:357_14: Ettha ca “ṭhitassa aññathatta”nti etena khandhappabandhassa pubbāparaviseso idha jarā,
atk-s0519a0:357_17: phusso mato”ti evaṃ loke vuttaṃ sammutimaraṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0519a0:358_0: Idāni “te tayo pañhā”ti vuttamatthaṃ yuttivasena dassetuṃ “jarāya cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:358_1: Tattha yebhuyyena jiṇṇassa maraṇadassanato jarāmaraṇānaṃ nānattaṃ asampaṭicchamānaṃ pati tesaṃ nānattadassanatthaṃ “gabbhagatāpi hi mīyantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:358_3: yathādhippetajarāvirahitassa maraṇassa dassanato aññā jarā aññaṃ maraṇanti.
atk-s0519a0:358_7: Kevalassa maraṇassa diṭṭhattā aññāva jarā aññaṃ maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:358_8: yathā taṃ devānanti imamatthaṃ dasseti “atthi ca devāna”ntiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:358_9: Anuttarimanussadhammena ca tikicchanena sakkā jarāya paṭikāraṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0519a0:358_10: na tathā maraṇassāti evampi jarāmaraṇānaṃ atthato nānattaṃ sampaṭicchitabbanti dassetuṃ “sakkatevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:358_14: Nanu ca maraṇassāpi paṭikāraṃ kātuṃ sakkā iddhipādabhāvanāya vasibhāve satīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha –
atk-s0519a0:359_1: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā,
atk-s0519a0:359_2: so ākaṅkhamāno kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0519a0:360_3: yasmiṃ tasmiñhi kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:360_4: taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ karonto kappaṃ tiṭṭhati nāma.
atk-s0519a0:360_5: “Appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vuttaṃ pana vassasatādito atirekaṃ tiṭṭhanto kappāvasesaṃ tiṭṭhati nāma.
atk-s0519a0:360_6: Yadi evaṃ kasmā iddhimanto cetovasippattā khīṇāsavā lokahitatthaṃ tathā na tiṭṭhantīti?
atk-s0519a0:363_1: evaṃ tehi taṇhāya ca nānatte dassite “tayo pañhā”ti idaṃ sijjhatīti taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:364_0: Tattha yasmā taṇhāya abhāvepi sati jarāmaraṇaṃ labbhati khīṇāsavasantāne,
atk-s0519a0:364_1: tasmā aññaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ aññā taṇhāti imamatthamāha “dissanti vītarāgā jīrantāpi mīyantāpī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:364_4: “Yadi cā”tiādinā jarāmaraṇato taṇhāya anaññatte dosaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:364_7: Jarāmaraṇampi siyā dukkhassa samudayo taṇhāya anaññatte satīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:364_8: Na ca siyā taṇhā dukkhassa samudayo jarāmaraṇato anaññatte satīti bhāvo.
atk-s0519a0:364_13: evaṃ jarāmaraṇampi siyā maggavajjhaṃ taṇhāya anaññatte sati.
atk-s0519a0:364_15: tathā taṇhāpi siyāti ayampi nayo vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:364_17: Aññamaññehīti aññāhi aññāhi kāraṇūpapattīhi atthato ce aññattaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:365_0: Imesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthato ekattanti imamevatthaṃ “na hi yujjatī”tiādinā vivarati.
atk-s0519a0:365_2: Tena icchātaṇhānaṃ atthato ekattaṃ vuttaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0519a0:365_3: Etena na hi yujjati icchāya ca taṇhāya ca atthato aññattanti.
atk-s0519a0:365_5: evaṃ icchāvipariyāye āghātavatthūsu kodho ca upanāho ca uppajjatīti idampi samatthanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:365_6: na tathā jarāmaraṇavipariyāyeti jarāmaraṇataṇhānaṃ atthato aññattampi samatthitaṃ hotīti etamatthaṃ dasseti “imāya yuttiyā”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:366_1: atha kasmā bhagavatā imissā gāthāya dvidhā vuttāti?
atk-s0519a0:366_13: tathāpi sabbā taṇhā rūpādivisayaṃ gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇena ekasabhāvā evāti dassento “sabbā hi taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:367_0: Ayaṃ pana na kevalaṃ taṇhā ārammaṇe pavattivisesena dvīhi eva nāmehi vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:367_1: atha kho anekehipi pariyāyehīti dassanatthaṃ “icchāitipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:368_2: Pīḷājananato duruddhāraṇato ca visapītaṃ sallaṃ viyāti sallaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:368_8: Allāni ceva siniddhāni cāti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0519a0:368_19: Visatā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe visatā vitthatāti visattikā.
atk-s0519a0:369_9: Itīti evaṃ ārammaṇe pavattivisesena anekehi nāmehi gayhamānāpi sabbā taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇāti yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigameti.
atk-s0519a0:370_0: Puna taṇhāya anekehi nāmehi gahitabhāvameva “yathā cā”tiādinā upacayena dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:370_2: “Āsā ca pihā”ti gāthāya atthaṃ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0519a0:370_9: Evaṃ yujjatīti evaṃ icchātaṇhānaṃ atthato anaññattā “tayo pañhā”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:371_1: Evaṃ “kenassubbhāhato loko”ti gāthāya “tayo pañhā”ti pañhattayabhāve yuttiṃ dassetvā idāni aññehi pakārehi
atk-s0519a0:371_5: Nibbidūpacāroti nibbidāpavatti kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjamānā anabhirati ñāṇanibbidā ca.
atk-s0519a0:371_8: na ñāṇanibbidāti sabbo nibbidūpacāro kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlakoti na pana yujjatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:371_13: evaṃ imāya yuttiyā iminā yogena nayena aññamaññehi kāraṇehi taṃtaṃpāḷippadese anurūpehi aññathā aññehi hetūhi yutti gavesitabbāti.
atk-s0519a0:372_0: Idāni taṃ nayadassanaṃ saṃkhittanti vitthārato vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yathā hi bhagavā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:372_2: rāgadosamohacaritānaṃ yathākkamaṃ asubhamettāpaccayākārakathā rāgādivinayanato sappāyāti ayaṃ sāsanayutti.
atk-s0519a0:372_9: idha pana rāgacaritoti tibbakileso rāgacaritoti adhippeto.
atk-s0519a0:372_11: Yassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya bhāvanā samijjhati,
atk-s0519a0:372_14: na tassa mandakilesassa viya lahukatarāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0519a0:372_17: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi yathāsambhavaṃ attho vattabbo.
atk-s0519a0:372_18: Ettha ca ayuttaparihārena yuttisamadhigamoti yuttivicāraṇāya ayuttipi gavesitabbāti vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:373_4: Sutte anavasesānaṃ padatthānaṃ anupadavicāraṇā vicayo hāro,
atk-s0519a0:373_5: vicayahārasaṃvaṇṇanāya niddhāritesu atthesu yuttigavesanaṃ sukaranti āha –
atk-s0519a0:373_6: “sabbaṃ taṃ vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabba”nti.
atk-s0519a0:373_7: Yāvatikā ñāṇassa bhūmīti saṃvaṇṇentassa ācariyassa yaṃ ñāṇaṃ yaṃ paṭibhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:373_11: Anantanayo samantabhaddako vimaddakkhamo vicittadesano ca saddhammoti.
atk-s0519a0:374_7: Yasmā pana kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ pavatti nāma natthi,
atk-s0519a0:374_8: tasmā samāpattito vuṭṭhānassa aparabhāgeti dassanatthaṃ “ṭhassatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:374_9: Na yujjati desanāti byāpādapaṭipakkhattā mettāya tādisī kathā na yuttāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:374_10: Byāpādo pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti yujjati desanāti yathāvuttakāraṇato eva ayaṃ kathā yuttāti.
atk-s0519a0:375_2: Tena tenevāti niccādīsu yaṃ yaṃ pahīnaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:375_4: Asmīti vigatanti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu diṭṭhimānavasena yaṃ asmīti maññitaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:375_7: Vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallanti vinayakukkuccassāpi kathaṃ kathanti pavattisabbhāvato vicikicchāpadena visesitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:375_8: Na yujjati desanāti vicikicchāya pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato na yuttāyaṃ kathā.
atk-s0519a0:376_1: Kāmarāgabyāpādā visesāya saṃvattantīti na yujjatīti yasmā nīvaraṇesu appahīnesu paṭhamajjhānassa upacārampi na sampajjati,
atk-s0519a0:376_3: tasmā kāmarāgabyāpādā visesāya dutiyajjhānāya saṃvattantīti na yuttāyaṃ kathā.
atk-s0519a0:376_4: Yathāladdhassa pana paṭhamajjhānassa kāmarāgabyāpādā pariyuṭṭhānappattā hānāya saṃvattantīti yujjati desanā yuttā kathāti,
atk-s0519a0:376_6: Avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā nāma saha upacārena dutiyajjhānadhammā,
atk-s0519a0:377_0: Saññūpacārāti paṭusaññākiccaṃ karontā eva ye keci cittuppādā,
atk-s0519a0:377_2: Saññāvedayitanirodhasahagatāti “saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī”ti tassa parikammavasena pavattadhammā.
atk-s0519a0:377_3: Te pana yasmā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyaṃ ṭhiteneva sakkā saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ,
atk-s0519a0:377_5: tasmā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā hānāya saṃvattantīti na yuttā kathā.
atk-s0519a0:377_6: Visesāya saṃvattantīti pana yuttā kathāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:378_0: Api cettha appaṭikkūlasaññāmukhena kāmacchando vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:378_7: Attaññutāmukhena attani aparibhavane māno vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:378_31: Attādhipateyyapatirūpena garūnaṃ anusāsaniyā appadakkhiṇaggāhitā vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:378_33: Lokādhipateyyapatirūpena attani dhamme ca paribhavo vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:378_37: Upekkhāvihārapatirūpena kusalesu dhammesu nikkhittachandatā vañcetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:378_38: Evaṃ āgamapatirūpakaadhigamapatirūpakādīnampi tathā tathā vañcanasabhāvo yuttito veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:381_3: idaṃ imassa padaṭṭhāna”nti tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūtadhammavibhāvanalakkhaṇo padaṭṭhāno hāro,
atk-s0519a0:381_4: tasmā pavattiyā mūlabhūtaṃ avijjaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabhāvadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ niddhārento
atk-s0519a0:381_7: sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo na sampaṭivijjhīyati etenāti sabbadhammayāthāvaasampaṭivedho.
atk-s0519a0:381_8: So lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sā tathā vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:381_12: Kattha pana so sampaṭivedhassa paṭipakkhoti āha –
atk-s0519a0:381_15: Yasmā pana asubhe subhantiādivipallāse sati tattha sammoho uparūpari jāyatiyeva na hāyati,
atk-s0519a0:382_1: “Yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:382_3: Sā hi ekavāraṃ uppannāpi anādīnavadassitāya lobhassa uppattikāraṇaṃ hotīti tassa padaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:382_5: mohassa micchāpaṭipadā padaṭṭhānanti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:382_11: Yebhuyyena niccaggahaṇaṃ viññāṇādhīnanti niccasaññāya viññāṇapadaṭṭhānatā vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:382_12: Tathā hi so bhikkhu taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratīti viññāṇavisayameva attano niccaggāhaṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0519a0:382_13: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ yadi aniccatā dukkhatā ca sudiṭṭhā,
atk-s0519a0:383_2: Sabbaṃ neyyanti cattāri saccāni catusaccavinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato.
atk-s0519a0:383_7: Abhijjhāya tanukaraṇato adinnādānāveramaṇī alobhassa padaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:383_8: Tathā byāpādassa tanukaraṇato pāṇātipātāveramaṇī adosassa padaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:383_10: sammāpaṭipatti sīlasamādhisampadānaṃ nibbidāñāṇena anabhiratiñāṇameva vā tathā pavattaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:383_11: Sabbāpi vedanā dukkhadukkhatādibhāvato dukkhanti katvā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:384_0: Sattānaṃ kāye avītarāgatā pañcannaṃ ajjhattikāyatanānaṃ vasena hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:384_3: Visesato jhānanissayabhūte manāyatane ca nikanti hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:384_6: mā edisī vedanāti evaṃ pavattā rūpādiabhinandanā nibbattabhavānupassitā.
atk-s0519a0:384_8: Yonisomanasikāravato hi pubbenivāsānussati kammassakataññāṇassa kāraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:384_14: Tattha okappanaṃ saddahanavasena ārammaṇassa ogāhaṇaṃ nicchayo.
atk-s0519a0:384_18: Apilāpanaṃ asammoso nimujjitvā viya ārammaṇassa ogāhaṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0519a0:384_19: ettha ca saddhādīnaṃ pasādasaddhāsammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānajhānaṅgāni yathākkamaṃ padaṭṭhānanti vadantena
atk-s0519a0:385_8: Attano piyassa maraṇaṃ cintentassa bālassa yebhuyyena soko uppajjatīti maraṇaṃ sokassa padaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:385_11: Attano nissayassa santapanameva bhavassāti vuttaṃ bhavaṃ dassetuṃ “imānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:385_12: Tattha bhavassa aṅgāni bhavasaṅkhātāni ca aṅgāni bhavaṅgāni.
atk-s0519a0:386_3: sappāyadhammassavanena taṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānassa brūhanā pītaññutā,
atk-s0519a0:386_4: bhāvanāya thokampi layāpattiyā uddhaṃpattiyā ca jānanā pattaññutā.
atk-s0519a0:386_5: Attano pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatassa jānanā attaññutā,
atk-s0519a0:386_6: tesu purimānaṃ purimānaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa padaṭṭhānabhāvo suviññeyyo eva.
atk-s0519a0:386_13: Evanti yadidaṃ “tassā vipallāsā padaṭṭhāna”ntiādinā avijjādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:386_14: iminā nayena athāpi yo koci upanissayo balavapaccayoti yo koci avasesapaccayo,
atk-s0519a0:386_16: “Evaṃ yā kāci upanisā yogato ca paccayato cā”tipi paṭhanti.
atk-s0519a0:389_2: Tattha kiṃ lakkhayatīti lakkhaṇahārassa visayaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0519a0:389_3: “Ye dhammā”tiādinā lakkhaṇahāraṃ saṅkhepato dassetvā taṃ udāharaṇehi vibhajituṃ “cakkhu”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:389_4: Tattha “vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇānī”ti iminā anavaṭṭhitabhāvādināpi ekalakkhaṇatā vuttā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:390_0: Evaṃ āyatanavasena ekalakkhaṇataṃ dassetvā idāni khandhādivasena dassetuṃ “atīte, rādha,
atk-s0519a0:390_2: Yamakovādasutte vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā vuttāti tasmiṃ sutte “vadhakaṃ rūpaṃ vadhakaṃ rūpanti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādinā āgatattā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:390_4: imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ kāyagatāya satiyā vuttāya sati vedanāgatā sati cittagatā sati dhammagatā ca sati vuttā
atk-s0519a0:391_0: Kāye kāyānupassī viharāhīti ettha kāyeti rūpakāye.
atk-s0519a0:391_1: Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca samūhaṭṭhena kāyoti adhippeto.
atk-s0519a0:392_2: “Kāye”ti ca vatvā puna “kāyānupassī”ti dutiyaṃ kāyaggahaṇaṃ asammissato vavatthānaghanavinibbhogādidassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:392_3: Tena na kāye vedanānupassī cittadhammānupassī vā,
atk-s0519a0:392_4: atha kho kāyānupassī evāti kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:393_4: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibbhujjako viya rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassī evāti
atk-s0519a0:393_5: nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti.
atk-s0519a0:393_6: Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati,
atk-s0519a0:393_7: yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatte eva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti.
atk-s0519a0:394_0: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-s0519a0:395_0: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti. ;
atk-s0519a0:397_2: na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūte eva imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī,
atk-s0519a0:397_4: Atha vā yvāyaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhāne assāsapassāsādicuṇṇikajātaaṭṭhikapariyosāno kāyo vutto,
atk-s0519a0:397_8: tassa sabbassa imasmiṃyeva kāye anupassanato kāye kāyānupassīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:398_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā gahetabbassa kassaci ananupassanato,
atk-s0519a0:398_1: tassa pana kesalomādikassa nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhāte kāyānupassīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:398_2: Api ca “imasmiṃ kāye aniccato anupassati no niccato”tiādinā anukkamena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva
atk-s0519a0:398_3: aniccalakkhaṇādikassa ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa kāyassa anupassanato kāye kāyānupassīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:399_1: Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātāpetīti ātāpo,
atk-s0519a0:399_5: Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati,
atk-s0519a0:399_11: Anātāpino ca anto saṅkoco antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-s0519a0:399_13: Tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati,
atk-s0519a0:400_0: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-s0519a0:400_2: Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0519a0:400_4: domanassaggahaṇena byāpādo gahitoti nīvaraṇesu balavadhammadvayappahānadassanena nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vuttanti
atk-s0519a0:400_6: “Ātāpī”tiādinā pana sampayogaṅgaṃ dassitanti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ātāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:400_7: Tattha abhijjhādomanassānaṃ samatho ujupaṭipakkhoti abhijjhādomanassavinayo vuccamāno samādhindriyaṃ dīpetīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:400_9: Ekalakkhaṇattā catunnaṃ indriyānanti yathā vīriyapaññāsamādhindriyehi kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ ijjhati,
atk-s0519a0:400_10: evaṃ vedanācittadhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānānipi tehi ijjhantīti catusatipaṭṭhānasādhane imesaṃ indriyānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:400_11: sabhāvabhedābhāvato samānalakkhaṇattā itarāni satipaṭṭhānānipi vuttāni eva hontīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:401_1: Idāni satipaṭṭhānesu gahitesu sabbesaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ gahitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:401_2: Tattha bodhaṅgamāti bodhaṃ ariyamaggañāṇaṃ gacchantīti bodhaṅgamā.
atk-s0519a0:401_4: Neyyānikalakkhaṇenāti ettha nimittato pavattato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ niyyānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:401_10: tattha niyyānaṃ etesaṃ atthīti niyyānikāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:402_0: Evaṃ akusalāpi dhammāti yathā kusalā dhammā ekalakkhaṇabhāvena niddhāritā,
atk-s0519a0:402_1: evaṃ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇaṭṭhena niddhāretabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0519a0:402_3: Idāni taṃ pahānaṃ dassetuṃ “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:402_4: Tattha kāyānupassanādīsu catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu asubhe subhantiādayo cattāro vipallāsā pahīyanti,
atk-s0519a0:402_5: kabaḷīkārāhārādayo cattāro āhārā cassa pariññaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a0:402_6: tesaṃ parijānanassa paribandhino kāmarāgādayo byantīkatā hontīti attho, kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:402_10: “evaṃ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchantī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:403_0: Idāni aññenapi pariyāyena lakkhaṇahārassa udāharaṇāni dassetuṃ “yattha vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:403_10: Desitaṃ tattha sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ sukhavedanābhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:404_0: Dukkhasamudayo ca ariyasaccanti idaṃ akusalassa somanassassa vasena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:404_6: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “adukkhamasukhāya hi vedanāya avijjā anusetī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:404_8: Sati ca avijjāggahaṇe sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo desitoti dassetuṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:404_11: tena so paṭiccasamuppādo anulomapaṭilomavasena duvidhoti imaṃ vakkhamānavisesaṃ joteti.
atk-s0519a0:404_12: Tesu anulomato paṭiccasamuppādo yathādassito sarāgasadosasamohasaṃkilesapakkhena hātabboti vutto,
atk-s0519a0:404_13: paṭilomato pana paṭiccasamuppādo yo “avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhā”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vutto,
atk-s0519a0:405_0: Idāni ekalakkhaṇatāvibhāvanena lakkhaṇahārayojanāya nayaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ ye dhammā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:405_1: Tattha kiccatoti pathavīādīnaṃ phassādīnañca rūpārūpadhammānaṃ sandhāraṇasaṅghaṭṭanādikiccato,
atk-s0519a0:405_2: tesaṃ tesaṃ vā paccayadhammānaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayuppannadhammassa paccayabhāvasaṅkhātakiccato.
atk-s0519a0:405_7: Ettha ca sahacaraṇaṃ samānahetutā samānaphalatā samānabhūmitā samānavisayatā samānārammaṇatāti evamādayopi ca-
atk-s0519a0:408_2: Tattha byañjanena suttassa neruttañca adhippāyo ca nidānañca pubbāparasandhi ca gavesitabboti saṅkhepena tāva catubyūhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:408_3: “Byañjanenā”ti iminā hārānaṃ suttassa byañjanavicayabhāvato byañjanamukheneva ete catubyūhahārapadatthā niddhāretabbāti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:408_13: liṅgavacanakālasādhanapurisādivisesayogena yo yo attho yathā yathā vattabbo,
atk-s0519a0:408_15: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “yaṃ dhammānaṃ nāmaso ñāṇa”nti.
atk-s0519a0:409_3: Nāmasoti pathavī phasso khandhā dhātu tisso phussoti evamādināmavisesena ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0519a0:409_5: Pathavīti hi evamādikaṃ saddaṃ gahetvā tato paraṃ saṅketadvārena tadatthapaṭipatti taṃtaṃaniyatanāmapaññattiggahaṇavaseneva hotīti.
atk-s0519a0:409_8: So panassa atthe pavattinimittabhūtāya paññattiyā gahitāya eva hotīti sā pana paññatti niruttisaṅkhātapadena
atk-s0519a0:409_10: “Yadā hi bhikkhū”tiādinā “dhammānaṃ nāmaso ñāṇa”nti padassa atthaṃ vivarati.
atk-s0519a0:410_1: Nāmaṃ jānātīti nāmapaññattivasena ayaṃ nāmāti nāmaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0519a0:410_3: Tathā tathā naṃ abhiniropetīti yo yo attho dhammo ca yathā yathā ca voharitabbo,
atk-s0519a0:410_4: tathā tathā naṃ nāmaṃ vohāraṃ abhiniropeti desetīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:410_5: Ettāvatā ca ayaṃ bhikkhu atthakusalo yāva anekādhivacanakusaloti vuccatīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:411_2: Byañjanakusaloti akkharesu ca vākyesu ca kusalo.
atk-s0519a0:411_10: tāni sabbāni yathāsambhavaṃ sutte nibbacanavasena kātabbāni vattabbānīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:411_11: Sabbā ca janapadaniruttiyoti sabbā ca lokasamaññāyo yathārahaṃ kātabbā.
atk-s0519a0:413_1: Nidānakaṇḍe iminā vatthunāti iminā puttagavādikittanasaṅkhātena kāraṇena.
atk-s0519a0:414_6: Pubbāparenāti pubbena vā aparena vā desanantarenāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:414_9: Imehi padehi pariyuṭṭhānehīti imehi yathāvuttehi gāthāpadehi taṇhāpariyuṭṭhānadīpakehi.
atk-s0519a0:414_15: taṃ santānaṃ nissarituṃ adentī nānārammaṇehi palobhayamānā kilesehi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0519a0:414_16: Tasmā kilesavasena ca pariyuṭṭhānavasena ca taṇhābandhanaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:415_5: Attahitaparahitānaṃ idhalokaparalokānañca munanato munīti evaṃ gāthāya padattho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:416_3: Te pana yasmā sattasu javanacetanāsu paṭhamacetanā sati paccayasamavāye imasmiṃyeva attabhāve phalaṃ deti.
atk-s0519a0:416_5: Ubhinnaṃ vemajjhacetanā yattha katthaci phalaṃ deti,
atk-s0519a0:416_6: tasmā vipaccanokāsavasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:416_7: Yasmā pana taṃtaṃcetanāsampayuttā taṇhāpi cetanā viya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādivasena tidhā hoti,
atk-s0519a0:416_10: Pubbāparena yujjatīti yaṃ pubbaṃ purimaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyatādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:416_11: taṃ iminā aparena kammassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyatādivacanena yujjati gaṅgodakaṃ viya yamunodakena saṃsandati sametīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:417_0: Saṅkhārā dassanabalenāti catūsu diṭṭhigatasampayuttesu vicikicchāsampayutte cāti pañcasu cittuppādesu saṅkhārā paṭhamamaggapaññābalena.
atk-s0519a0:417_1: Chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni bhāvanābalenāti paṭhamamaggena pahīnāvasesavasena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:418_5: desanāya pana viseso vijjatīti dassetuṃ “api cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:418_10: Pubbāparena saddhiṃ yojayitvāti pubbena vā aparena vā suttena saddhiṃ atthato sambandhaṃ yojetvā.
atk-s0519a0:418_11: Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti tena suttassa attho niddiṭṭho hoti vitthārito suttantaradassanena.
atk-s0519a0:419_1: atha kho aññopi atthīti dassetuṃ “so cāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:419_3: So pana yasmā saṅkāsanādīnaṃ channaṃ atthapadānaṃyeva hoti,
atk-s0519a0:420_0: Sambandho ca nāma na koci attho.
atk-s0519a0:420_3: Yasmā pana sabbampi nāmādipadaṃ chahi byañjanapadehi asaṅgahitaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0519a0:421_1: Na ca pathaviṃ nissāyāti pathaviṃ visayasaṅkhātaṃ nissayaṃ katvā,
atk-s0519a0:421_4: So hi sabbasaṅkhāranissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ ālambitvā samāpajjanavasena jhāyati,
atk-s0519a0:421_7: Ettha ca catūhi mahābhūtehi rūpappaṭibaddhavuttitāya sabbo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo ca gahitā.
atk-s0519a0:421_8: Arūpabhavo pana sarūpeneva gahitoti sabbaṃ lokaṃ pariyādiyitvā puna aññenapi pariyāyena taṃ dassetuṃ “na ca imaṃ loka”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:421_9: Sabbo hi loko idhaloko paraloko cāti dveva koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-s0519a0:421_10: Yasmā pana “idhaloko”ti visesato diṭṭhadhammabhūto sattasantāno vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:422_0: Ye pana “ubhayamantarenā”ti vacanaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0519a0:422_5: Mutanti patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca.
atk-s0519a0:422_7: Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:422_8: Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:422_9: Vitakkitaṃ vicāritanti vitakkanavasena anumajjanavasena ca ālambitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:422_12: anissitena cittena na ñāyati jhāyantoti ayaṃ khīṇāsavo phalasamāpattijhānena jhāyanto pubbeva taṇhādiṭṭhinissayānaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā sadevake loke…pe…
atk-s0519a0:422_13: manussāya yattha katthacipi anissitena cittena jhāyati nāma.
atk-s0519a0:422_14: Tato eva loke kenacipi na ñāyati “ayaṃ idaṃ nāma nissāya jhāyatī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:424_0: Yassa te nābhijānāma, kiṃ tvaṃ nissāya jhāyasī”ti. ;
atk-s0519a0:425_0: Idāni khīṇāsavacittassa katthacipi anissitabhāvaṃ godhikasuttena vakkalisuttena ca vibhāvetuṃ “yathā māro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:425_1: Viññāṇaṃ samanvesantoti parinibbānato uddhaṃ viññāṇaṃ pariyesanto.
atk-s0519a0:425_3: Anissitacittā na ñāyanti jhāyamānāti na kevalaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā khīṇāsavassa cittagatiṃ mārādayo na jānanti,
atk-s0519a0:425_4: api ca kho saupādisesāyapi nibbānadhātuyā tassa taṃ na jānantīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:425_5: Ayaṃ desanāsandhīti godhikasuttavakkalisuttānaṃ viya suttantānaṃ aññamaññaatthasaṃsandanā desanāsandhi nāma.
atk-s0519a0:426_2: Purimena suttassa niddesena tasseva pacchimassa niddesassa,
atk-s0519a0:426_4: Taṃ dassetuṃ yasmā bhagavā yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā pacchā vivaṭṭaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0519a0:426_6: Tattha nissitaṃ cittaṃ etesanti nissitacittā, puggalā,
atk-s0519a0:426_8: Dhammādhiṭṭhānāya pana nissitaṃ cittaṃ etthāti nissitacittā,
atk-s0519a0:429_3: Nikkamathāti kosajjapakkhato nikkhantattā nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṃ taduttarivīriyaṃ karotha.
atk-s0519a0:429_4: Yuñjatha buddhasāsaneti yasmā sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā satisampajaññanti
atk-s0519a0:429_5: imesu dhammesu patiṭṭhitānaṃ jāgariyānuyogavasena ārambhanikkamadhātuyo sampajjanti,
atk-s0519a0:429_6: tasmā tathābhūtasamathavipassanāsaṅkhāte bhagavato sāsane yuttappayuttā hotha.
atk-s0519a0:429_8: naḷāgāraṃva kuñjaroti evaṃ paṭipajjantā ca tedhātuissarassa maccurājassa vasaṃ satte netīti tassa senāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a0:429_9: abalaṃ dubbalaṃ yathā nāma balūpapanno kuñjaro naḷehi kataṃ agāraṃ khaṇeneva viddhaṃseti,
atk-s0519a0:429_10: evameva kilesagaṇaṃ dhunātha vidhamatha viddhaṃsethāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:430_1: taṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “ārambhatha nikkamathāti vīriyassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:430_2: Tattha ārambhatha nikkamathāti idaṃ vacanaṃ vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ vīriyapayogassa kāraṇaṃ vīriyārambhe niyojanato,
atk-s0519a0:430_3: “yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī”ti vacanato yogo bhāvanā.
atk-s0519a0:430_4: Tattha vipassanābhāvanāya vakkhamānattā samādhibhāvanā idhādhippetāti vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:430_6: “Maccuno sena”nti vuttāya kilesasenāya sammā dhunanaṃ ñāṇeneva hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:430_9: Puna yathāvuttavīriyasamādhipaññāsampayuttesu ādhipaccakiccatāya papañcappahānasamatthā vaṭṭamūlaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0519a0:430_10: vivaṭṭaṃ pāpenti cāti dassanatthaṃ “ārambhatha nikkamathāti vīriyindriyassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:430_11: Imāni padaṭṭhānāni desanāti “yānimāni vīriyassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādinā vīriyādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāni vuttāni,
atk-s0519a0:431_0: Evaṃ yathānikkhittāya desanāya padaṭṭhānavasena atthaṃ niddhāretvā idāni taṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena
atk-s0519a0:431_1: āvaṭṭetukāmo tassa bhūmiṃ dassetuṃ “ayuñjantānaṃ vā sattānaṃ yoge yuñjantānaṃ vā ārambho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:431_3: yoge bhāvanāyaṃ taṃ ayuñjantānaṃ vā sattānaṃ aparipakkañāṇānaṃ vāsanābhāgena āyatiṃ vijānanatthaṃ ayaṃ desanārambho yuñjantānaṃ vā paripakkañāṇānanti.
atk-s0519a0:432_0: So pamādo duvidhoti yena pamādena bhāvanaṃ nānuyuñjanti,
atk-s0519a0:432_5: iti rūpassa samudayo”tiādinā ñāṇassa pavattanaṭṭhānañcāti ñeyyaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:432_6: Anekabhedattā pāpadhammānaṃ tabbasena anekabhedopi pamādo mūlabhūtāya avijjāya vasena eko evāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:432_9: Chandarāgajjhosānā taṇhā evāti taṇhāmūlakepi dhamme ettheva pakkhipitvā “tividho taṇhāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:433_2: Etena “taṇhāya rūpakāyo padaṭṭhāna”nti padassa atthaṃ vivarati.
atk-s0519a0:433_5: Arūpīsu sammohoti phassādīnaṃ atisukhumasabhāvattā santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanavinibbhogassa dukkarattā ca arūpadhammesu sammoho,
atk-s0519a0:433_7: Evaṃ niddhārite rūpakāyanāmakāyasaṅkhāte upādānakkhandhapañcake ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattaṃ taṇhañca
atk-s0519a0:433_8: avijjañca avisesena vuttaṃ catupādānānaṃ vasena vibhajitvā tesaṃ khandhānaṃ upādānānañca dukkhasamudayabhāvena
atk-s0519a0:434_1: Evaṃ pamādamukhena purimasaccadvayaṃ niddhāretvā pamādamukheneva aparampi saccadvayaṃ niddhāretuṃ “tattha yo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:434_4: Rakkhaṇā paṭisaṃharaṇāti attano cittassa rakkhaṇasaṅkhātā pamādassa paṭisaṃharaṇā,
atk-s0519a0:435_1: Assādañca assādatoti kāme paṭicca uppajjamānaṃ sukhasomanassasaṅkhātaṃ assādaṃ assādatāya assādamattato.
atk-s0519a0:435_2: Ādīnavanti “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā”tiādinā vuttaṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:435_18: Tāsu niruddhāsu upādānādīnaṃ abhāvo evāti taṇhāavijjāpahānena sakalavaṭṭadukkhanirodhaṃ dassento “imesu dvīsu dhammesu pahīnesū”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:435_19: Imāni cattāri saccāni visabhāgasabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanavasena niddhāritānīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:436_0: Evaṃ vodānapakkhaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa visabhāgadhammavasena sabhāgadhammavasena ca āvaṭṭanaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0519a0:436_1: idāni saṃkilesapakkhaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa visabhāgadhammavasena sabhāgadhammavasena ca āvaṭṭanaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a0:436_4: yathā nāma patiṭṭhāhetubhāvena mūlanti laddhavohāre bhūmigate rukkhassa avayave pharasuchedādiantarāyābhāvena
atk-s0519a0:436_5: anupaddave tato eva daḷhe thire sati khandhe chinnepi assatthādirukkho ruhati,
atk-s0519a0:436_6: evameva taṇhānusayasaṅkhāte attabhāvarukkhassa mūle maggañāṇapharasunā anupacchinne tayidaṃ dukkhaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0519a0:436_9: Etassa dhammassa paccayoti etassa bhavataṇhāsaṅkhātassa dhammassa bhavesu ādīnavappaṭicchādanādivasena assādaggahaṇassa paccayo.
atk-s0519a0:436_16: Idha samatho vipassanā ca maggasamādhi maggapaññā ca adhippetāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:437_0: Idāni na kevalaṃ niddhāriteheva visabhāgasabhāgadhammehi āvaṭṭanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:437_1: atha kho pāḷiāgatehipi tehi āvaṭṭanaṃ āvaṭṭahāroti dassanatthaṃ “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0519a0:437_8: Iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya samathavipassanāhi kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena cittaṃ pariyodapetabbanti
atk-s0519a0:437_9: etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho,
atk-s0519a0:437_10: vitthārato pana attho pāḷito eva viññāyati.
atk-s0519a0:438_0: Tattha “sabbapāpaṃ nāmā”tiādīsu dosasamuṭṭhānanti doso samuṭṭhānameva etassāti dosasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:438_5: Samphappalāpo uddhaccacittena pavattayatīti adhippāyena tassa mohasamuṭṭhānatā vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:439_0: Evaṃ duccaritaakusalakammapathakammavibhāgena “sabbapāpa”nti ettha vuttapāpaṃ vibhajitvā idānissa akusalamūlavasena
atk-s0519a0:439_2: Tattha akusalamūlaṃ payogaṃ gacchantanti lobhādiakusalāni kāyavacīpayogaṃ gacchantāni,
atk-s0519a0:439_6: idaṃ lobhasamuṭṭhānanti chandā agatiṃ gacchatīti yadetaṃ agatigamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:439_9: Ettāvatā “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti ettha pāpaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa akaraṇaṃ dassento “lobho…pe…
atk-s0519a0:439_10: paññāyā”ti tīhi kusalamūlehi tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ pahānavasena sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ anuppādanamāha.
atk-s0519a0:439_12: Tattha aratiṃ vūpasamentī muditā tassā mūlabhūtaṃ mohaṃ pajahatīti katvā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:440_1: Idāni aññenapi pariyāyena pāpaṃ tassa akaraṇañca dassetvā sesapadānañca atthavibhāvanamukhena sabhāgavisabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0519a0:440_3: Akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhācāroti tīhipi padehi micchattānaṃ anuppādanameva vadati.
atk-s0519a0:440_4: Tathā kiriyā karaṇaṃ ajjhācāroti tīhipi padehi uppādanameva vadati.
atk-s0519a0:440_9: “purāṇamaggaṃ purāṇaṃ añjasanti kho ariyassetaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacana”nti.
atk-s0519a0:440_10: Atītena vā vipassinā bhagavatā yathādhigataṃ desitabhāvaṃ sandhāya “atītassa maggassā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:440_11: Vipassino hi ayaṃ bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa pātimokkhuddesagāthāti.
atk-s0519a0:441_2: ayaṃ nirodhoti yadipi asaṅkhatā dhātu kenaci saṃkilesena na saṃkilissati,
atk-s0519a0:441_3: adhigacchantassa pana puggalassa vasena evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:441_4: Tassa hi yāva saṃkilesā na vigacchanti,
atk-s0519a0:442_0: Imāni pāḷiāgatadhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanavasena niddhāritāni cattāri saccāni punapi pāḷiāgatadhammānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:442_1: sabhāgavisabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanena āvaṭṭahāraṃ dassetuṃ “dhammo have rakkhatī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0519a0:442_4: Taṃ vibhajitvā dassento “dhammo nāma duvidho indriyasaṃvaro maggo cā”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:442_5: Indriyasaṃvarasīsena cettha sabbampi sīlaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:442_6: Sabbā upapattiyo duggati dukkhadukkhatādiyogena dukkhā gatiyoti katvā.
atk-s0519a0:442_7: Yathāvutte duvidhe dhamme paṭhamo dhammo yathā suciṇṇo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:442_10: taṃ sabbaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yā saṃvarasīle akhaṇḍakāritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:442_11: Idāni tassa dhammassa apāyato rakkhaṇe ekantikabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ gāmaṇisaṃyutte asibandhakaputtasuttaṃ ābhataṃ.
atk-s0519a0:443_7: Sevālamālikāti pātova udakato sevālañceva uppalādīni ca gahetvā udakasuddhibhāvajānanatthaṃ mālaṃ katvā piḷandhanakā.
atk-s0519a0:443_11: Saggaṃ nāma okkāmentīti parivāretvā ṭhitāva “gaccha, bho,
atk-s0519a0:444_7: Sā adhogāmī assāti sā adho gaccheyya,
atk-s0519a0:444_12: Sā ca kho na satthakassa viya nisitakaraṇatā,
atk-s0519a0:444_13: atha kho indriyānaṃ paṭubhāvoti dassetuṃ “adhimattatā”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:444_14: Nanu ca ariyamaggo attanā pahātabbakilese anavasesaṃ samucchindatīti atikhiṇo nāma natthīti?
atk-s0519a0:444_16: tathāpi no ca kho “yathā diṭṭhippattassā”ti vacanato saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattānaṃ kilesappahānaṃ pati atthi kāci visesamattāti sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0519a0:444_19: Yasmā pana ariyamaggena odhiso kilesā pahīyanti,
atk-s0519a0:444_20: tañca nesaṃ tathāpahānaṃ maggadhammesu indriyānaṃ apāṭavapāṭavatarapāṭavatamabhāvena hotīti yo vajirūpamadhammesu
atk-s0519a0:444_25: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādinā suttantarena sugatisaññitānampi upapattīnaṃ duggatibhāvaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0519a0:445_1: Idāni yathāvuttassa dhammassa visabhāgadhammānaṃ taṇhāvijjādīnaṃ sabhāgadhammānañca samathavipassanādīnaṃ
atk-s0519a0:445_2: niddhāraṇavasena āvaṭṭahāraṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “tattha duggatīnaṃ hetu taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:445_4: Idaṃ vuccati brahmacariyanti idaṃ ariyaṃ samathavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ maggabrahmacariyanti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:445_5: Yaṃ rakkhatīti sabbāhi duggatīhi rakkhantassa ariyamaggassa ārammaṇabhūto nirodho rakkhanto viya vutto,
atk-s0519a0:445_7: Imāni cattāri saccāni visabhāgasabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanavasena niddhāritānīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:448_3: Tāsu yasmā dhammesu vibhāgato niddiṭṭhesu tattha labbhamāno bhūmivibhāgo padaṭṭhānavibhāgo ca niddisiyamāno suviññeyyo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:448_4: tasmā dhammavibhattiṃ tāva niddisanto soḷasavidhe paṭṭhāne yesaṃ suttānaṃ vasena visesato vibhajitabbā,
atk-s0519a0:448_5: tāni suttāni dassetuṃ “dve suttāni vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:449_13: Tesu nissaraṇappahānavajjānaṃ pahānānaṃ vasena pahānasīlaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:449_15: Tena brahmacariyenāti tena saṃvarasīlasaṅkhātena seṭṭhacariyena kāraṇabhūtena brahmacārī bhavati.
atk-s0519a0:450_0: Pahānasīle ṭhitoti samucchedapaṭippassaddhippahānānaṃ vasena pahānasīle ṭhito.
atk-s0519a0:450_1: Tena brahmacariyenāti tena pahānasīlena visesabhūtena maggabrahmacariyena.
atk-s0519a0:450_3: tesaṃ ayaṃ pāṭho “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ nāma suttaṃ dānakathā,
atk-s0519a0:450_14: Yasmā “nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ nāma suttaṃ yā catusaccappakāsanā”ti vakkhati,
atk-s0519a0:450_15: na hi mahāthero sāvasesaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desesīti.
atk-s0519a0:451_0: “Natthi pajānanā”tiādinā ubhinnaṃ suttānaṃ sātisayaṃ asaṅkarakāraṇaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:451_1: Tattha pajānanāti ariyamaggassa padaṭṭhānabhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminī vipassanāpaññā.
atk-s0519a0:451_2: Imāni cattāri suttānīti imesaṃ suttānaṃ vāsanābhāgiyanibbedhabhāgiyānaṃ vakkhamānānañca saṃkilesabhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyānaṃ vasena cattāri suttāni.
atk-s0519a0:451_4: Sabbato vicayena hārena vicinitvāti sabbatobhāgena ekādasasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā vicayena hārena vicinitvā.
atk-s0519a0:451_5: “Yuttihārena yojetabbānī”ti etena vicayahārayuttihārā vibhattihārassa parikammaṭṭhānanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:451_6: “Yāvatikā ñāṇassa bhūmī”ti iminā vibhattihārassa mahāvisayataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:452_1: Evaṃ vāsanābhāgiyanibbedhabhāgiyabhāvehi dhamme ekadesena vibhajitvā idāni tesaṃ kilesabhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyabhāvehi
atk-s0519a0:452_2: sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇabhāvehi vibhajituṃ “tattha katame dhammā sādhāraṇā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:452_15: Aññampi evaṃ jātiyanti kiccapaccayapaṭipakkhādīhi samānaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a0:452_17: Tasmā sassatavādā ucchedavādāti ādiko sabbo puthujjanabhedo āharitvā vattabbo.
atk-s0519a0:452_18: Dasanappahātabbā kilesā sādhāraṇā micchattaniyatānaṃ aniyatānaṃ eva ca sambhavato sammattaniyatānaṃ asambhavato ca.
atk-s0519a0:453_1: Sabbā sā avītarāgehi sādhāraṇāti lokiyasamāpatti rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā dibbavihāro brahmavihāro paṭhamajjhānasamāpattīti
atk-s0519a0:453_3: Kusalasamāpatti pana iminā pariyāyena siyā asādhāraṇā,
atk-s0519a0:453_4: imaṃ pana dosaṃ passantā keci “yaṃ kiñci…pe…
atk-s0519a0:453_13: evaṃ sādhāraṇā dhammā na sabbasattānaṃ sādhāraṇatāya sādhāraṇā, kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:453_14: Yasmā aññamaññaṃ paraṃ paraṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ visayaṃ nātivattanti.
atk-s0519a0:453_16: itarathā tathā vohāro eva na siyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:453_17: Yasmā ca ete eva dhammā evaṃ niyatā visayā,
atk-s0519a0:453_18: tasmā “yopi imehi dhammehi samannāgato na so taṃ dhammaṃ upātivattatī”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:453_19: Na hi micchattaniyatānaṃ aniyatānañca dassanena pahātabbā kilesā na santi,
atk-s0519a0:453_20: aññesaṃ vā santīti evaṃ sesepi vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:454_0: Asādhāraṇo nāma dhammo tassa tassa puggalassa paccattaniyato ariyesu sekkhāsekkhadhammavasena anariyesu sabbābhabbapahātabbavasena gavesitabbo,
atk-s0519a0:454_2: So ca kho sādhāraṇāvidhuratāya taṃ taṃ upādāya tathāvuttadesanānusārenāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “katame
atk-s0519a0:454_3: dhammā asādhāraṇā yāva desanaṃ upādāya gavesitabbā sekkhāsekkhā bhabbābhabbā”ti iminā.
atk-s0519a0:454_5: Dhammatāti dhammasabhāvo paṭhamassa maggaṭṭhatā dutiyassa phalaṭṭhatā.
atk-s0519a0:454_13: Evaṃ “aṭṭhamakassā”tiādinā ariyapuggalesu asādhāraṇadhammaṃ dassetvā itaresu nayadassanatthaṃ “evaṃ visesānupassinā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:454_16: Micchattaniyatānaṃ aniyatā dhammā sādhāraṇā micchattaniyatā dhammā asādhāraṇā.
atk-s0519a0:454_18: Niyatamicchādiṭṭhi asādhāraṇāti iminā nayena visesānupassinā veditabbā.
atk-s0519a0:455_0: Evaṃ nānānayehi dhammavibhattiṃ dassetvā idāni bhūmivibhattiṃ padaṭṭhānavibhattiñca vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “dassanabhūmī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:455_2: Yasmā pana paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe ariyasāvako sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto nāma hoti,
atk-s0519a0:455_5: Kiñcāpi heṭṭhimo heṭṭhimo maggo upariuparimaggādhigamassa kāraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:455_7: Tathāpi ariyamaggo attano phalassa visesakāraṇaṃ āsannakāraṇañcāti dassetuṃ “bhāvanābhūmi uttarikānaṃ phalānaṃ pattiyā padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:455_8: Sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā ñāṇuttarassa tathāvidhapaccayasamāyoge ca hotīti sā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:455_9: Itarā pana tissopi paṭipadā samathaṃ āvahanti eva.
atk-s0519a0:455_10: Tāsu sabbamudutāya dassitāya sesāpi dassitā evāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:456_9: Tattha keci dāyakassa dānānumodanaṃ āciṇṇanti dānaṃ paratoghosassa kāraṇanti vadanti.
atk-s0519a0:456_10: Dāyako pana dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ ākaṅkhanto dānasīlādiguṇavisesānaṃ savane yuttappayutto hotīti dānaṃ dhammassavanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:457_0: Sīlasampanno vippaṭisārābhāvena samāhito dhammacintāsamattho hotīti sīlaṃ cintāmayañāṇassa kāraṇanti āha “sīlamaya”ntiādi.
atk-s0519a0:457_4: Idāni yasmā dānaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyabhāvanā ca na kevalaṃ yathāvuttaparatoghosādīnaṃyeva,
atk-s0519a0:457_6: tasmā tampi nayaṃ dassetuṃ puna “dānamaya”ntiādinā desanaṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0519a0:457_7: Tathā patirūpadesavāsādayo kāyavivekacittavivekādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ hotīti imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ “patirūpadesavāso”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:460_2: Tattha yasmā saṃvaṇṇiyamāne sutte yathāniddiṭṭhānaṃ kusalākusaladhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūte akusalakusaladhamme
atk-s0519a0:460_4: tasmā “sammādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā bhavatī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:460_7: Sā panassa sammādiṭṭhitā pubbabhāgasammādiṭṭhiyā vā lokuttarasammādiṭṭhiyā vā veditabbā.
atk-s0519a0:460_8: Micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā bhavatīti purimanaye vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā pahīnā hoti,
atk-s0519a0:461_0: Ye cassa micchādiṭṭhipaccayāti micchābhinivesahetu ye ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādayo lobhādayo pāṇātipātādayo
atk-s0519a0:461_1: ca aneke lāmakaṭṭhena pāpakā akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ.
atk-s0519a0:461_4: sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammā vā anuppannā vā sambhavanti uppannā,
atk-s0519a0:461_8: sammāvimuttiādīnaṃ micchāvimutti avimuttāva samānā “vimuttā maya”nti evaṃsaññino avimuttiyaṃ vā vimuttisaññino.
atk-s0519a0:461_10: micchā pāpikā vimutti vimokkho etassāti micchāvimutti.
atk-s0519a0:461_11: Aṭṭhaṅgā ca micchāvimutti yathāvuttenākārena micchābhinivesavasena ca pavattā antadvayalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a0:461_14: Micchāvimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ pana micchāvimokkhe micchādiṭṭhiyā ca sāranti gahaṇavasena pavatto akusalacittuppādo
atk-s0519a0:461_15: antamaso pāpaṃ katvā “sukataṃ mayā”ti paccavekkhato uppannamoho ca.
atk-s0519a0:461_16: Sammāvimuttiñāṇadassanassāti ettha sekkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sammāvimuttiñāṇadassananti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:462_1: Evaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādimukhena micchādiṭṭhiādiṃ dassetvā puna pāṇātipātaadinnādānakāmesumicchācārādito veramaṇiyādīhi
atk-s0519a0:462_4: Kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasañhitanti so samphappalāpassa pahānāya paṭipanno hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:463_0: Puna “ye ca kho kecī”tiādinā sammādiṭṭhiādimukheneva micchādiṭṭhiādīhi eva parivattanaṃ pakārantarena dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:464_0: Puna “ye ca kho kecī”tiādinā majjhimāya paṭipattiyā antadvayaparivattanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:464_1: Tattha bhuñjitabbātiādīni cattāri padāni vatthukāmavasena yojetabbāni.
atk-s0519a0:464_3: Tesaṃ adhammoti bhāvetabbo nāma dhammo siyā,
atk-s0519a0:464_6: iti sā tesaṃ adhammo āpajjatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:465_1: Dukkhoti pāpaṃ nijjarāpessāmāti pavattitaṃ sarīratāpanaṃ vadati.
atk-s0519a0:465_4: Idāni asubhasaññādimukhena subhasaññādiparivattanaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:465_5: Āraddhavipassakassa kilesāsucipaggharaṇavasena tebhūmakasaṅkhārā asubhato upaṭṭhahantīti katvā vuttaṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu asubhānupassino viharato”ti.
atk-s0519a0:465_6: “Yaṃ yaṃ vā panā”tiādinā paṭipakkhassa lakkhaṇaṃ vibhāveti.
atk-s0519a0:468_3: taṃ dassetuṃ “ekaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ aññamaññehi vevacanehi niddisatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:468_6: Kasmā pana bhagavā ekaṃ dhammaṃ anekapariyāyehi niddisatīti? Vuccate –
atk-s0519a0:468_7: desanākāle āyatiñca kassaci kathañci tadatthapaṭibodho siyāti pariyāyavacanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:468_8: tasmiṃ khaṇe vikkhittacittānaṃ aññavihitānaṃ aññena pariyāyena tadatthāvabodhanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:468_9: Teneva padena puna vacane tadaññesaṃ tattha adhigatatā siyāti mandabuddhīnaṃ punappunaṃ tadatthasallakkhaṇe asammosanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:468_10: Anekepi atthā samānabyañjanā hontīti yā atthantaraparikappanā siyā,
atk-s0519a0:468_11: tassā parivajjanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ anaññassa vacane anekāhi tāhi tāhi saññāhi tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:468_15: veneyyānaṃ tattha bījāvāpanatthaṃ vā pariyāyavacanaṃ bhagavā niddisati.
atk-s0519a0:469_0: Kiṃ bahunā yassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā sammāsambuddhā yathā sabbasmiṃ atthe appaṭihatañāṇācārā,
atk-s0519a0:469_1: tathā sabbasmiṃ saddavohāreti ekampi atthaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti,
atk-s0519a0:469_5: Tattha atthaṃ dassento “āsā nāma vuccati yā bhavissassa atthassā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:469_6: Tattha bhavissassa atthassāti anāgatassa icchitabbassa atthassa.
atk-s0519a0:470_0: Atthanipphattipaṭipālanāti yāya icchitassa atthassa nipphattiṃ paṭipāleti āgameti,
atk-s0519a0:470_1: yāya vā nipphannaṃ atthaṃ paṭipāleti rakkhati.
atk-s0519a0:470_4: Taṃ atthanipphattiṃ sattasaṅkhāravasena vibhajitvā dassento “piyaṃ vā ñāti”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:470_7: aniṭṭhārammaṇehipi taṃ dassetuṃ “appaṭikkūlato vā abhinandatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:471_0: Yāsu anekadhātūsu pavattiyā taṇhā “anekadhātūsu sarā”ti vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:471_2: Kiñcāpi dhātuvibhaṅgādīsu kāmadhātuādayo aññāpi anekadhātuyo āgatā,
atk-s0519a0:471_3: tāsampi ettheva samavarodhoti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhārasevettha dassitā.
atk-s0519a0:471_4: Keci rūpādhimuttātiādi tāsu dhātūsu taṇhāya pavattidassanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:471_5: Tattha yasmā pañca ajjhattikā dhātuyo satta ca viññāṇadhātuyo dhammadhātu ca dhammārammaṇeneva saṅgahitā,
atk-s0519a0:471_6: tasmā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo uddisitvā chaḷeva taṇhāya pavattiṭṭhānāni vibhattānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:471_7: Taṇhāpakkhā nekkhammassitāpi domanassupavicārā tassa anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati “pihapaccayā domanassa”nti vacanato,
atk-s0519a0:471_8: ko pana vādo gehassitesu domanassupavicāresūti imāni catuvīsati padāni “taṇhāpakkho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:471_9: Gehassitā pana upekkhā aññāṇupekkhatāya yathābhinivesassa paccayo hotīti “yā cha upekkhā gehassitā,
atk-s0519a0:472_1: Idāni tesaṃ upavicārānaṃ taṇhāpariyāyaṃ dassento “sāyeva patthanākārena dhammanandī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:472_2: Puna cittaṃ paññā bhagavā dhammo saṅgho sīlaṃ cāgoti imesaṃ pariyāyavacananiddhāraṇena vevacanahāraṃ
atk-s0519a0:472_4: Tattha “aññampi evaṃ jātiya”nti iminā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā
atk-s0519a0:472_5: paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā
atk-s0519a0:472_6: sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto
atk-s0519a0:472_7: paññāratanaṃ amohoti evamādīnampi paññāya pariyāyasaddānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:473_0: Pañcindriyāni lokuttarānīti khaye ñāṇantiādīni pañcindriyāni lokuttarāni,
atk-s0519a0:473_2: Sabbā paññāti itarehi vevacanehi vuttā sabbā paññā lokiyalokuttaramissikāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:473_3: “Api cā”tiādinā imināpi pariyāyena vevacanaṃ vattabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:473_5: Yathā ca buddhānussatiyaṃ vuttanti yathā buddhānussatiniddese “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā pāḷiyā so bhagavā itipi arahaṃ…pe…
atk-s0519a0:473_6: itipi bhagavāti anekehi vevacanehi bhagavā anussaritabboti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:473_7: Imināva nayena balanipphattigato vesārajjappatto yāva dhammobhāsapajjotakaroti,
atk-s0519a0:473_8: etehi pariyāyehi buddhassa bhagavato vevacanaṃ buddhānussatiyaṃ vattabbanti padaṃ āharitvā sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:473_10: Asaṅkhyeyyā hi buddhaguṇā guṇanemittakāni ca bhagavato nāmāni.
atk-s0519a0:476_0: Dhammānussatiyaṃ “asaṅkhata”ntiādīsu na kenaci paccayena saṅkhatanti asaṅkhataṃ.
atk-s0519a0:479_1: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ vinā passituṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā duppassaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:479_17: gaṇetuṃ etassa na sakkāti ca appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:479_19: Rāgādikiñcanābhāvena pariggahābhāvena ca akiñcananti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:480_0: Saṅghānussatiyaṃ sattānaṃ sāroti sīlasārādisāraguṇayogato sattesu sārabhūto.
atk-s0519a0:480_1: Sattānaṃ maṇḍoti gorasesu sappimaṇḍo viya sattesu maṇḍabhūto.
atk-s0519a0:480_4: Guṇasobhāsurabhibhāvena sattānaṃ pasūnaṃ surabhi kusumanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:481_0: Guṇesu uttamaṅgaṃ paññā tassā upasobhāhetutāya sīlaṃ uttamaṅgopasobhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:481_1: Sīlesu paripūrakārino anijjhantā nāma guṇā natthīti “nidhānañca sīlaṃ sabbadobhaggasamatikkamanaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:481_9: Volokanaṭṭhenāti sattabhūmakādipāsāde viya sīle ṭhatvā abhiññācakkhunā lokassa voloketuṃ sakkāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:484_5: yā desanāhārādayo viya assādādipadatthavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ akatvā bhagavato sābhāvikadhammakathāya desanā.
atk-s0519a0:484_8: Yasmā pana sā bhagavato tathā tathā veneyyasantāne yathādhippetamatthaṃ nikkhipatīti nikkhepo.
atk-s0519a0:484_9: Tassa cāyaṃ hāro dukkhādisaṅkhāte bhāge pakārehi ñāpeti,
atk-s0519a0:484_12: Iti pakatikathāya desanāti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena vibhajituṃ “kā ca pakatikathāya desanā”ti pucchitvā “cattāri saccānī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:485_0: Tattha idaṃ dukkhanti ayaṃ paññattīti kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve rūpārūpadhamme atītādivasena anekabhedabhinne
atk-s0519a0:485_6: Iminā nayena tattha tattha paññattiattho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:485_8: Dasannaṃ indriyānanti aṭṭha rūpindriyāni manindriyaṃ vedanindriyanti evaṃ dasannaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:486_0: Kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāroti vatthuvasena ayaṃ niddeso.
atk-s0519a0:486_3: Sā hi ojaṭṭhamakassa rūpassa āharaṇato āhāro.
atk-s0519a0:486_9: Patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷhanti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya patiṭṭhitañceva viññāṇaṃ viruḷhañca.
atk-s0519a0:486_12: Atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhīti ye imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyatiṃ vaḍḍhanahetukā saṅkhārā,
atk-s0519a0:486_14: “yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattī”ti yasmiṃ ṭhāne āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti atthi.
atk-s0519a0:486_15: Atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇanti yattha paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:486_19: Ayaṃ pabhāvapaññatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa cāti ayaṃ yathāvuttā desanā dukkhasaccassa samudayasaccassa ca samuṭṭhānapaññatti,
atk-s0519a0:487_0: Natthi rāgoti aggamaggabhāvanāya samucchinnattā natthi ce rāgo.
atk-s0519a0:487_1: Appatiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ aviruḷhanti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāyābhāvena appatiṭṭhitañceva
atk-s0519a0:488_0: “Ayaṃ pariññāpaññattī”tiādinā ekābhisamayavaseneva maggasammādiṭṭhi catūsu ariyasaccesu pavattatīti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:488_1: Ayaṃ bhāvanāpaññattīti ayaṃ dvārārammaṇehi chadvārappavattanadhammānaṃ aniccānupassanā maggassa bhāvanāpaññatti.
atk-s0519a0:488_2: Nirodhapaññatti nirodhassāti rodhasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya maggena anavasesanirodhapaññatti.
atk-s0519a0:488_6: Āsāṭikānanti gunnaṃ vaṇesu nīlamakkhikāhi ṭhapitaaṇḍakā āsāṭikā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:488_8: tassa sattassa anayabyasanahetutāya āsāṭikā viyāti āsāṭikā, kilesā,
atk-s0519a0:489_1: Evaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭamukhena sammasanaupādānakkhandhamukheneva saccesu paññattivibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni teparivaṭṭavasena dassetuṃ “idaṃ ‘dukkha’nti me,
atk-s0519a0:490_0: Tulamatulañcāti gāthāya pacurajanānaṃ paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:490_3: tulaṃ vā sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyakammaṃ natthīti atulaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:490_19: savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ bhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji,
atk-s0519a0:490_20: saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato samāhito hutvā abhindīti.
atk-s0519a0:491_4: tesaṃ nirodho nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulayanto buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ nibbāne ānisaṃsañca
atk-s0519a0:491_5: disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhāraṃ kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena avassaji. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0519a0:491_7: So hi vipassanāvasena ajjhattarato samathavasena samāhito kavacamiva attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0519a0:491_8: attani sambhavattā “attasambhava”nti laddhanāmaṃ sabbaṃ kilesajātaṃ abhindi,
atk-s0519a0:491_9: kilesābhāve kammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0519a0:492_6: Samādhānavisiṭṭhassa ajjhattaratabhāvassa vasena “bhāvanāpaññatti kāyagatāya satiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:492_7: Ajjhattaratatāvisiṭṭhassa pana samādhānassa vasena “ṭhitipaññatti cittekaggatāyā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:492_12: Kilesābhāvena bhagavā kammaṃ jahatīti dassento “padālanāpaññatti avijjaṇḍakosāna”nti āha.
atk-s0519a0:493_0: Yo dukkhamaddakkhi yatonidānanti yo āraddhavipassako sabbaṃ tebhūmakaṃ dukkhaṃ adakkhi passi,
atk-s0519a0:493_3: Kāmesu so jantu kathaṃ nameyyāti so evaṃ paṭipanno puriso savatthukāmesu kilesakāmesu yena pakārena nameyya abhinameyya,
atk-s0519a0:493_6: Yasmā imasmiṃ loke kāmasadisaṃ bandhanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0519a0:493_7: Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā “na taṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrā”tiādi,
atk-s0519a0:493_9: Tesaṃ satīmā vinayāya sikkheti kāyagatāsatiyogena satimā tesaṃ kāmānaṃ vūpasamāya tīsupi sikkhāsu appamatto sikkheyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:495_0: Mohasambandhano lokoti ayaṃ loko avijjāhetukehi saṃyojanehi bandho.
atk-s0519a0:495_1: Bhabbarūpova dissatīti vipannajjhāsayopi māyāya sāṭheyyena ca paṭicchāditasabhāvo bhabbajātikaṃ viya attānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:495_3: tamasā parivāritoti tassa pana bālassa tathā dassane sammohatamasā parivāritattā kāmaguṇesu anādīnavadassitāya kilesābhisaṅkhārehi bandhattā.
atk-s0519a0:495_4: Tathā bhūto cāyaṃ bālo paṇḍitānaṃ assirī viya khāyati alakkhiko eva hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0519a0:495_6: Paṇḍitassa pana paññācakkhunā passato natthi kiñcananti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0519a0:496_1: Natthi nibbānanti paramatthato alabbhamānasabhāvattāti vippaṭipannānaṃ micchāvādaṃ bhañjituṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ – “atthi,
atk-s0519a0:496_9: na idha sabbassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ siyā.
atk-s0519a0:496_10: Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo maggadhammā anavasesakilese samucchindanti,
atk-s0519a0:497_1: yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ rūpānañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0519a0:497_2: evaṃ taṃsabhāvānaṃ saṅkhabhadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhuratāsabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:497_7: Api ca anulomañāṇaṃ kilese na samucchedavasena pajahituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0519a0:498_2: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti vacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:498_9: evampi yuttivasena asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:498_17: dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādinā ca anekehi suttapadehi nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo desitoti.
atk-s0519a0:501_2: Tattha asekkhā vimuttīti ayaṃ tedhātuke vītarāgatā asekkhā phalavimutti.
atk-s0519a0:501_4: Ayaṃ indriyehi otaraṇāti asekkhāya vimuttiyā niddhāritehi saddhādīhi indriyehi saṃvaṇṇanāya otaraṇā.
atk-s0519a0:502_0: Pañcindriyāni vijjāti sammāsaṅkappo viya sammādiṭṭhiyā upakārakattā paññākkhandhe saddhādīni cattāri
atk-s0519a0:502_3: Ye saṅkhārā anāsavāti taṃ saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ viseseti,
atk-s0519a0:502_7: Yadipi pubbe vītarāgatā asekkhā vimutti dassitā,
atk-s0519a0:502_8: tassā pana paṭipattidassanatthaṃ “ayaṃ ahamasmīti anānupassī”ti dassanamaggo idha vuttoti imamatthaṃ
atk-s0519a0:503_6: So hi taṇhācaritassa patiṭṭhābhāvena tathā vutto.
atk-s0519a0:503_8: Rattassa cetanāti cetanāpadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ cetanāsīsena taṇhaṃ eva vadati.
atk-s0519a0:503_11: Yasmā pana viparītābhiniveso mohassa balavabhāve eva hoti,
atk-s0519a0:504_0: Evaṃ cetanāsīsena taṇhādiṭṭhiyo vatvā idāni tattha nippariyāyena cetanaṃyeva gaṇhanto “cetanā pana saṅkhārā”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:504_2: ayaṃ sukhā vedanāti sukhāya vedanāya rāgo anusetīti katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:504_3: Tathā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjā anusetīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:504_9: Yathā vā sesadhammānaṃ taṇhāya nissayabhāve puggalo taṇhāya nissitoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:504_10: Evaṃ taṇhāya sesadhammānaṃ paccayabhāve puggalo taṇhāya nissitoti vuccatīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:505_3: Yasmā pana sā darathapaṭippassaddhi kāyacittānaṃ sukhe sati pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0519a0:505_4: tasmā “yaṃ kāyikaṃ sukha”ntiādinā phalūpacārena vuttāya passaddhiyā natiabhāvassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “passaddhakāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:505_6: Rūpasaṅkhaye vimuttoti rūpānaṃ saṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimutto.
atk-s0519a0:505_7: Atthītipi na upetīti sassato attā ca loko cātipi taṇhādiṭṭhiupayena na upeti na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a0:505_9: Atthi natthīti ekaccaṃ sassataṃ ekaccaṃ asassatanti.
atk-s0519a0:505_12: Nibbutoti atthītiādinā upagamanakilesānaṃ vūpasamena parinibbuto sītibhūto.
atk-s0519a0:506_3: Idha huranti dvārārammaṇadhammā dassitāti “ubhayamantarenā”ti padena dvārappavattadhamme dassento “phassasamuditesu dhammesū”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:506_5: phassena saddhiṃ phassena kāraṇabhūtena ca samuditesu sambhūtesu viññāṇavedanāsaññācetanāvitakkavicārādidhammesu.
atk-s0519a0:506_6: Attānaṃ na passatīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anattabhāveneva tattha attānaṃ na passati.
