atk-s0519a0:506_7: Virajjati virāgā vimuccatīti padehi lokuttaradhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādabhāvaṃ dassento tadatthatāya sīlādīnampi
atk-s0519a0:510_2: Tattha bhagavā padaṃ sodhetīti “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti vadanto bhagavā –
atk-s0519a0:510_3: “kenassu nivuto loko”ti āyasmatā ajitena pucchāvasena vuttaṃ padaṃ sodheti nāma,
atk-s0519a0:510_5: No ca ārambhanti na tāva ārambhaṃ sodheti,
atk-s0519a0:510_7: Suddho ārambhoti ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa pabodhitattā sodhito ārambhoti attho.
atk-s0519a0:510_8: Aññāṇapakkhandānaṃ dveḷhakajātānaṃ vā pucchanakāle pucchitānaṃ pucchāvisayo avijaṭaṃ mahāgahanaṃ viya mahāduggaṃ viya ca andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:510_9: Yadā ca bhagavatā paṇḍitehi vā bhagavato sāvakehi apade padaṃ dassentehi nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ katvā pañhe
atk-s0519a0:510_10: vissajjite mahatā gandhahatthinā abhibhavitvā obhaggapadālito gahanappadeso viya vigatandhakāro vibhūto
atk-s0519a0:513_3: na pana tattha kiñci vikappetabbāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:513_5: Taṃ taṃ phalaṃ maggati gavesatīti maggo,
atk-s0519a0:513_13: Na suranti na bhāsanti na dibbantīti asurā.
atk-s0519a0:513_26: paṭipakkhe vā tathā appavatte uppajjanārahassa paṭipakkhavuttiyā anuppādo.
atk-s0519a0:514_16: Cha ākārā vemattatāti imamatthaṃ dassento “dvīhi ākārehi dhātuyo pariggaṇhātī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:515_0: Tattha kesāti kesā nāma upādinnakasarīraṭṭhakā kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko pathavīdhātukoṭṭhāso.
atk-s0519a0:515_2: matthaluṅgaṃ nāma sarīraṭṭhakaṃ kakkhaḷalakkhaṇaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāsoti ayaṃ vemattatā.
atk-s0519a0:515_6: Santappatīti ayaṃ kāyo santappati ekāhikajarādibhāvena usumajāto hoti.
atk-s0519a0:515_7: Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jarīyati.
atk-s0519a0:515_9: Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kupitena ayaṃ kāyo ḍayhati,
atk-s0519a0:515_10: so ca puggalo “ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī”ti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepanaṃ tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati.
atk-s0519a0:515_11: Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti asitaṃ vā odanādi,
atk-s0519a0:515_14: sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0519a0:515_16: Ettha ca purimā tayo tejodhātū catusamuṭṭhānā.
atk-s0519a0:516_4: Aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātāti dhamanijālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakā vātā.
atk-s0519a0:516_9: Evaṃ vemattatādassanavasena vibhāgena udāhaṭā catasso dhātuyo paṭikkūlamanasikāravasena upasaṃharanto “imehi dvācattālīsāya ākārehī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:517_0: Evaṃ paṭikkūlamanasikāraṃ dassetvā puna tattha sammasanacāraṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “tenāha bhagavā yā ceva kho panā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:518_1: Evaṃ saccamaggarūpadhammavasena adhiṭṭhānahāraṃ dassetvā idāni avijjāvijjādīnampi vasena taṃ dassetuṃ “avijjāti ekattatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:518_2: Tattha “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādīsu yasmā avijjā dukkhasaccassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0519a0:518_4: Tathā yasmā dukkhasamudayassa dukkhanirodhassa dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a0:518_5: jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0519a0:519_0: Tatthāyaṃ avijjā yasmā atītānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ yāva paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0519a0:519_1: jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0519a0:519_2: tasmā “pubbante aññāṇaṃ yāva paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇa”nti vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:519_4: Ayañhi imāni aṭṭha ṭhānāni jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detīti kiccato kathitā.
atk-s0519a0:519_5: Uppajjamānāpi imesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu uppajjatīti jātito kathitā.
atk-s0519a0:519_6: Evaṃ kiccato jātito ca kathitāpi lakkhaṇato kathite eva sukathitā hotīti lakkhaṇato dassetuṃ “aññāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:520_0: Tattha ñāṇaṃ atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
atk-s0519a0:520_1: Ayaṃ pana avijjā uppajjitvā taṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ na detīti ñāṇapaccanīkato aññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:520_4: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā passituṃ na detīti adassanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:520_7: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ abhisametuṃ na detīti anabhisamayo.
atk-s0519a0:520_9: sā taṃ ākāraṃ anubujjhati sambujjhati paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0519a0:520_10: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ anubujjhituṃ sambujjhituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detīti ananubodho asambodho appaṭivedho.
atk-s0519a0:520_11: Tathā sallakkhaṇaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ paccupalakkhaṇaṃ samapekkhaṇantipi paññā,
atk-s0519a0:520_12: sā taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhati upalakkhati paccupalakkhati samaṃ sammā ca apekkhati.
atk-s0519a0:520_13: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā tassa tathā kātuṃ na detīti asallakkhaṇaṃ anupalakkhaṇaṃ apaccupalakkhaṇaṃ asamapekkhaṇanti ca vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:521_6: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pajānituṃ na detīti asampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:521_14: Appahīnaṭṭhena ceva punappunaṃ uppajjanato ca avijjānusayo.
atk-s0519a0:521_15: Magge pariyuṭṭhitacorā viya addhike kusalacittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti viluppatīti avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:521_16: Yathā nagaradvāre palighasaṅkhātāya laṅgiyā patitāya manussānaṃ nagarappaveso pacchijjati,
atk-s0519a0:521_18: tassa nibbānasampāpakaṃ ñāṇagamanaṃ pacchijjatīti avijjālaṅgī nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a0:521_22: idhādhippeto mohoti moho akusalamūlanti ayaṃ ekapadiko avijjāya atthuddhāro.
atk-s0519a0:522_3: “Dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīsu dukkhasaccassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānāti passati paṭivijjhatīti dukkhe ariyasacce visayabhūte ñāṇaṃ “dukkhe ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:522_5: Paññāti tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena paññā,
atk-s0519a0:522_6: tena tena vā aniccādinā pakārena dhamme jānātīti paññā.
atk-s0519a0:522_20: ayampi saṇhaṭṭhena vitthataṭṭhena ca bhūrī viyāti bhūrī.
atk-s0519a0:522_23: tāya pathavisamāya vitthatāya paññāya samannāgatoti bhūripañño”ti.
atk-s0519a0:523_3: taṃ sattaṃ hitapaṭipattiyaṃ sampayuttaṃ vā yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhe pariṇetīti pariṇāyikā.
atk-s0519a0:523_6: Uppathapaṭipanne sindhave vīthiāropanatthaṃ patodo viya uppathe dhāvanakūṭacittaṃ vīthiāropanatthaṃ vijjhatīti patodo viyāti patodo.
atk-s0519a0:524_2: Ratikaraṇaṭṭhena ratidāyakaṭṭhena ratijanakaṭṭhena cittīkataṭṭhena dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena atulaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a0:524_5: sayaṃ vā ārammaṇe na muyhatīti amoho.
atk-s0519a0:524_11: so na kevalaṃ mohato añño dhammo,
atk-s0519a0:524_14: Dhammavicayasaṅkhāto pasattho sundaro vā bojjhaṅgoti dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo.
atk-s0519a0:525_1: Anuppanne hi buddhe ekacce titthāyatane pabbajitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya saññāya dosaṃ passanti,
atk-s0519a0:525_2: saññāya sati hatthacchedādidukkhañceva sabbabhayāni ca honti,
atk-s0519a0:525_4: saññābhāvo santo”ti evaṃ saññāya dosaṃ passitvā saññāvirāgavasena catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā asaññīsu nibbattanti.
atk-s0519a0:526_0: Te yathā nāma jiyāvegukkhitto saro yattako jiyāvego,
atk-s0519a0:526_4: Jhānavege pana parikkhīṇe tattha rūpakkhandho antaradhāyati,
atk-s0519a0:526_9: Sā hi paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa paṭhamāruppasaññāyapi vibhāvanato “vibhūtasaññā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:527_4: Tathā hi khaluṅko asso damathaṃ na upeti ito cito ca yathāruci dhāvati,
atk-s0519a0:527_7: katamettāvatā”ti uttaridamathāya aparisakkanto abhiññācittavasena ito cito ca dhāvati pavattati,
atk-s0519a0:528_10: Sasaṅkhāro samādhīti dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño sukhāpaṭipado ca dandhābhiñño.
atk-s0519a0:528_11: So hi sasaṅkhārena sappayogena cittena paccanīkadhamme kicchena kasirena niggahetvā adhigantabbo.
atk-s0519a0:528_15: Ubhayato bhāvitabhāvano samādhīti kāyasakkhino ubhatobhāgavimuttassa ca samādhi.
atk-s0519a0:528_16: So hi ubhayato bhāgehi ubhayato bhāvitabhāvano.
atk-s0519a0:529_2: Nijjhāmapaṭipadāti kāmassa nijjhāpanavasena khedanavasena pavattā paṭipatti,
atk-s0519a0:529_4: Akkhamā paṭipadātiādīsu padhānakaraṇakāle sītādīni asahantassa paṭipadā,
atk-s0519a0:529_7: “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā nayena micchāvitakke sametīti samā.
atk-s0519a0:530_5: Ekī bhavatīti anekopi “dukkha”ntiādinā ekasaddābhidheyyatāya ekī bhavati.
atk-s0519a0:530_7: Yena yena vā pana vilakkhaṇoti yo dhammo yassa dhammassa yena yena bhāvena visadiso.
atk-s0519a0:530_8: Tena tena vemattaṃ gacchatīti tena tena bhāvena so dhammo tassa dhammassa vemattataṃ visadisattaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0519a0:530_9: dukkhabhāvena samānopi jātiādiko abhinibbattiādibhāvena jarādikassa visiṭṭhataṃ gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:531_0: Idāni tāva ekattavemattatāvisaye niyojetvā dassetuṃ “sutte vā veyyākaraṇe vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:534_2: Tattha yo dhammo yaṃ dhammaṃ janayati,
atk-s0519a0:534_3: tassa so parikkhāroti saṅkhepato parikkhāralakkhaṇaṃ vatvā taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “kiṃlakkhaṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:534_4: Tattha hinoti attano phalaṃ paṭikāraṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti hetu.
atk-s0519a0:534_7: tathāpi tattha visesaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “asādhāraṇalakkhaṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:534_9: Nanu ca bījaṃ aṅkurādisadisaṃ na hotīti?
atk-s0519a0:535_0: “Yathā vā panā”tiādināpi udāharaṇantaradassanena hetupaccayānaṃ visesameva vibhāveti.
atk-s0519a0:535_2: Dadhi bhavatīti ekattanayena abhedopacārena vā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:535_6: “na catthi ekakālasamavadhānaṃ duddhassa ca dadhissa cā”ti.
atk-s0519a0:535_7: Atha vā ghaṭe duddhaṃ pakkhittaṃ dadhi bhavati,
atk-s0519a0:535_9: tasmā na catthi ekakālasamavadhānaṃ duddhassa ca dadhissa ca rasakhīravipākādīhi bhinnasabhāvattā.
atk-s0519a0:535_10: Evamevanti yathā hetubhūtassa khīrassa phalabhūtena dadhinā na ekakālasamavadhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:535_13: na hi paccayo ekantena phalena bhinnakālo evāti.
atk-s0519a0:536_0: Evaṃ bāhiraṃ hetupaccayavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni ajjhattikaṃ dassetuṃ “ayañhi saṃsāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:536_1: Tattha “avijjā avijjāya hetū”ti vutte kiṃ ekasmiṃ cittuppāde anekā avijjā vijjantīti?
atk-s0519a0:536_3: Tena ekasmiṃ kāle hetuphalānaṃ samavadhānaṃ natthīti etamevatthaṃ samattheti.
atk-s0519a0:536_4: Tattha “purimikā avijjā”tiādinā hetuphalabhūtānaṃ avijjānaṃ vibhāgaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:536_6: yathā bījaṃ aṅkurassa hetu hontaṃ samanantarahetutāya hetu hoti.
atk-s0519a0:537_4: Iti sabhāvo hetūti evaṃ padīpujjālanādīsu aggiādipadīpasadisaṃ kāraṇaṃ sabhāvo hetu.
atk-s0519a0:537_5: Parabhāvo paccayoti tattheva kapallikāvaṭṭitelādisadiso aggito añño sabhāvo paccayo.
atk-s0519a0:538_2: tasmā kāraṇassa yo kāraṇabhāvo yathā ca so hoti,
atk-s0519a0:538_3: yañca phalaṃ yo ca tassa viseso,
atk-s0519a0:538_10: Yo phalabhūto aññassa akāraṇaṃ hutvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0519a0:538_13: Yo pana attano anurūpassa phalassa hetu hutvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0519a0:539_0: Yasmā ca kāraṇato nibbattaṃ phalaṃ nāma,
atk-s0519a0:539_3: Yasmā pana purimabhavena anantarabhavapaṭisandhānavasena pavattā upapattikkhandhā punabbhavo,
atk-s0519a0:539_7: taṃ palibundhenti sammā paṭipajjituṃ na denti.
atk-s0519a0:539_13: Pariññābhisamayavasena pariññāte na kadāci taṃ nāmarūpaṅkurassa kāraṇaṃ hessatīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:539_15: Yattha avupacchedo tattha santatīti yattha rūpārūpappavattiyaṃ yathāvutto avupacchedo,
atk-s0519a0:539_17: Yattha santati tattha nibbattītiādi paccayaparamparadassanaṃ hetuphalasambandhavibhāvanameva.
atk-s0519a0:540_0: “Yathā vā pana cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādinā “sabhāvo hetū”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāgena dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:540_3: Sā hi cakkhuviññāṇassa viññāṇabhāvena samānajātitāya sabhāvo hetu.
atk-s0519a0:540_4: Saṅkhārā viññāṇassa paccayo sabhāvo hetūti puññādiabhisaṅkhārā paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayo,
atk-s0519a0:540_7: Saṅkhārāti cettha sabbo lokiyo kusalākusalacittuppādo adhippeto.
atk-s0519a0:540_9: Evaṃ yo koci upanissayo sabbo so parikkhāroti yathāvuttappabhedo yo koci paccayo,
atk-s0519a0:540_10: so sabbo attano phalassa parikkharaṇato abhisaṅkharaṇato parikkhāro.
atk-s0519a0:543_2: Tattha ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāneti yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ kāraṇabhūte dhamme suttena gahite.
atk-s0519a0:543_3: Yattakāni padaṭṭhānāni otarantīti yattakāni aññesaṃ kāraṇabhūtāni tasmiṃ dhamme samosaranti.
atk-s0519a0:543_4: Sabbāni tāni samāropayitabbānīti sabbāni tāni padaṭṭhānāni padaṭṭhānabhūtā dhammā sammā niddhāraṇavasena ānetvā desanāya āropetabbā,
atk-s0519a0:543_7: pariyesati sesakaṃ padaṭṭhāna”nti vacanato anekesaṃ padaṭṭhānānaṃ pariyesanā vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:543_8: evamidhāpi bahūnaṃ padaṭṭhānānaṃ samāropanā kātabbāti dassento “yathā āvaṭṭe hāre”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:543_10: atha kho vevacanabhāvanāpahānavasenapi samāropanā kātabbāti dassento “tattha samāropanā catubbidhā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:544_3: idha pana padaṭṭhānavevacanaggahaṇaṃ bhāvanāpahānānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavisayadassanatthañceva tesaṃ adhivacanavibhāgadassanatthañca.
atk-s0519a0:544_4: Evañhi bhāvanāpahānāni suviññeyyāni honti sukarāni ca paññāpetuṃ.
atk-s0519a0:544_5: Idaṃ padaṭṭhānanti idaṃ tividhaṃ sucaritaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanassa ovādassa visayādhiṭṭhānabhāvato padaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:544_6: Tattha “kāyika”ntiādinā tīhi sucaritehi sīlādayo tayo khandhe samathavipassanā tatiyacatutthaphalāni ca niddhāretvā dasseti,
atk-s0519a0:545_1: Ayaṃ vevacanena samāropanāti yo “rāgavirāgā cetovimutti sekkhaphalaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:546_1: kāye kāyānupassī viharāhītiādi lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:546_2: Kevalaṃ tattha ekalakkhaṇattā avuttānampi vuttabhāvadassanavaseneva āgataṃ,
atk-s0519a0:546_4: Kāyānupassanā visesato asubhānupassanā eva kāmarāgatadekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ ekantapaṭipakkhāti asubhasaññā
atk-s0519a0:546_5: kabaḷīkārāhārapariññāya paribandhakilesā kāmupādānaṃ kāmayogo abhijjhākāyagantho kāmāsavo kāmogho rāgasallaṃ
atk-s0519a0:546_6: rūpadhammapariññāya paṭipakkhakilesā rūpadhammesu rāgo chandāgatigamananti etesaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahānāya
atk-s0519a0:550_0: Ādivacanato sabbaṃ vedanaṃ “dukkha”nti passantī sukhasaññāya vedanāhetupariññāya paribandhakilesānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:550_1: gosīlādīhi bhavasuddhi hotīti vedanāssādena pavattassa bhavupādānasaṅkhātassa sīlabbatupādānassa vedanāvasena
atk-s0519a0:550_2: “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinayappavattassa byāpādakāyaganthassa dosasallassa vedanāssādavaseneva pavattassa
atk-s0519a0:550_4: rāgassa dosāgatigamanassa ca pahānāya saṃvattatīti etamatthaṃ dasseti “vedanāsu vedanānupassī”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:551_1: sā cittaṃ “anicca”nti passantī tattha yebhuyyena sattā niccasaññinoti niccasaññāya viññāṇāhārapariññāya
atk-s0519a0:551_4: saññāya rāgassa diṭṭhābhinivesassa appahīnattā uppajjanakassa bhayāgatigamanassa ca pahānāya saṃvattatīti
atk-s0519a0:552_1: sā saṅkhāresu attasaññāya manosañcetanāhārapariññāya paṭipakkhakilesānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā “idameva sacca”nti
atk-s0519a0:552_3: avijjāya saṅkhārapariññāya paribandhakilesānaṃ saṅkhāresu rāgassa mohāgatigamanassa ca pahānāya saṃvattatīti
atk-s0519a0:556_0: Evaṃ suparikammakatāya bhūmiyā nānāvaṇṇāni muttapupphāni pakiranto viya susikkhitasippācariyavicāritesu
atk-s0519a0:556_1: surattasuvaṇṇālaṅkāresu nānāvidharaṃsijālasamujjalāni vividhāni maṇiratanāni bandhanto viya mahāpathaviṃ
atk-s0519a0:556_2: parivattetvā pappaṭakojaṃ khādāpento viya yojanikamadhugaṇḍaṃ pīḷetvā sumadhurasaṃ pāyento viya ca āyasmā
atk-s0519a0:556_3: mahākaccāno nānāsuttapadese udāharanto soḷasa hāre vibhajitvā idāni te ekasmiṃyeva sutte yojetvā dassento
atk-s0519a0:559_0: Saṅkhipiya aṅkusena hi, nayehi tīhi niddise sutta”nti. –
atk-s0519a0:560_4: Anekehi suttapadesehi hārānaṃ vibhāgadassanameva hi hāravibhaṅgavāro.
atk-s0519a0:560_6: ekasmiṃyeva suttapadese soḷasa hāre yojetvāva tadanantaraṃ nayasamuṭṭhānassa kathitattā.
atk-s0519a0:560_7: Tasmā “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti gāthaṃ paccāmasitvā “tassā niddeso kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0519a0:560_11: Etena suttesu hārānaṃ yojanānayadassanaṃ hārasampātavāroti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:561_0: Arakkhitena cittenāti cakkhudvārādīsu satiārakkhābhāvena aguttena cittena.
atk-s0519a0:561_2: Thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti cittassa kāyassa ca akalyatālakkhaṇehi thinamiddhehi ajjhotthaṭena.
atk-s0519a0:561_3: Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatīti kilesamārādīnaṃ yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyo hotīti ayaṃ tāva gāthāya padattho.
atk-s0519a0:562_0: Pamādanti “arakkhitena cittenā”ti idaṃ padaṃ chasu dvāresu sativosaggalakkhaṇaṃ pamādaṃ katheti.
atk-s0519a0:562_1: Taṃ maccuno padanti taṃ pamajjanaṃ guṇamāraṇato maccusaṅkhātassa mārassa vasavattanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:562_3: vasaṃ mārassa gacchatī”ti paṭhamapādaṃ catutthapādena sambandhitvā dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:562_4: So vipallāsoti yaṃ aniccassa khandhapañcakassa “nicca”nti dassanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:562_8: Sabbaṃ vipallāsasāmaññena gahetvā tassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ pucchati “kiṃ vipallāsayatī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:562_9: Sāmaññassa ca viseso adhiṭṭhānabhāvena voharīyatīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:562_13: aniccādikassa visayassa micchāvasena upaṭṭhitākāraggahaṇamattaṃ migapotakānaṃ tiṇapurisakesu purisoti uppannasaññā viya.
atk-s0519a0:562_15: amaṇiādike visaye maṇiādiākārena upaṭṭhahante tathā sanniṭṭhānaṃ viya niccādito sanniṭṭhānamattaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:562_16: Diṭṭhivipallāso pana sabbabalavataro yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathā yathā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0519a0:562_17: tathā tathā naṃ sassatādivasena “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti abhinivisanto pavattati.
atk-s0519a0:563_0: Idāni vipallāsānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ visayaṃ dassetuṃ “so kuhiṃ vipallāsayati,
atk-s0519a0:563_3: Te hi āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā,
atk-s0519a0:563_4: “attā”ti bhavati ettha buddhi vohāro cāti attabhāvo,
atk-s0519a0:563_5: so eva subhādīnaṃ vipallāsassa ca adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vatthu cāti “attabhāvavatthū”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:563_6: “Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā tesaṃ sabbavipallāsamūlabhūtāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena
atk-s0519a0:563_7: attabhāvavatthutaṃ dassetvā puna vipallāsānaṃ pavattiākārena saddhiṃ visayaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ
atk-s0519a0:563_10: Puna mūlakāraṇavasena vipallāse vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “dve dhammā cittassa saṃkilesā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:563_13: tathāpi taṇhā etāsaṃ sātisayaṃ paccayoti dassetuṃ “taṇhānivutaṃ…pe…
atk-s0519a0:563_15: Diṭṭhinivutanti diṭṭhisīsena avijjā vuttāti avijjānivutanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:563_18: Taṇhāpi “niccaṃ attā”ti ayoniso ummujjantānaṃ tathāpavattamicchābhinivesassa moho visesapaccayoti dassetuṃ “diṭṭhinivutaṃ…pe…
atk-s0519a0:564_4: Etena aṭṭhārasavidhopi pubbantānukappikavādo pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ vasena hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:564_7: dukkhe sukha”nti etaṃ vipallāsadvayaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0519a0:564_8: Anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandatīti anāgataṃ rūpaṃ diṭṭhābhinandanavasena abhinandati.
atk-s0519a0:564_11: Etena catucattālīsavidhopi aparantānukappikavādo yebhuyyena purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ vasena hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:564_12: Dve dhammā cittassa upakkilesāti evaṃ paramasāvajjassa vipallāsassa mūlakāraṇanti visesato dve dhammā
atk-s0519a0:564_13: cittassa upakkilesā taṇhā ca avijjā cāti te sarūpato dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:564_14: Tāhi visujjhantaṃ cittaṃ visujjhatīti paṭipakkhavasenapi tāsaṃ upakkilesabhāvaṃyeva vibhāveti,
atk-s0519a0:564_15: na hi taṇhāavijjāsu pahīnāsu koci saṃkilesadhammo na pahīyatīti.
atk-s0519a0:564_17: evaṃ sakalassāpi vaṭṭassa mūlakāraṇanti yathānusandhināva gāthaṃ niṭṭhapetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:564_18: Tattha tesanti yesaṃ arakkhitaṃ cittaṃ micchādiṭṭhihatañca, tesaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:565_0: Thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti ettha “thinaṃ nāmā”tiādinā thinamiddhānaṃ sarūpaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:565_1: Tehi cittassa abhibhūtatā suviññeyyāvāti taṃ anāmasitvā kilesamāraggahaṇeneva taṃnimittā abhisaṅkhāramārakhandhamāramaccumārā
atk-s0519a0:565_2: gahitā evāti “kilesamārassa ca sattamārassa cā”ti ca-
atk-s0519a0:565_3: saddena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:565_4: So hi nivuto saṃsārābhimukhoti so māravasaṃ gato,
atk-s0519a0:565_5: tato eva nivuto kilesehi yāva na mārabandhanaṃ chijjati,
atk-s0519a0:566_0: Tattha duvidhā kathā abhidhammanissitā ca suttantanissitā ca.
atk-s0519a0:566_1: Tāsu abhidhammanissitā nāma arakkhitena cittenāti rattampi cittaṃ arakkhitaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:566_4: Tattha rattaṃ cittaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ lobhasahagatacittuppādānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:566_5: duṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭighacittuppādānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:566_6: mūḷhaṃ cittaṃ dvinnaṃ momūhacittuppādānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:566_7: Yāva imesaṃ cittuppādānaṃ vasena indriyānaṃ agutti agopāyanā apālanā anārakkhā sativosaggo pamādo cittassa asaṃvaro,
atk-s0519a0:566_9: Micchādiṭṭhihataṃ nāma cittaṃ catunnaṃ diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:566_10: thinamiddhābhibhūtaṃ nāma cittaṃ pañcannaṃ sasaṅkhārikākusalacittuppādānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:566_11: Evaṃ sabbepi aggahitaggahaṇena dvādasa akusalacittuppādā honti.
atk-s0519a0:566_13: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā cittuppādakaṇḍe akusalacittuppādadesanāvasena vitthārato vattabbā.
atk-s0519a0:566_15: Tesu kilesamārassa catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ catunnaṃ oghānaṃ catunnaṃ yogānaṃ catunnaṃ ganthānaṃ catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:566_16: aṭṭhannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dasannaṃ kilesavatthūnaṃ vasena āsavagocchakādīsu vuttanayena,
atk-s0519a0:566_17: tathā “jātimado gottamado ārogyamado”tiādinā khuddakavatthuvibhaṅge āgatānaṃ sattannaṃ kilesānañca vasena vibhāgo vattabbo.
atk-s0519a0:567_0: Suttantanissitā pana arakkhitena cittenāti cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī,
atk-s0519a0:567_1: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0519a0:567_9: Micchādiṭṭhihatena cāti micchādiṭṭhihataṃ nāma cittaṃ pubbantakappanavasena vā aparantakappanavasena
atk-s0519a0:567_10: vā pubbantāparantakappanavasena vā micchābhinivisantassa ayoniso ummujjantassa “sassato lokoti vā…pe…
atk-s0519a0:567_11: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā yā diṭṭhi,
atk-s0519a0:567_14: pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā”ti brahmajāle pañcattaye ca āgatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0519a0:568_4: Iti thinena middhena ca cittaṃ abhibhūtaṃ ajjhotthaṭaṃ upaddutaṃ saṅkocanappattaṃ layāpannaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:568_5: Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatīti vaso nāma icchā lobho adhippāyo ruci ākaṅkhā āṇā āṇatti.
atk-s0519a0:568_9: āṇattiṃ gacchati upagacchati upeti vattati anuvattati nātikkamatīti.
atk-s0519a0:569_5: Evaṃ bhagavatā idha dve saccāni desitāni.
atk-s0519a0:569_8: Tesaṃ bhagavā pariññāya ca pahānāya ca dhammaṃ desetīti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:573_2: yasmā arakkhitena cittena vasaṃ mārassa gacchati,
atk-s0519a0:573_3: tasmā satisaṃvarena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ rakkhaṇena rakkhitacitto assa.
atk-s0519a0:573_4: Sammāsaṅkappagocaroti yasmā kāmasaṅkappādimicchāsaṅkappagocaro tathā tathā ayoniso vikappetvā nānāvidhāni micchādassanāni gaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a0:573_5: Tato eva ca micchādiṭṭhihatena cittena vasaṃ mārassa gacchati,
atk-s0519a0:573_6: tasmā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto nekkhammasaṅkappādisammāsaṅkappagocaro assa.
atk-s0519a0:573_7: Sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvāti sammāsaṅkappagocaratāya vidhutamicchādassano kammassakatālakkhaṇaṃ yathābhūtañāṇalakkhaṇañca
atk-s0519a0:573_9: Tato eva ca ñatvāna udayabbayaṃ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu samapaññāsāya ākārehi uppādaṃ nirodhañca ñatvā
atk-s0519a0:573_10: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā anukkamena ariyamagge gaṇhanto aggamaggena thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhu sabbā duggatiyo
atk-s0519a0:573_11: jaheti evaṃ sabbaso bhinnakilesattā bhikkhu khīṇāsavo yathāsambhavaṃ tividhadukkhatāyogena duggatisaṅkhātā
atk-s0519a0:574_1: ayaṃ nirodhoti pahānassa nirodhassa paccayabhāvato asaṅkhatadhātu pahānaṃ nirodhoti ca vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:574_2: Imāni cattāri saccānīti purimagāthāya purimāni dve,
atk-s0519a0:574_3: pacchimagāthāya pacchimāni dveti dvīhi gāthāhi bhāsitāni imāni cattāri ariyasaccāni.
atk-s0519a0:577_1: Evaṃ desanāhārasampātaṃ dassetvā idāni vicayahārasampātaṃ dassento yasmā desanāhārapadatthavicayo vicayahāro,
atk-s0519a0:577_2: tasmā desanāhāre vipallāsahetubhāvena niddhāritāya taṇhāya kusalādivibhāgapavicayamukhena vicayahārasampātaṃ
atk-s0519a0:577_5: saddo cettha bāhitikasutte viya anavajjatthe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:577_7: Heṭṭhā desanāhāre vipallāsahetubhāvena taṇhaṃ uddharitvā tassā vasena saṃkilesapakkho dassito.
atk-s0519a0:577_8: Vicittapaṭibhānatāya pana idhāpi taṇhāmukheneva vodānapakkhaṃ dassetuṃ kusalapariyāyena taṇhā uddhaṭā.
atk-s0519a0:577_19: na taṇhā evāti taṇhāya nidassanabhāvena māno vutto.
atk-s0519a0:578_0: Tattha mānassa yathādhippetaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ mānaṃ nissāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:578_5: Yaṃ nekkhammassitaṃ domanassantiādi “kusalā”ti vuttataṇhāya sarūpadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:579_1: Rūpānaṃtveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ ‘pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca,
atk-s0519a0:579_2: sabbete rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā anuttaresu vimokkhesu
atk-s0519a0:579_3: pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi,
atk-s0519a0:579_5: Iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati pihā,
atk-s0519a0:580_0: Evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate anuttaravimokkhasaṅkhātaariyaphaladhammesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0519a0:580_1: tadadhigamāya aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā ussukkāpetuṃ asakkontassa “imampi pakkhaṃ imampi māsaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:580_3: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato uppannaṃ domanassaṃ nekkhammavasena
atk-s0519a0:580_4: vipassanāvasena anussativasena paṭhamajjhānādivasena paṭipattiyā hetubhāvena uppajjanato nekkhammassitaṃ
atk-s0519a0:580_6: Ayaṃ taṇhā kusalāti ayaṃ “pihā”ti vuttā taṇhā kusalā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0519a0:580_13: Taṃ uddissa pavattiyā tadārammaṇā pana taṇhā kusalārammaṇatāya kusalāti.
atk-s0519a0:580_16: Yāya vasena “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti gāthāyaṃ “sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:581_0: Iti cirataraṃ vipassanāparivāsaṃ parivasitvā dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññāya adhigatāya paññāvimuttiyā vasena
atk-s0519a0:581_3: tasmā catutthajjhānapādake ariyamaggadhamme uddisitvā tesaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “kattha daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0519a0:581_6: Yehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:582_18: Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:582_26: Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:583_4: Icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ pavattānaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kopaapaccayānanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:583_15: “so tattha aṭṭhavidhaṃ adhigacchati cha abhiññā dve ca visese”ti.
atk-s0519a0:584_8: tato pariyodāta”ntiādinā purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa kāraṇavacananti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:584_9: Tadubhayanti yesaṃ rāgādiaṅgaṇānaṃ abhijjhādiupakkilesānañca abhāvena “anaṅgaṇaṃ vigatūpakkilesa”nti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:584_10: Tāni aṅgaṇāni upakkilesā cāti taṃ ubhayaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:584_11: Tadubhayaṃ taṇhāsabhāvattā taṇhāya anulomanato ca taṇhāpakkho.
atk-s0519a0:584_12: Yā ca iñjanāti yā ca cittassa asamādānena phandanā.
atk-s0519a0:584_14: Ayaṃ diṭṭhipakkhoti yā iñjanā aṭṭhiti ca,
atk-s0519a0:585_1: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ upari abhiññādhigamāya abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:585_2: Sā ca abhinīhārakkhamatā cuddasahi ākārehi ciṇṇavasibhāvasseva hoti.
atk-s0519a0:585_4: na rūpāvacarajjhānamattalābhinoti āruppasamāpattiyā manasikāravidhiṃ dassento “so uparimaṃ samāpattiṃ santato manasikarotī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:585_7: Yato yato hi āruppasamāpattiṃ santato manasikaroti,
atk-s0519a0:585_8: tato tato rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ avūpasantaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0519a0:585_12: Ukkaṇṭhā ca paṭighasaññāti paṭighasaññāsaṅkhātāsu pañcaviññāṇasaññāsu anabhirati saṇṭhahati.
atk-s0519a0:585_14: Abhiññābhinīhāro rūpasaññāti rūpāvacarasaññā nāmetā yāvadeva abhiññatthābhinīhāramattaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:585_15: na pana arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo viya santāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:585_16: Vokāro nānattasaññāti nānattasaññā nāmetā nānārammaṇesu vokāro,
atk-s0519a0:585_18: Samatikkamatīti evaṃ tattha ādīnavadassī hutvā tā samatikkamati.
atk-s0519a0:585_19: Paṭighasaññā cassa abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti assa ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ adhigacchantassa yogino dasapi paṭighasaññā vigacchanti.
atk-s0519a0:586_0: Evaṃ samāhitassāti evaṃ iminā vuttanayena rūpāvacarajjhāne cittekaggatāyapi samatikkamena samāhitassa.
atk-s0519a0:586_10: Tattha sabbaloketi sabbasmiṃ piyarūpe sātarūpe sattaloke saṅkhāraloke ca.
atk-s0519a0:586_13: Puna tāni cha aṅgāni samathavipassanāvasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yañca anabhijjhāsahagata”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:587_1: Ettāvatā “paññāvimuttī”ti vuttassa arahattaphalassa samādhimukhena pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0519a0:587_3: Tattha so samādhīti yo so sammāsamādhi.
atk-s0519a0:587_4: Pubbe vuttassa ariyamaggasamādhissa phalabhūto samādhi pañcavidhena veditabbo idāni vuccamānehi pañcahi
atk-s0519a0:587_6: “Ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho”tiādīsu arahattaphalasamādhi appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā paccuppannasukho.
atk-s0519a0:587_7: Purimo purimo pacchimassa pacchimassa samādhisukhassa paccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko.
atk-s0519a0:587_15: Passaddhaṃ passaddhīti hi idaṃ atthato ekaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:587_19: Appaguṇasāsavasamādhi viya sasaṅkhārena sappayogena paccanīkadhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā nasasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagatoti.
atk-s0519a0:588_0: Yato yato bhāgato tañca samādhiṃ samāpajjanto,
atk-s0519a0:588_1: tato vā vuṭṭhahanto sativepullappatto satova samāpajjati satova vuṭṭhahati,
atk-s0519a0:588_2: yathāparicchinnakālavasena vā sato samāpajjati sato vuṭṭhahati.
atk-s0519a0:588_3: Tasmā yadettha “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti evaṃ paccavekkhantassa paccattameva aparappaccayañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0519a0:588_6: Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ paccavekkhitabbākārānaṃ vasena samādhi pañcavidhena veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:589_0: Puna “yo ca samādhī”tiādinā arahattaphale samathavipassanāvibhāgaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:589_1: Tattha samādhisukhassa “sukha”nti adhippetattā “yo ca samādhi paccuppannasukho,
atk-s0519a0:590_0: Evaṃ arahattaphalasamādhiṃ vibhāgena dassetvā idāni tassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ samādhivibhāgena dassetuṃ “so samādhī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:590_1: Tattha so samādhīti yo so arahattaphalasamādhissa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyaṃ vutto rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānasamādhi,
atk-s0519a0:590_4: “Pītipharaṇatā”tiādīsu pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:590_5: Sukhaṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti tīsu jhānesu paññā sukhapharaṇatā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:590_6: Paresaṃ ceto pharamānā uppajjatīti cetopariyapaññā cetopharaṇatā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:590_13: tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhitassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇanimitta”nti.
atk-s0519a0:591_0: Idha samathavipassanāvibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “yo ca pītipharaṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:591_1: Ettha ca paññāsīsena desanā katāti paññāvasena saṃvaṇṇanā katā.
atk-s0519a0:591_2: Paññā pītipharaṇatātiādīsu samādhisahagatā evāti tattha samādhivasena samatho uddhaṭo.
atk-s0519a0:591_3: Tasmā pītisukhacetopharaṇatā visesato samādhivipphāravasena ijjhantīti tā “samatho”ti vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:592_1: Idāni taṃ samādhiṃ ārammaṇavasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “dasa kasiṇāyatanānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:592_2: Tattha kasiṇajjhānasaṅkhātāni kasiṇāni ca tāni yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato,
atk-s0519a0:592_10: Pathavīkasiṇādike suddhasamathabhāvanāvasena pavattite sandhāya “imāni aṭṭha kasiṇāni samatho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:593_1: Sabbo ariyamaggoti sammādiṭṭhiādibhāvena abhinnopi ariyamaggo satipaṭṭhānādipubbabhāgapaṭipadābhedena anekabhedabhinno niravaseso ariyamaggo.
atk-s0519a0:593_3: paccuppannasukhatādīsu ca ākāresu yena yena ākārena vutto.
atk-s0519a0:593_4: Tena tenāti tesu tesu ākāresu ye ye samathavasena,
atk-s0519a0:593_5: ye ca ye ca vipassanāvasena yojetuṃ sambhavanti,
atk-s0519a0:593_6: tena tena ākārena samathavipassanāhi ariyamaggo vicinitvā yojetabbo.
atk-s0519a0:593_8: Tīhi dhammehi saṅgahitāti tīhi anupassanādhammehi saṅgahitā,
atk-s0519a0:594_0: So samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayatīti so ariyamaggādhigamāya yuttappayutto
atk-s0519a0:594_1: yogī kālena samathaṃ samāpajjanavasena kālena vipassanaṃ sammasanavasena vaḍḍhayamāno animittavimokkhamukhādisaṅkhātā
atk-s0519a0:594_3: Tayo khandhe bhāvayatīti tisso anupassanā uparūparivisesaṃ pāpento sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho paññākkhandhoti ete tayo khandhe vaḍḍheti.
atk-s0519a0:594_4: Yasmā pana tīhi khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito,
atk-s0519a0:594_5: tasmā “tayo khandhe bhāvayanto ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvayatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:595_0: Idāni yesaṃ puggalānaṃ yattha sikkhantānaṃ visesato niyyānamukhāni yesañca kilesānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtāni tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni,
atk-s0519a0:595_4: rāgādīnaṃ samucchedavimuttiyā vimokkhoti laddhanāmassa ariyamaggassa mukhabhāvato dvārabhāvato “animittavimokkhamukha”nti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:595_6: Sukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ anupagacchantoti sukhavedanāya hitaṃ sukhavedanākāraṇato phassaṃ taṇhāya anupagacchanto.
atk-s0519a0:595_7: Sukhaṃ vedanaṃ parijānantoti “ayaṃ sukhā vedanā vipariṇāmādinā dukkhā”ti parijānanto,
atk-s0519a0:596_0: Paññādhikassa santatisamūhakiccārammaṇādighanavinibbhogena saṅkhāresu attasuññatā pākaṭā hotīti visesato anattānupassanā paññāpadhānāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:596_2: Tathā saṅkhārānaṃ sarasapabhaṅgutāya ittarakhaṇattā uppannānaṃ tattha tattheva bhijjanaṃ sammā samāhitasseva
atk-s0519a0:596_3: pākaṭaṃ hotīti visesato aniccānupassanā samādhippadhānāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:596_5: Tathā sīlesu paripūrakārino khantibahulassa uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ aratiñca abhibhuyya viharato saṅkhārānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:596_6: dukkhatā vibhūtā hotīti dukkhānupassanā sīlappadhānāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:596_8: Iti tīhi vimokkhamukhehi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ saṅgahitattā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:596_9: “so tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayanto tayo khandhe bhāvayatī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:596_10: Yasmā ca tīhi ca khandhehi ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa saṅgahitattā tayo khandhe bhāvayanto “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvayatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:596_11: Tasmā tehi tassa saṅgahaṃ dassento “yā ca sammāvācā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:597_0: Puna tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ samathavipassanābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sīlakkhandho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:597_10: Sammā kāyabhāvanāya sati accantaṃ kāyaduccaritappahānaṃ anavajjañca uṭṭhānaṃ sampajjati.
atk-s0519a0:597_11: Tathā anuttare sīle sijjhamāne anavasesato micchāvācāya micchājīvassa ca pahānaṃ sampajjati.
atk-s0519a0:597_12: Cittapaññāsu ca bhāvitāsu sammāsatisammāsamādhisammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gatā eva honti
atk-s0519a0:597_13: taṃsabhāvattā tadubhayakāraṇattā cāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “kāye bhāviyamāne”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:598_0: Pañcavidhaṃ adhigamaṃ gacchatīti ariyamaggādhigamameva avatthāvisesavasena pañcadhā vibhajitvā dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:598_1: Ariyamaggo hi khippaṃ sakiṃ ekacittakkhaṇeneva catūsu saccesu attanā adhigantabbaṃ adhigacchatīti na
atk-s0519a0:598_2: tassa lokiyasamāpattiyā viya vasibhāvanākiccaṃ atthīti khippādhigamo ca hoti.
atk-s0519a0:598_4: Lokiyehi mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ adhigamanabhāvato mahādhigamo ca.
atk-s0519a0:598_6: Attanā kattabbassa kassaci anavasesato anavasesādhigamo ca hotīti.
atk-s0519a0:598_9: keci vipassanānubhāvenāti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha samathenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:599_1: Iti mahāthero “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti gāthāya vasena arahattaphalavimuttimukhena vicayahārasampātaṃ
atk-s0519a0:599_2: niddisanto desanākusalatāya anekehi suttappadesehi tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya bhāvanāvisesānaṃ bhāvanānisaṃsānañca
atk-s0519a0:599_3: vibhajanavasena nānappakārato vicayahāraṃ dassetvā idāni dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānampi vasena taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a0:599_5: Ovādena sāvake na visaṃvādayatīti attano anusiṭṭhiyā dhammassa savanato “sāvakā”ti laddhanāme veneyye na vippalambheti na vañceti,
atk-s0519a0:599_6: visaṃvādanahetūnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ ariyamaggena bodhimūle eva suppahīnattā.
atk-s0519a0:599_9: Idaṃ karothāti imaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sīlādiñca upasampajja viharatha.
atk-s0519a0:599_10: Iminā upāyena karothāti anenapi vidhinā saraṇāni sodhentā sīlādīni paripūrentā sampādetha.
atk-s0519a0:599_11: Idaṃ vo kurumānānanti idaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sīlādiñca tumhākaṃ anutiṭṭhantānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasamparāyanibbānānaṃ vasena hitāya sukhāya ca bhavissati,
atk-s0519a0:600_2: taṃ tathāgatabalehi vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “so tathā ovadito”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:600_8: Taṃ bhūminti yassā bhūmiyā adhigamatthāya ovadito,
atk-s0519a0:600_10: Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0519a0:600_11: Kāraṇañhi tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti “ṭhāna”nti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:600_12: Dutiyavāre bhūminti sīlakkhandhena pattabbaṃ sampattibhavasaṅkhātaṃ bhūmiṃ.
atk-s0519a0:601_0: Idāni yasmā bhagavato catuvesārajjānipi aviparītasabhāvatāya paṭhamaphalañāṇassa visayaviseso hoti,
atk-s0519a0:601_1: tasmā tānipi tassa visayabhāvena dassetuṃ “sammāsambuddhassa te sato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:601_2: Tattha sammāsambuddhassa te satoti ahaṃ sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0519a0:601_3: mayā sabbe dhammā abhisambuddhāti paṭijānanena sammāsambuddhassa te sato.
atk-s0519a0:601_4: Ime dhammā anabhisambuddhāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti “ime nāma tayā dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti koci sahadhammena sahetunā sakāraṇena vacanena,
atk-s0519a0:601_6: Tasmā sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0519a0:601_8: Yassa te atthāya dhammo desitoti rāgādīsu yassa yassa pahānatthāya asubhabhāvanādidhammo kathito.
atk-s0519a0:603_4: Puthujjanoti puthūnaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano.
atk-s0519a0:606_3: Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññe jīvitā voropeyyāti?
atk-s0519a0:606_5: Sacepi bhavantaragataṃ ariyasāvakaṃ attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantampi koci evaṃ vadeyya “idaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ
atk-s0519a0:606_13: Puthujjanabhāvassa pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca baladīpanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:606_16: Yatra hi nāma mātughākādīnipi ānantariyāni karissati,
atk-s0519a0:607_0: Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghaṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0519a0:607_3: ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti.
atk-s0519a0:608_0: Tattha kammenāti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarakammena.
atk-s0519a0:608_3: tāhi tāhi upapattīhi “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūni dīpayanto.
atk-s0519a0:608_4: Anussāvanenāti “nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccakulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca,
atk-s0519a0:608_5: mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ gāheyyāti kiṃ tumhākaṃ cittampi uppādetuṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:608_6: kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena.
atk-s0519a0:608_7: Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anivattidhammaṃ katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
atk-s0519a0:609_0: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:609_2: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya gāhitāyapi abhinno eva hoti saṅgho.
atk-s0519a0:609_3: Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gāhetvā āveṇikaṃ kammaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā karonti,
atk-s0519a0:609_5: Evaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṃ bhindeyya saṅgharājiṃ vā janeyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti.
atk-s0519a0:610_1: Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya.
atk-s0519a0:610_2: Ettāvatā hi mātughātādīni pañcānantariyakammāni dassitāni honti.
atk-s0519a0:611_0: Aññaṃ satthāranti “ayaṃ me satthā satthu kiccaṃ kātuṃ samattho”ti bhavantarepi aññaṃ titthakaraṃ.
atk-s0519a0:611_1: Apadiseyyāti “ayaṃ me satthā”ti evaṃ gaṇheyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0519a0:611_2: Ito bahiddhā aññaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyeseyyāti sāsanato bahiddhā aññaṃ bāhirakaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā “ayaṃ dakkhiṇāraho,
atk-s0519a0:611_3: imasmiṃ katā kārā mahapphalā bhavissantī”ti adhippāyena tasmiṃ paṭipajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:611_4: Kutūhalamaṅgalena suddhiṃ pacceyyāti “iminā idaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ pavattattā kutūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena
atk-s0519a0:612_1: Itthī rājā cakkavattī siyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti yasmā itthiyā kosohitavatthaguyhādīnaṃ abhāvena lakkhaṇāni na paripūranti,
atk-s0519a0:612_3: Sabbamanussānampi ca na adhiko attabhāvo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:612_11: tasmā puriso mahābrahmā siyāti na vattabbanti?
atk-s0519a0:612_14: Itthiyo hi idha jhānaṃ bhāvetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmapārisajjānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti,
atk-s0519a0:612_16: Puriso pana katthaci na uppajjatīti na vattabbo.
atk-s0519a0:612_17: Samānepi tattha ubhayaliṅgābhāve purisasaṇṭhānāva tattha brahmāno,
atk-s0519a0:612_20: Itthī tathāgatoti ettha tiṭṭhatu tāva sabbaññuguṇe nibbattetvā lokānaṃ tāraṇasamattho buddhabhāvo,
atk-s0519a0:616_1: Iti paṇidhānamattampi sampādetuṃ asamatthāya itthiyā kuto buddhabhāvoti “itthī tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho siyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:616_2: Sabbākāraparipūro puññussayo sabbākāraparipūrameva attabhāvaṃ nibbattetīti purisova arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho.
atk-s0519a0:617_4: Yā ekato saṃvaṭṭati ca vivaṭṭati ca,
atk-s0519a0:617_10: ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyya”nti vacanato avisayo nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a0:617_11: Iti imesu tīsu khettesu tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane “ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantī”ti suttaṃ natthi,
atk-s0519a0:618_0: Apubbaṃ acarimanti apure apacchā ekato na uppajjanti,
atk-s0519a0:618_1: pure vā pacchā vā uppajjantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:618_3: Tato paṭṭhāya hi dasasahassicakkavāḷakampanena khettapariggaho kato nāma hoti,
atk-s0519a0:618_6: tato heṭṭhāpi aññassa buddhassa uppatti natthi,
atk-s0519a0:619_0: Kasmā pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ na uppajjantīti?
atk-s0519a0:619_6: Yadi ca aneke buddhā ekato uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0519a0:619_12: Bahūsu hi buddhesu ekato uppannesu bahūnaṃ ācariyānaṃ antevāsikā viya “amhākaṃ buddho pāsādiko”tiādinā tesaṃ sāvakā vivadeyyuṃ.
atk-s0519a0:619_14: dhammatāvesā yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve tathāgatā ekato na uppajjantīti.
atk-s0519a0:620_0: Yathā nimbabījakosātakibījādīni madhuraṃ phalaṃ na nibbattenti,
atk-s0519a0:620_2: evaṃ kāyaduccaritādīni madhuravipākaṃ na nibbattenti amadhurameva nibbattenti.
atk-s0519a0:620_3: Yathā ca ucchubījasālibījādīni madhuraṃ sādurasameva phalaṃ nibbattenti na asātaṃ kaṭukaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:620_4: Evaṃ kāyasucaritādīni madhurameva vipākaṃ nibbattenti na amadhuraṃ.
atk-s0519a0:624_0: Aññataro samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti yo koci pabbajjāmattena samaṇo vā jātimattena brāhmaṇo vā.
atk-s0519a0:624_4: Kuhanalapananemittakattaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvāti kuhanādibhāvameva purakkhatvā santindriyo santamānaso viya caranto.
atk-s0519a0:624_8: Nīvaraṇā hi cittaṃ upakkilesenti kiliṭṭhaṃ karonti vibādhenti upatāpenti ca.
atk-s0519a0:624_11: Nīvaraṇā hi uppajjamānā anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti.
atk-s0519a0:625_0: Pacchimavāre aññataro samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti sabbaññubodhisattaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0519a0:625_1: Tattha sabbadosāpagatoti sabbehi pāramitāpaṭipakkhabhūtehi dosehi apagato.
atk-s0519a0:625_10: Yaṃ ettha ñāṇanti yaṃ etasmiṃ yathāvutte ṭhāne ca ṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:625_12: Hetusoti tassa ṭhānassa aṭṭhānassa ca hetuto.
atk-s0519a0:626_2: te eva ca sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtā keci saggūpagā ye dhammacārino,
atk-s0519a0:626_4: keci nibbānūpagā ye kammakkhayakaraṃ ariyamaggaṃ paṭipannā.
atk-s0519a0:627_1: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “sabbe sattā marissantī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0519a0:627_2: Tassa atthaṃ “sabbe sattāti ariyā ca anariyā cā”tiādinā sayameva niddisati.
atk-s0519a0:627_3: Tattha jīvitapariyanto maraṇapariyantoti jīvitassa pariyanto nāma maraṇasaṅkhāto anto.
atk-s0519a0:627_4: Yathākammaṃ gamissantīti ettha yadetaṃ sattānaṃ yathākammaṃ gamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:627_6: Kammānaṃ phaladassāvitā ca avippavāso cāti “puññapāpaphalūpagā”ti iminā vacanena kammānaṃ phalassa paccakkhakāritā,
atk-s0519a0:627_7: katūpacitānaṃ kammānaṃ attano phalassa appadānābhāvo ca dassitoti attho.
atk-s0519a0:628_7: Puna “nirayaṃ pāpakammantā”tiādinā antadvayena saddhiṃ majjhimapaṭipadaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:628_8: Tathā “ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādinā vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena ādīnavassādanissaraṇavasena hetuphalavasena ca gāthāyaṃ tayo atthavikappā dassitā.
atk-s0519a0:628_9: Puna “nirayaṃ pāpakammantāti ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādinā vodānavasena gāthāya atthaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:629_1: Tena tenāti tena tena ajjhositavatthunā rūpabhavaarūpabhavādinā.
atk-s0519a0:630_0: Vodānaṃ tividhaṃ khandhattayavasenāti taṃ dassetuṃ “taṇhāsaṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:630_1: Puna “sabbe sattā marissantī”tiādi paṭipadāvibhāgena gāthānamatthaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:630_2: Tattha tattha gāminīti tattha tattheva nibbāne gāminī,
atk-s0519a0:631_0: Puna tatthatatthagāminīsabbatthagāminīnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tayo rāsī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:631_2: Taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ yathārahaṃ gametīti sabbatthagāminī.
atk-s0519a0:631_3: Paṭipadāsaṅkhāte apuññakamme puññakamme ca kammakkhayakaraṇakamme ca vibhāgaso bhagavato pavattanañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:631_5: Iminā hi ñāṇena bhagavā sabbampi paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0519a0:632_1: Sakalagāmavāsikesupi ekaṃ sūkaraṃ vā migaṃ vā mārentesu sabbesaṃ cetanā parassa jīvitindriyārammaṇāva hoti,
atk-s0519a0:632_2: taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva nānā hoti.
atk-s0519a0:632_5: eko samānacchando viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati.
atk-s0519a0:632_6: Tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati,
atk-s0519a0:632_9: taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇe eva “iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati,
atk-s0519a0:633_0: “Tesu ca kammesu idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0519a0:633_1: idaṃ nākaḍḍhissati dubbalaṃ dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0519a0:633_2: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato dānaṃ dadamānesu sabbesampi cetanā deyyadhammārammaṇāva hoti,
atk-s0519a0:633_3: taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇe eva nānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:633_6: taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇe eva “iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa manussaloke nibbattissati,
atk-s0519a0:633_11: esa tassa dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ vā ṭhānantaraṃ karonto paricārako hutvā nibbattissatī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0519a0:634_0: “Tesu ca kammesu idaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0519a0:634_1: idaṃ na sakkhissati dubbalaṃ dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0519a0:634_2: Tathā “vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesu ca esa iminā nīhārena vipassanāya āraddhattā arahā bhavissati,
atk-s0519a0:634_7: esa maggaṃ pattuṃ na sakkhissati lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāyameva ṭhassati,
atk-s0519a0:634_12: esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0519a0:635_0: Anekadhātūti anekā cakkhādayo pathavādayo ca dhātuyo etassāti anekadhātu,
atk-s0519a0:635_8: Kāmadhātūti ettha dve kāmā kilesakāmo ca vatthukāmo ca.
atk-s0519a0:635_12: kāmo ca so dhātu cāti kāmadhātu.
atk-s0519a0:635_21: Nekkhammaabyāpādaavihiṃsādhātuyo nekkhammavitakkādayo sabbakusaladhammā mettākaruṇā cāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:636_0: Aññamaññavilakkhaṇattā nānappakārā dhātuyo etasminti nānādhātu, loko.
atk-s0519a0:636_3: yathā ca idaṃ ñāṇaṃ cakkhudhātuādibhedena upādinnakasaṅkhāralokassa vasena anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ pajānāti,
atk-s0519a0:636_5: Paccekabuddhā hi dve ca aggasāvakā upādinnakasaṅkhāralokasseva nānattaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0519a0:636_9: Bhagavā pana “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannāya imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti,
atk-s0519a0:636_15: Imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannāya imassa rukkhassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0519a0:636_16: imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ hoti pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:636_17: imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannāya phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0519a0:636_18: pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ tittaṃ madhuraṃ kaṭukaṃ ambilaṃ kasāvaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:636_19: imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannāya imassa rukkhassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:636_20: atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo kaṇho nīlo odāto hotī”ti evaṃ anupādinnasaṅkhāralokassāpi vasena anekadhātunānādhātubhāvaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0519a0:637_1: Yaṃ yadeva dhātunti yaṃ kiñci hīnādisabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:637_4: Taṃ pana tassa taṃ taṃ adhiṭṭhahanaṃ abhinivisanañca hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:637_7: Adhimuccanassa visayaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “keci rūpādhimuttā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:638_0: Te yathādhimuttā ca bhavantīti te hīnādhimuttikā paṇītādhimuttikā sattā yathā yathā adhimuttā honti.
atk-s0519a0:638_1: Taṃ taṃ kammasamādānaṃ samādiyantīti adhimuttianurūpaṃ taṃ taṃ attanā samādiyitabbaṃ kattabbaṃ kammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0519a0:638_2: tāni kammasamādānāni samuṭṭhānavasena vibhajanto “te chabbidhaṃ kamma”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:638_3: Tattha keci lobhavasena kammaṃ samādiyantīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:638_5: Taṃ vibhajjamānanti taṃ samuṭṭhānavasena chabbidhaṃ puna pavattinivattivasena vibhajjamānaṃ duvidhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:639_0: Yaṃ lobhavasena dosavasena mohavasena ca kammaṃ karotīti dasaakusalakammapathakammaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0519a0:639_6: Yaṃ lobhavasena dosavasena mohavasena saddhāvasena ca kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0519a0:639_9: Missakakammañhi katvā akusalavalena tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthibhāvaṃ upapanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ anubhavati,
atk-s0519a0:639_10: kusalena rājakule nibbattopi akusalena dukkhaṃ vedayati.
atk-s0519a0:639_11: Yaṃ vīriyavasena paññāvasena ca kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0519a0:639_12: idaṃ kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākanti kammakkhayakarā catumaggacetanā.
atk-s0519a0:639_17: Ubhayavipākassa pana appadānato akaṇhaasukkavipākanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0519a0:640_4: Yaṃ evaṃ jātiyaṃ kammasamādānanti yaṃ aññampi evaṃpakāraṃ kammaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:640_5: Iminā puggalenātiādi tasmiṃ kammavipāke bhagavato ñāṇassa pavattanākāradassanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:640_6: Tattha upacitanti yathā kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:640_10: Na ca bhabbo abhinibbidhā gantunti kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ abhinibbijjhanato abhinibbidhāsaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggaṃ adhigantuṃ na ca bhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:640_11: Taṃ bhagavā na ovadatīti taṃ vipākāvaraṇena nivutaṃ puggalaṃ bhagavā saccapaṭivedhaṃ purakkhatvā na ovadati,
atk-s0519a0:640_12: vāsanatthaṃ pana tādisānampi dhammaṃ deseti eva,
atk-s0519a0:641_4: Purā pāripūriṃ gacchatīti pāripūriṃ phalanipphādanasamatthataṃ gacchati purā adhigaccheyya.
atk-s0519a0:641_5: Micchattaniyatatāya sajjukaṃ phaladhammassa abhājanabhāvaṃ nibbattayati purā.
atk-s0519a0:642_1: Evaṃ kilesantarāyamissakaṃ kammantarāyaṃ dassetvā idāni amissakaṃ kammantarāyaṃ dassetuṃ “imassa ca puggalassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:643_0: Sabbesanti imasmiṃ balaniddese vuttānaṃ sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:643_2: Kammānañhi muduādibhāvena taṃvipākānaṃ mudumajjhatikkhabhāvo viññāyatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:643_3: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyantiādīsu diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃ attabhāve veditabbaṃ phalaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:643_4: Upapajje anantare attabhāve veditabbaṃ phalaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:643_5: Aparasmiṃ attabhāve ito aññasmiṃ yasmiṃ kasmiñci attabhāve veditabbaṃ phalaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:643_6: Ekajavanavārasmiñhi sattasu cetanāsu paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a0:643_14: So ca nesaṃ kāraṇabhāvo “atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantī”tiādipāḷivasena veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:644_1: Anantarabalaniddese vuttakammasamādānapadeneva jhānādīni saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “tathā samādinnānaṃ kammāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:644_9: iminā ākārena jhānādi saṃkilissati vodāyati vuṭṭhahatīti jānanañāṇaṃ bhagavato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:645_0: Kati jhānānītiādi jhānādayo vibhāgena dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:645_2: Ekādasāti “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādinā aṭṭhannaṃ tiṇṇañca suññatavimokkhādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:645_3: Aṭṭhāti tesu ṭhapetvā lokuttare vimokkhe aṭṭha.
atk-s0519a0:645_4: Sattāti tesu eva nirodhasamāpattiṃ ṭhapetvā satta.
atk-s0519a0:645_7: Ettha ca paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe vikkhambhanavasena paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato,
atk-s0519a0:645_9: Nirodhasamāpatti pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi vimuttattā apagamavimokkho nāma.
atk-s0519a0:645_10: Lokuttarā ca taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi samucchedavasena vimuttattā vimokkhoti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:646_0: Samādhīsu catukkanayapañcakanayesu paṭhamajjhānasamādhi savitakko savicāro samādhi nāma.
atk-s0519a0:646_1: Pañcakanaye dutiyajjhānasamādhi avitakko vicāramatto samādhi nāma.
atk-s0519a0:646_2: Catukkanaye pañcakanayepi sesajhānesu samādhi avitakko avicāro samādhi nāma.
atk-s0519a0:647_0: Samāpattīsu paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ “samādhī”tipi nāmaṃ “samāpattī”tipi. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:648_0: Hānabhāgiyo samādhīti appaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādianupakkhandanaṃ paṭhamajjhānādisamādhissa hānabhāgiyatā.
atk-s0519a0:648_5: Yo paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ vā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā “alamettāvatā”ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0519a0:648_9: Tesu purimāni dve āsannabalavapaccatthikattā visesabhāgiyatābhāvato ca saṃkilesabhāvena vuttāni.
atk-s0519a0:648_10: Itarāni pana visesabhāgiyatābhāvepi mandapaccatthikattā vodānabhāvena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:649_0: Visesabhāgiyo samādhīti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādipakkhandanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:649_2: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:649_4: Bhavaṅgavasena sabbajhānehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti bhavaṅgañca vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:649_5: Yasmā pana vuṭṭhānavasibhāvena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:650_1: Tasseva samādhissāti tassa anantarabalaniddese jhānādipariyāyehi vuttasamādhissa.
atk-s0519a0:650_6: Vīriyupatthambhena hi saddhādayo paṭipakkhena akampanīyā honti.
atk-s0519a0:651_0: Veneyyānaṃ indriyānurūpaṃ bhagavato desanāpavattīti dassetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:651_5: Mudukanti lahukaṃ apāyabhayavaṭṭabhayādīhi santajjanavasena bhāriyaṃ akatvā.
atk-s0519a0:651_8: Samathaṃ upadisatīti samathaṃ adhikaṃ katvā upadisati,
atk-s0519a0:651_10: Na hi kevalena samathena saccappaṭivedho sambhavati.
atk-s0519a0:652_0: Yaṃ ettha ñāṇanti ettha indriyānaṃ mudumajjhādhimattatāya yaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:652_1: idaṃ vuccati parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattavemattatāñāṇanti sambandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:652_2: Tassa ñāṇassa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ imaṃ bhūmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:652_3: Tattha ayaṃ imaṃ bhūmiṃ bhāvanañca gatoti ayaṃ puggalo evamimaṃ saṃkilesavāsanaṃ vodānaṃ bhavaṅgañca gato gacchati gamissati ca,
atk-s0519a0:652_6: Imāya velāya imasmiṃ samaye imāya mudumajjhatikkhabhedāya anusāsaniyā.
atk-s0519a0:652_8: Ayañcassa āsayoti imassa puggalassa ayaṃ sassatucchedappakāro,
atk-s0519a0:652_10: Idañhi catubbidhaṃ āsayanti ettha sattā vasantīti āsayoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:652_11: Imaṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vipassanāñāṇakammassakataññāṇānañca appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti eva.
atk-s0519a0:652_13: “kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti.
atk-s0519a0:652_14: Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti.
atk-s0519a0:652_18: ālokasaññaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo thinamiddhagaruko thinamiddhāsayo thinamiddhādhimutto”’ti.
atk-s0519a0:653_0: Ayaṃ anusayoti ayaṃ imassa puggalassa kāmarāgādiko appahīnoyeva anusayitakileso.
atk-s0519a0:653_5: Ekatthameva vā etaṃ padadvayaṃ veneyyavasena dvidhā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:653_6: Indriyaparopariyattavemattatāñāṇanti parabhāvo ca aparabhāvo ca paropariyattaṃ a-
atk-s0519a0:653_9: Saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattavemattatāya ñāṇaṃ indriyaparopariyattavemattatāñāṇanti padavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:654_0: Tattha yanti yaṃ anekavihitassa pubbenivāsassa anussaraṇavasena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:654_4: Pubbenivāsanti anussarituṃ icchitaṃ attano paresañca samanantarātītaṃ bhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:654_5: Anussaratīti “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti evaṃ jātipaṭipāṭiyā anugantvā sarati,
atk-s0519a0:654_11: Ekampi jātinti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:655_0: Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo,
atk-s0519a0:655_12: amumhi bhave vā yoniyaṃ vā gatiyaṃ vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyaṃ vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā.
atk-s0519a0:655_17: Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti anekappakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisappabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
atk-s0519a0:655_18: Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ vassasataparamāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasahassaparamāyupariyanto vā.
atk-s0519a0:655_19: So tato cuto amutra udapādinti so tato bhavato,
atk-s0519a0:655_20: sattanikāyato vā cuto puna amukasmiṃ nāma sattanikāye udapādiṃ.
atk-s0519a0:655_21: Atha vā tatrāpi bhave vā sattanikāye vā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0519a0:656_2: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattampi pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttattā dūrepi ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti.
atk-s0519a0:656_3: Idampi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:656_18: so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati.
atk-s0519a0:658_0: “So kho ahaṃ anuruddhā ‘vicikicchā cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā vicikicchaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-s0519a0:658_9: atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahi”nti evamādi.
atk-s0519a0:660_0: Satte passatīti manusso manussaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya satte passati oloketi.
atk-s0519a0:660_1: Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunāpi daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0519a0:660_9: Dubbaṇṇeti dosanissandayuttattā aniṭṭhākantāmanāpavaṇṇayutte abhirūpe virūpe vāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:660_18: Yathākammūpagañāṇaanāgataṃsañāṇāni ca dibbacakkhupādakāneva dibbacakkhunā saheva ijjhanti.
atk-s0519a0:661_7: antamaso gihisotāpannānampi antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena vā upavādakā akkosakā garahakā.
atk-s0519a0:661_10: Ye ca micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti.
atk-s0519a0:661_11: Tattha vacīmanoduccaritaggahaṇena ariyūpavādamicchādiṭṭhīsu gahitāsupi tesaṃ puna vacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:662_2: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya,
atk-s0519a0:662_5: vadāmi taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
atk-s0519a0:663_0: Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a0:665_2: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā.
atk-s0519a0:665_5: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā apetattā,
atk-s0519a0:665_8: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gati duggati.
atk-s0519a0:666_6: so hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā,
atk-s0519a0:666_11: so hi yathāvuttenatthena apāyo ceva duggati ca sukhasamussayehi vinipātattā vinipātoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:667_5: So sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho.
atk-s0519a0:667_7: anāgate vā saggūpago apāyūpago cāti aṭṭhamanavamabalañāṇakiccaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā dassitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:668_0: Nihato māro bodhimūleti nihato samucchinno kilesamāro bodhirukkhamūle.
atk-s0519a0:668_1: Idaṃ bhagavato dasamaṃ balanti idaṃ kilesamārassa hananaṃ samucchindanaṃ bhagavato dasamaṃ balaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:668_4: Yasmā pana yadā arahattamaggena savāsanā sabbe āsavā khepitā,
atk-s0519a0:669_20: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti.
atk-s0519a0:669_21: Etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ sabbaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0519a0:669_22: Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0519a0:669_24: maggo hutvā kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a0:670_0: Apica paravādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāmetaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ
atk-s0519a0:670_10: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana savitakkasavicārameva kāmāvacarameva lokiyamevāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:673_1: Evaṃ nānānayehi vicayahārasampātaṃ vitthāretvā idāni yuttihārasampātādīni dassetuṃ “tattha katamo yuttihārasampāto”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:673_3: Rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaro bhavissatīti yujjatīti manacchaṭṭhāni dvārāni satikavāṭena pidahitvā
atk-s0519a0:673_4: viharantassa kāmavitakkādīnaṃ micchāsaṅkappānaṃ avasaro eva natthīti nekkhammavitakkādiko sammāsaṅkappo
atk-s0519a0:673_5: eva tassa gocaro pavattiṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti ayamattho yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:673_7: Sammāsaṅkappagocaro sammādiṭṭhi bhavissatīti vuttanayena sammāsaṅkappagocaro puggalo aviparītameva vitakkato sammādiṭṭhi bhavissati.
atk-s0519a0:673_8: Sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ purakkhatvā viharanto maggañāṇena pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ asammohato paṭivijjhissati.
atk-s0519a0:673_9: Tathā paṭivijjhanto ca dukkhasabhāvattā duggatisaṅkhātā sabbā bhavagatiyo jahissati,
atk-s0519a0:673_10: tato eva sabbaṃ vinipātabhayaṃ saṃsārabhayañca samatikkamissatīti sabbopi cāyamattho yutto evāti.
atk-s0519a0:676_6: Nekkhammasaṅkappādibahulassa kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānaṃ sukaranti nekkhammasaṅkappādayo samathassa āsannakāraṇanti āha –
atk-s0519a0:676_9: passanto tadatikkamanupāyaṃ vipassanaṃ ārabhatīti sammādiṭṭhivipassanāya visesakāraṇanti āha –
atk-s0519a0:676_11: Udayabbayadassanaṃ ussukkāpento sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatīti taṃ paṭhamamaggādhigamassa kāraṇanti āha –
atk-s0519a0:676_13: Ālokasaññāmanasikārādīhi thinamiddhassa abhibhavanaṃ vīriyassa āsannakāraṇanti āha –
atk-s0519a0:676_15: Yadipi ariyamaggakkhaṇe pahānabhāvanā samānakālā ekābhisamayassa icchitattā,
atk-s0519a0:676_16: tathāpi pahātabbassa pahānābhāve bhāvanāpāripūrī natthīti pahānanimittā viya katvā bhāvanā vuttā “sabbā duggatiyo jaheti bhāvanāya padaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0519a0:676_17: Atha vā “sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti idaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ yogīnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ ānisaṃsakittanaṃ hotīti bhāvanāya visesakāraṇanti vuttaṃ “sabbā…pe…
atk-s0519a0:679_5: “tasmā rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti ettha rakkhitacittatāya ca sammāsaṅkappagocaratā kāraṇūpacārena idaṃ satindriyaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:679_6: gahitāni bhavanti pañcindriyāni indriyalakkhaṇena vimuttiparipācanabhāvena vā ekalakkhaṇattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:679_7: Gahito bhavatīti ettha maggalakkhaṇena gahaṇaṃ suviññeyyanti taṃ ṭhapetvā kāraṇato gahaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “sammādiṭṭhito
atk-s0519a0:679_9: Tato eva gahito bhavati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vatvā vimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanānipi vuttāni.
atk-s0519a0:682_3: Yasmā pana atthavasena nibbacane vutte padavasena nibbacanaṃ vuttameva hoti,
atk-s0519a0:682_8: Tena evamādikā evaṃpakārā vā esā niruttīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:683_0: Ayaṃ ettha bhagavato adhippāyoti “rakkhitacitto assā”tiādinā indriyasaṃvarādayo duggatipahānañca vadato bhagavato ettha gāthāyaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:683_5: yasmā kokāliko arakkhitacittatāya aggasāvakesu cittaṃ padosetvā padumanirayaṃ upapanno,
atk-s0519a0:683_6: tasmā duggatiyo jahitukāmo rakkhitacitto assāti bhagavā satiārakkhena cetasā samannāgato sabbā duggatiyo jahatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:686_1: Nekkhammasaṅkappabahulo kasiṇavasena mettādivasena vā laddhāya cittekaggatāsaṅkhātāya cittamañjūsāya
atk-s0519a0:686_2: cittaṃ ṭhapetvā samādhiṃyeva vā yathāladdhaṃ saṃkilesato rakkhitacitto nāma hotīti vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:686_6: Ariyamaggena dukkhasacce pariññāte udayabbayadassanaṃ matthakappattaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:686_9: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti hi maggañāṇassa pavattidassanāti.
atk-s0519a0:686_10: Imāni cattāri saccānīti catusaccadhammavasena āvaṭṭanaṃ niṭṭhapeti.
atk-s0519a0:689_2: so chabbidho dvāravasena cakkhudvārasaṃvaro yāva manodvārasaṃvaroti.
atk-s0519a0:690_11: Thinamiddhaṃ uppattibhūmito pañcavidhanti evaṃ akusalapakkhe vibhatti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a0:693_1: Parivattanahāre āvaṭṭahāre vuttanayena samathavipassanāniddhāraṇaṃ akatvā “samathavipassanāya bhāvitāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:693_4: Atha vā vibhattihāre niddiṭṭhassa akusalapakkhassa paṭipakkhenāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:696_1: “Mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho manoviññāṇadhātū”ti ca cittassa vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:696_2: “Takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā”ti ca sammāsaṅkappassa.
atk-s0519a0:696_4: “Thinaṃ thiyanā thiyitattaṃ cittassa akallatā akammaññatā onāho parināho antosaṅkoco”ti thinassa.
atk-s0519a0:696_5: “Akallatā akammaññatā kāyālasiyaṃ supyaṃ supyanā supitatta”nti middhassa.
atk-s0519a0:696_7: “Duggati apāyo vinipāto vaṭṭadukkhaṃ saṃsāro”tiādinā duggatiyā vevacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:699_1: Adhiṭṭhahitvā rakkhantiyā satiyā rakkhiyamānaṃ cittaṃ tassā adhiṭṭhānaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:699_3: Sesaṃ imasmiṃ paññattihārasampāte ito paresu otaraṇasodhanahārasampātesupi apubbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0519a0:702_1: Adhiṭṭhānahārasampāte sammādiṭṭhi nāma yaṃ dukkhe ñāṇantiādinā catusaccahetuhetusamuppannapaccayapaccayuppannasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0519a0:702_2: visayassa vasena vemattataṃ dassetvā puna yaṃ tattha tattha yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassananti pāḷipāḷiatthānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:702_4: Tattha yaṃ saccāgamananti yaṃ saccato aviparītato visayassa āgamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:705_0: Api cettha hārasampātaniddeso imināpi nayena veditabbo –
atk-s0519a0:707_0: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-s0519a0:709_1: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti manoti khandhavavatthānena viññāṇakkhandhaṃ deseti.
atk-s0519a0:709_11: Api ca imasmiṃ sutte mano adhippeto.
atk-s0519a0:709_14: Tattha tividhena mano pubbaṅgamo nekkhammachandena abyāpādachandena avihiṃsāchandena.
atk-s0519a0:710_0: Manoseṭṭhāti mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ mūlaṃ pamukhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:710_7: Te pana dhammā chandasamudānitā anāvilasaṅkappasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho.
atk-s0519a0:710_8: Manasā ce pasannenāti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo.
atk-s0519a0:710_9: Iti iminā pasādena upeto samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato,
atk-s0519a0:711_1: Nanti yo so katapuñño katakusalo katabhīruttāṇo,
atk-s0519a0:712_0: Idhassu puriso appahīnānusayo saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādaṃ anupassati,
atk-s0519a0:712_1: so saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādaṃ anupassanto yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ sampattibhavaṃ pattheti.
atk-s0519a0:712_2: Iccassa avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca anubaddhā honti,
atk-s0519a0:712_3: so yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ sampattibhavaṃ patthento pasādanīyavatthusmiṃ cittaṃ pasādeti saddahati okappeti.
atk-s0519a0:712_4: So pasannacitto tividhaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ anutiṭṭhati dānamayaṃ sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyena vācāya manasā.
atk-s0519a0:712_5: So tassa vipākaṃ paccanubhoti diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā aparāpare vā pariyāye.
atk-s0519a0:712_11: phassapaccayā vedanāti evaṃ santaṃ taṃ sukhamanveti.
atk-s0519a0:712_12: Tassevaṃ vedanāya aparāparaṃ parivattamānāya uppajjati taṇhā.
atk-s0519a0:713_5: Tesaṃ purimakāraṇabhūtā avijjā bhavataṇhā ca samudayasaccaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:713_6: Tesaṃ pariññāya pahānāya bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0519a0:713_13: Imāni cattāri saccāni evaṃ āyatanadhātuindriyamukhenāpi niddhāretabbāni.
atk-s0519a0:713_19: manopubbaṅgamattā dhammānaṃ attano sukhakāmena pasannena manasā vacīkammaṃ kāyakammañca pavattetabbanti ayaṃ bhagavato āṇatti.
atk-s0519a0:714_2: Mananalakkhaṇe sampayuttesu ādhipaccakaraṇato pubbaṅgamo īhābhāvato nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena dhammā.
atk-s0519a0:714_3: Gāmesu gāmaṇi viya padhānaṭṭhena mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭhā.
atk-s0519a0:714_6: ārammaṇassa okappanato ca pasannena vacīviññattivipphārato tathā sādiyanato ca bhāsati.
atk-s0519a0:715_2: Tato eva tesaṃ manassa anuvattanato dhammānaṃ manoseṭṭhatā yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:715_3: Sahajātādipaccayavasena manasā nibbattattā dhammānaṃ manomayatā yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:715_4: Manasā pasannena samuṭṭhānānaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ kusalabhāvo yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:715_6: taṃ chāyā viya sukhaṃ anvetīti yujjati.
atk-s0519a0:717_2: vīmaṃsāpubbaṅgamatāpi vuttā hoti ādhipateyyalakkhaṇena chandādīnaṃ manasā ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a0:717_3: Tathā nesaṃ saddhādipubbaṅgamatāpi vuttā hoti indriyalakkhaṇena saddhādīnaṃ manasā ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a0:717_4: “Manasā ce pasannenā”ti yathā manassa pasādasamannāgamo taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ anavajjabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:717_5: Evaṃ cittassa satiādisamannāgamopi nesaṃ anavajjabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a0:717_6: “Sukhamanvetī”ti sukhānugamanavacanena sukhassa paccayabhūtānaṃ manāpiyarūpādīnaṃ anugamo vutto hoti tesampi kammapaccayatāya ekalakkhaṇattāti.
atk-s0519a0:718_5: tehi pasannena manasā kāyavacīmanokammāni pavattetabbānīti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:718_6: Puññakiriyāya aññesampi pubbaṅgamā hutvā tattha tesaṃ sammā upanetāro imissā desanāya nidānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:718_10: sabbeva vasamanvagū”ti evamādisamānayanena imissā desanāya saṃsandanā desanānusandhi.
atk-s0519a0:720_3: tato naṃ sukhamanvetī”ti nayidaṃ yathārutavasena gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:720_4: Yo hi samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā pāṇātipātimhi micchādiṭṭhike micchāpaṭipanne sakaṃ cittaṃ pasādeti,
atk-s0519a0:720_5: pasannena ca cittena abhūtaguṇābhitthavanavasena bhāsati vā nipaccakāraṃ vāssa yaṃ karoti,
atk-s0519a0:720_7: Dukkhameva pana taṃ tato cakkaṃva vahato padamanveti.
atk-s0519a0:720_9: Yaṃ manasā ce pasannena bhāsati vā karoti vā,
atk-s0519a0:721_2: Yaṃ manasā paduṭṭhena bhāsati vā karoti vā dukkhassānugāmī.
atk-s0519a0:722_1: “Manopubbaṅgamā”ti mano cittaṃ manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūti pariyāyavacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:723_8: Bhāsati vā karoti vāti sammāvācāsammākammantānaṃ nikkhepapaññatti.
atk-s0519a0:724_4: Tāsaṃ nissayā cattāro mahābhūtāti rūpakkhandhoti ayaṃ khandhehi otaraṇo.
atk-s0519a0:724_5: Manoti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇanti manoggahaṇena avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā gahitāti.
atk-s0519a0:725_7: Sukhamanvetīti pana padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cāti.
atk-s0519a0:726_10: Tayidaṃ suttaṃ dvīhi ākārehi adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ hetunā ca yo pasannamānaso,
atk-s0519a0:727_2: Tassa ca ñāṇasampayuttassa alobho adoso amohoti tayo sampayuttā hetū,
atk-s0519a0:727_3: ñāṇavippayuttassa alobho adosoti dve sampayuttā hetū.
atk-s0519a0:727_7: tassa ca dānādivasena pavattamānassa deyyadhammādayo paccayo.
atk-s0519a0:728_14: Yoniso hi manasi karonto kusalacittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti kusalacittaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0519a0:728_15: so anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti,
atk-s0519a0:728_17: Tassevaṃ catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro satipaṭṭhānā yāva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatīti ayaṃ bhāvanāya samāropanā.
atk-s0519a0:730_0: “Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati;
atk-s0519a0:731_0: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ, rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbuto”ti. ;
atk-s0519a0:732_0: Tattha dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:732_1: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:732_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti lobhassa ca dosassa ca mohassa ca pahānamāha.
atk-s0519a0:733_1: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti adoso kusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:733_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti amoho kusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:733_3: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti tesaṃ nissaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:734_1: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti samādhikkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:734_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti paññākkhandhassa vimuttikkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:736_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti lokuttarakusalamūlaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:736_3: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti lokuttarassa kusalamūlassa phalaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:737_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkhabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0519a0:739_1: na cīyatīti dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ lokiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ desanamāha.
atk-s0519a0:739_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti loke ādīnavānupassanāya saddhiṃ sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanamāha.
atk-s0519a0:739_3: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti tassā desanāya phalamāha.
atk-s0519a0:740_0: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dhammadānaṃ āmisadānañca vadati.
atk-s0519a0:740_1: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā sattānaṃ abhayadānaṃ vadati.
atk-s0519a0:740_3: Tena ca sīlasaṃyamena sīle patiṭṭhito cittaṃ saṃyameti,
atk-s0519a0:740_5: Evaṃ so samathe ṭhito vipassanākosallayogato kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ rāgaṃ jahāti,
atk-s0519a0:740_8: ariyamaggena sabbepi pāpake akusale dhamme jahāti.
atk-s0519a0:740_9: Evaṃ paṭipanno ca rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti rāgādīnaṃ parikkhayā dvepi vimuttiyo adhigacchatīti ayaṃ suttaniddeso.
atk-s0519a0:741_2: Dve sugatiyo devā ca manussā ca,
atk-s0519a0:741_8: Tassa kāraṇabhāvena purimapurimanipphannā taṇhā samudayo ariyasaccaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:741_9: Tayidaṃ vuccati assādo ca ādīnavo ca.
atk-s0519a0:741_12: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti maggo vutto.
atk-s0519a0:741_13: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti dve nibbānadhātuyo saupādisesā ca anupādisesā ca.
atk-s0519a0:742_0: Vicayoti “dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti iminā paṭhamena padena tividhampi dānamayaṃ sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:742_3: “Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatī”ti dutiyena padena averā asapattā abyāpādā ca paṭipadā vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:742_4: “Kusalo ca jahāti pāpaka”nti tatiyena padena ñāṇuppādo aññāṇanirodho sabbopi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sabbepi bodhipakkhiyā dhammā vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:743_0: Yuttīti dāne ṭhito ubhayaṃ paripūreti macchariyappahānañca puññābhisandañcāti atthesā yutti.
atk-s0519a0:743_1: Sīlasaṃyame ṭhito ubhayaṃ paripūreti upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiñcāti atthesā yutti.
atk-s0519a0:743_5: Rāgadosamohesu sabbaso parikkhīṇesu anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatīti atthesā yuttīti.
atk-s0519a0:744_0: Padaṭṭhānanti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti cāgādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:744_1: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti saccādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:744_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti paññādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:745_0: Lakkhaṇoti “dadato”ti etena peyyavajjaṃ atthacariyaṃ samānattatā ca dassitāti veditabbā saṅgahavatthubhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a0:745_1: “Saṃyamato”ti etena khantimettāavihiṃsāanuddayādayo dassitāti veditabbā verānuppādanalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a0:745_2: “Veraṃ na cīyatī”ti etena hirīottappaappicchatāsantuṭṭhitādayo dassitā verāvaḍḍhanena ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a0:745_4: “Kusalo”ti etena kosalladīpanena sammāsaṅkappādayo dassitā maggaṅgādibhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a0:745_5: “Jahāti pāpaka”nti etena pariññābhisamayādayopi dassitā abhisamayalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā.
atk-s0519a0:745_6: “Rāgadosamohakkhayā”ti etena avasiṭṭhakilesādīnampi khayā dassitā khepetabbabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti ayaṃ lakkhaṇo.
atk-s0519a0:746_0: Catubyūhoti dadatoti gāthāyaṃ bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
atk-s0519a0:746_8: te rāgadosamohaṃ pajahissantīti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:747_4: Tassa alobhena ca adosena ca amohena ca dānādīhi pahānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:748_0: Vibhattīti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti ekaṃsena yo bhayahetu deti,
atk-s0519a0:748_4: Yañca daṇḍadānaṃ satthadānaṃ paraviheṭhanatthaṃ apuññaṃ assa pavaḍḍhati.
atk-s0519a0:748_5: Yaṃ pana kusalena cittena anukampanto vā apacāyamāno vā annaṃ deti,
atk-s0519a0:748_6: pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathaṃ padīpeyyaṃ deti,
atk-s0519a0:748_9: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti ekaṃsena abhayūparatassa cīyati,
atk-s0519a0:748_12: bhayūparato diṭṭhadhammikassa bhāyati “mā maṃ rājāno gahetvā hatthaṃ vā chindeyyuṃ…pe…
atk-s0519a0:748_15: Yo pana evaṃ samāno veraṃ na cīyati.
atk-s0519a0:748_17: pāṇātipātassa pāpako vipāko diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye ca,
atk-s0519a0:748_26: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti pāpapahāyakā sattattiṃsa bodhipakkhiyā dhammā vattabbāti.
atk-s0519a0:749_3: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati asaṃyamatopi veraṃ na cīyati,
atk-s0519a0:750_4: Veraṃ na cīyatīti pāpaṃ na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0519a0:751_0: Paññattīti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti lobhassa paṭinissaggapaññatti,
atk-s0519a0:751_2: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti dosassa vikkhambhanapaññatti,
atk-s0519a0:751_4: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti mohassa samugghātapaññatti,
atk-s0519a0:752_0: Otaraṇoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānaṃ nāma saddhādīhi indriyehi hotīti ayaṃ indriyehi otaraṇo.
atk-s0519a0:752_1: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti saṃyamo nāma sīlakkhandhoti ayaṃ khandhehi otaraṇo.
atk-s0519a0:752_2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti pāpappahānaṃ nāma tīhi vimokkhehi hoti.
atk-s0519a0:752_3: Tesaṃ upāyabhūtāni tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti ayaṃ vimokkhamukhehi otaraṇo.
atk-s0519a0:752_5: So ca dhammadhātu dhammāyatanañcāti ayaṃ dhātūhi ca āyatanehi ca otaraṇoti.
atk-s0519a0:753_2: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti ayaṃ padasuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi cāti.
atk-s0519a0:754_6: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti ayaṃ ekattatā.
atk-s0519a0:754_7: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati vicikicchaṃ pajahatītiādikā ayaṃ vemattatā.
atk-s0519a0:754_9: Saupādisesā nibbānadhātu anupādisesā nibbānadhātūti ayaṃ vemattatāti.
atk-s0519a0:756_0: Samāropano hārasampātoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
atk-s0519a0:756_2: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
atk-s0519a0:756_4: Sīlena hi jhānenapi rāgādikilesā na cīyanti.
atk-s0519a0:756_9: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti rāgassapi khayā dosassapi khayā mohassapi khayā.
atk-s0519a0:756_10: Tattha rāgoti yo rāgo sārāgo cetaso sārajjanā lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:756_11: Dosoti yo doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpādo cetaso byāpajjanā doso akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:756_12: Mohoti yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ anabhisamayo asambodho appaṭivedho dummejjhaṃ bālyaṃ asampajaññaṃ moho akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:756_13: Iti imesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ khayo nirodho paṭinissaggo nibbuti nibbāyanā parinibbānaṃ saupādisesā nibbānadhātu anupādisesā nibbānadhātūti.
atk-s0519a0:759_1: Evaṃ nānāsuttavasena ekasuttavasena ca hāravicāraṃ dassetvā idāni nayavicāraṃ dassetuṃ “tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:759_4: Ayaṃ desanāhāro kiṃ desayatī”tiādinā hāraniddeso āraddho,
atk-s0519a0:759_7: ayaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭo kiṃ nayatī”tiādinā anārabhitvā samuṭṭhānamukhena āraddhanti? Vuccate –
atk-s0519a0:759_9: Yathā hi hārā byañjanamukhena suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanā,
atk-s0519a0:759_11: Nayā pana nānāsuttato niddhāritehi taṇhāvijjādīhi mūlapadehi catusaccayojanāya nayato anubujjhiyamāno dukkhādiattho.
atk-s0519a0:759_12: So hi maggañāṇaṃ nayati sampāpetīti nayo.
atk-s0519a0:759_13: Paṭivijjhantānaṃ pana ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ veneyyānaṃ vasena mūlapadavibhāgato tidhā vibhattā.
atk-s0519a0:759_16: tesaṃ saṃkilesavodānānaṃ vibhāgato dvisaṅgaho catuchaaṭṭhadiso cāti bhinno hāranayānaṃ visayo.
atk-s0519a0:759_20: Evaṃ visiṭṭhavisayattā hāranayānaṃ hārehi aññathā naye niddisanto “tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:760_6: Sā hi nandiyāvaṭṭādīnaṃ nayānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmīti ca vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:760_9: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ca bhavataṇhāya cātiādi nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmidassanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:760_10: Tattha pubbā koṭi na paññāyatīti asukassa nāma buddhassa bhagavato,
atk-s0519a0:760_11: asukassa vā cakkavattino kāle avijjā bhavataṇhā ca uppannā.
atk-s0519a0:760_12: Tato pubbe nāhosīti evaṃ avijjābhavataṇhānaṃ na kāci purimā mariyādā upalabbhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:760_21: tathāpi avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnavehi bhavehi taṇhā saṃyojetīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “avijjānīvaraṇaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojana”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:761_2: Avijjāpakkhena vicarantīti avijjāpakkhena avijjāsahāyena dvādasavidhena vipallāsena abhinivesavatthubhūte ārammaṇe pavattanti.
atk-s0519a0:761_3: Te vuccanti diṭṭhicaritāti te avijjābhibhūtā rūpādīni niccādito abhinivisantā diṭṭhicaritāti vuccanti,
atk-s0519a0:761_6: Diṭṭhivicarite taṇhāvicarite ca paṭipattiyā vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:761_7: Tattha attakilamathānuyoganti attano kāyassa kilissanapayogaṃ attaparitāpanapaṭipattiṃ.
atk-s0519a0:762_0: Yadipi bāhirakā “dukkhaṃ taṇhā”ti ca jānanti “idaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:762_3: ayaṃ tassā virāgo”ti pariññeyyapahātabbabhāvena pana na jānanti,
atk-s0519a0:762_13: Natthi sukhena sukhanti yaṃ anavajjapaccayaparibhogasukhena kāyaṃ cittañca paṭippassaddhadarathaṃ katvā ariyehi pattabbaṃ upasamasukhaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:763_0: So lokaṃ vaḍḍhayatīti so kāme paṭisevento attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lokaṃ vaḍḍheti pīneti.
atk-s0519a0:763_1: Puttanattuparamparāya vā saṃsārassa anupacchedanato sattalokaṃ vaḍḍheti.
atk-s0519a0:763_2: Bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavatīti attano pañcahi kāmaguṇehi santappanena puttamukhadassanena ca bahuṃ puññaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0519a0:763_4: Daḷhatāya evaṃdiṭṭhī dukkhena sukhaṃ patthayamānā attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā kāmesu puññasaññī kāmasukhallikānuyogamanuyuttā
atk-s0519a0:764_1: Rogameva vaḍḍhayantīti attabhāvarogameva kilesarogameva vā aparāparaṃ vaḍḍhenti.
atk-s0519a0:765_1: tehi vā saṃkilissamāno rūpārūpakāyo dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:765_2: Tadabhisaṅgo taṇhāti tattha abhisaṅgo āsaṅgoti laddhanāmā taṇhā.
atk-s0519a0:766_1: Idāni diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhidassane pavattibhedaṃ dassetuṃ “diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:766_2: Tattha diṭṭhicaritā rūpaṃ attato upagacchantīti diṭṭhicaritā diṭṭhābhinivesassa balavabhāvato rūpaṃ “attā”ti gaṇhanti.
