atk-s0519a0:766_6: Taṇhācaritā rūpavantaṃ attānanti taṇhācaritā taṇhābhinivesassa balavabhāvato rūpaṃ attano kiñcanapalibodhabhāve
atk-s0519a0:766_8: Attani vā rūpanti attādhāraṃ vā rūpaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:766_9: Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti rūpādhāraṃ vā attānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:766_13: Tasmā yathāladdhaṃ attaniyanti kappetvā tadaññaṃ “attā”ti gaṇhanti.
atk-s0519a0:766_14: Ayaṃ vuccati vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhīti ayaṃ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ekekasmiṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0519a0:766_15: gāhānaṃ vasena vīsativatthukā sati vijjamāne khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte kāye,
atk-s0519a0:766_16: satī vā vijjamānā tattha diṭṭhīti sakkāyadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0519a0:767_6: “Te tayo khandhā”tiādinā ariyamaggato khandhamukhena samathavipassanā niddhāreti.
atk-s0519a0:768_0: Puna “tattha ye rūpaṃ attato upagacchantī”tiādinā sakkāyadassanamukhena ucchedādiantadvayaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:768_2: Tattha ime vuccanti ucchedavādinoti ime rūpādike pañcakkhandhe attato upagacchantā rūpādīnaṃ aniccabhāvato
atk-s0519a0:768_3: ucchijjati attā vinassati na hoti paraṃ maraṇāti evaṃ abhinivisanato “ucchedavādino”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0519a0:768_4: Ime vuccanti sassatavādinoti ime “rūpavantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādinā rūpādivinimutto añño koci attāti upagacchantā
atk-s0519a0:769_0: Ucchedasassataṃ samāsato vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhīti attā ucchijjati attā niccoti ca ādippavattanato
atk-s0519a0:769_1: ucchedasassatadassanaṃ saṅkhepato vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi eva hoti.
atk-s0519a0:769_3: Vitthārato dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatānīti ucchedasassatadassanaṃ vitthārena brahmajāle āgatāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni.
atk-s0519a0:769_6: Tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyā dhammāti aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā anattasaññā pahānasaññā virāgasaññā nirodhasaññā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe…
atk-s0519a0:769_7: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti ete tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyā dhammā.
atk-s0519a0:770_0: Evaṃ vipassanāvasena paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā puna samathavasena dassetuṃ “aṭṭha vimokkhā dasa ca kasiṇāyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:770_1: Dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni mohajālanti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni mohajālahetukattā mohajālañca.
atk-s0519a0:770_3: Asati paṭipakkhādhigame santānavasena anupacchedena pavattanato anidhanappavattaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:770_4: Yasmā pana mohajālahetukāni diṭṭhigatāni mohajāle padālite padālitāni honti,
atk-s0519a0:771_1: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tejetvā tikkhasabhāvaṃ āpāditaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggañāṇañca ñāṇavajiraṃ.
atk-s0519a0:771_2: Idameva hi ñāṇaṃ bhagavato pavattaṃ “mahāvajirañāṇa”nti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:771_3: Taṃ pana sasambhāraṃ katvā dassento “tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyā dhammā”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:771_4: Mohajālappadālananti pubbabhāge vikkhambhanavasena maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena avijjābhavataṇhānaṃ padālanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:771_5: Atītādibhedabhinnesu rūpādīsu sakaattabhāvādīsu ca saṃsibbanavasena pavattanato jālaṃ bhavataṇhā.
atk-s0519a0:771_6: Tassā hi taṇhā jālinī sibbinī jālanti ca adhivacananti.
atk-s0519a0:771_8: avijjātaṇhā vibhajitvā yathānusandhinā saṃkilesapakkhaṃ nigamento “tena vuccati pubbā koṭi na paññāyati
atk-s0519a0:772_4: Diṭṭhicarito hi tapojigucchādinā anupāyenapi yebhuyyena kilesānaṃ sallekhanādhippāyena carati,
atk-s0519a0:772_5: tasmā so sāsane pabbajito dhutadhammavasena sallekhapaṭipadaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0519a0:772_7: Diṭṭhiyā savisaye paññāsadisī pavattīti so visujjhamāno paññādhiko hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:772_9: Taṇhāvasena micchāvimokkho hotīti taṇhācarito visujjhamāno saddhādhikova hoti,
atk-s0519a0:772_12: Diṭṭhicarito sukhāya paṭipadāyātiādi paṭipadāniddeso heṭṭhā desanāhāravibhaṅge āgato eva,
atk-s0519a0:773_2: Dandhañca dhammaṃ ājānātīti taṇhācaritassa mandapaññassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:774_0: “Ye hi kecī”tiādinā tāsaṃ paṭipadānaṃ niyyāne tīsupi kālesu ekantikabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:774_1: Tattha imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhīti imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhi,
atk-s0519a0:774_5: Atha vā catukkamagganti nandiyāvaṭṭassa catuddisāsaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:774_6: Tā pana catasso disā disālocananaye āgamissanti.
atk-s0519a0:774_10: Rattavāsiniyāti rattesu rāgābhibhūtesu vasatīti rattavāsinī, tassā.
atk-s0519a0:774_13: Ayaṃ vuccati nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmīti ayaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ vasena saṃkilesapakkhe dve disā samathavipassanānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:774_14: vasena vodānapakkhepi dve disā catusaccayojanā nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānatāya bhūmīti.
atk-s0519a0:775_1: Evaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmiṃ niddisitvā idāni tassa disābhūtadhamme niddisantena yasmā cassa disābhūtadhammesu
atk-s0519a0:775_3: tasmā “veyyākaraṇesu hi ye kusalākusalā”ti disālocanalakkhaṇaṃ ekadesena paccāmasitvā “te duvidhā upaparikkhitabbā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:777_0: Taṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena daṭṭhabbanti ce?
atk-s0519a0:777_8: Te kattha daṭṭhabbāti te pana vipallāsā kattha passitabbāti āha –
atk-s0519a0:777_13: Tesu kāraṇabhāvena purimasiddhā kilesā parato paresaṃ kilesānaṃ paccayabhāvato kilesāpi kilesavatthu.
atk-s0519a0:777_15: ayonisomanasikāraparikkhatā ca dhammā kilesuppattihetubhāvato kilesappaccayāpi kilesavatthūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:778_0: Cattāro āhārāti ettha āhārasīsena tabbisayā kilesāpi adhippetā.
atk-s0519a0:778_2: “Paṭhame āhāre”tiādinā dasavatthuke kilesapuñje purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa kāraṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:778_3: Tattha paṭhame āhāreti visayabhūte paṭhame āhāre paṭhamo vipallāso pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:778_5: Paṭhame vipallāseti paṭhame vipallāse appahīne sati paṭhamaṃ upādānaṃ pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:779_1: Idāni dasavatthukaṃ kilesapuñjaṃ taṇhāvijjāvasena dve koṭṭhāse karonto “yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:779_2: Tattha kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ phassāhārañca aparijānantassa taṇhācaritassa yathākkamaṃ kāyavedanāsu tibbo chandarāgo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:779_3: iti upakkilesassa chandarāgassa hetubhāvato yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
atk-s0519a0:779_6: Tathā manosañcetanāhāraṃ viññāṇāhārañca aparijānanto diṭṭhicarito tesu attasaññī niccasaññī ca hotīti
atk-s0519a0:779_7: vuttanayeneva te diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesāti vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:779_8: Tathā purimakā dve vipallāsā purimakāni eva ca dve dveupādānayogaganthāsavaoghasallaviññāṇaṭṭhitiagatigamanāni
atk-s0519a0:779_9: taṇhāpadhānattā taṇhāsabhāvattā taṇhāvisayattā ca taṇhācaritassa upakkilesāti vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:779_10: Pacchimakāni pana tāni diṭṭhipadhānattā diṭṭhisabhāvattā diṭṭhivisayattā ca diṭṭhicaritassa upakkilesāti vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a0:780_1: Kabaḷīkāre āhāre “asubhe subha”nti vipallāsoti catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkāre āhāre catūsu ca vipallāsesu
atk-s0519a0:780_2: “asubhe subha”nti vipallāso daṭṭhabbo kabaḷīkārāhārassa asubhasabhāvattā asubhasamuṭṭhānattā ca.
atk-s0519a0:780_3: Tathā phassāhārassa dukkhasabhāvattā dukkhapaccayattā ca visesato tattha “dukkhe sukha”nti vipallāso.
atk-s0519a0:780_9: Paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyatīti “asubhe subha”nti vipariyesaggāhī kilesakāmena vatthukāme daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a0:780_10: Idaṃ vuccati kāmupādānanti yaṃ tathā kāmānaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:780_12: “Dukkhe sukha”nti vipariyesaggāhī “sīlabbatehi anāgate bhavavisuddhīti taṃ nibbutisukha”nti daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a0:780_13: “Anicce nicca”nti vipariyesaggāhī “sabbe bhavā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā”ti saṃsārābhinandiniṃ bhavadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a0:780_16: so paṭisaṃvedetī”ti attadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “dutiye vipallāse ṭhito”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:781_0: Ayaṃ vuccati kāmayogoti yena kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmupādānena vatthukāmehi saha satto saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a0:781_2: Ayaṃ vuccati bhavayogoti yato sīlabbatupādānasaṅkhātena bhavupādānena bhavena saha satto saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a0:781_4: Ayaṃ vuccati diṭṭhiyogoti yāya ahetukadiṭṭhiādisaṅkhātāya pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0519a0:781_5: sakkāyadiṭṭhiādiavasiṭṭhadiṭṭhiyā ca satto dukkhena saha saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a0:781_7: Ayaṃ vuccati avijjāyogoti yāya attavādupādānena sakalavaṭṭadukkhena ca saha satto saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a0:782_0: Yasmā pana kāmayogādayo abhijjhākāyaganthādīnaṃ paccayā honti,
atk-s0519a0:782_1: tasmā “paṭhame yoge ṭhito abhijjhāya kāyaṃ ganthatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:782_2: Tattha abhijjhāya kāyaṃ ganthatīti parābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇāya abhijjhāya nāmakāyaṃ ganthati ghaṭṭetīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:782_3: Tathā bhavapatthanāya appahīnattā bhavadiṭṭhibhavarāgavasena āghātavatthūsu sattā cittāni padūsentīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:782_5: Tathā diṭṭhivasena avijjāvasena ca sīlabbatehi sujjhati,
atk-s0519a0:782_6: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ca abhinivisatīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:783_1: Evaṃ ganthitāti evaṃ abhijjhāyanādivasena nāmakāyaṃ ganthitvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0519a0:783_3: Kuto ca vuccati āsavantīti kuto pana hetuto te kilesā āsavantīti āsavahetuṃ pucchati.
atk-s0519a0:783_4: Yasmā pana kilesā kusalappavattiṃ nivāretvā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantā,
atk-s0519a0:783_5: maggena asamucchinnā eva vā āsavānaṃ uppattihetu honti,
atk-s0519a0:783_7: Abhijjhākāyaganthena kāmāsavoti abhijjhākāyaganthena siddhena kāmarāgasabhāvattā kāmāsavo siddho hoti.
atk-s0519a0:783_8: Katthacideva visaye domanassito tappaṭipakkhe visaye tabbisayabahule ca bhave patthetīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:783_10: Parāmāsakāyaganthena diṭṭhāsavoti sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthena siddhena taṃsabhāvattā aparāparaṃ vā diṭṭhiyo ganthentassa diṭṭhāsavo siddho hoti.
atk-s0519a0:783_11: Idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthena avijjāsavoti “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti abhinivisantassa ayonisomanasikārato
atk-s0519a0:783_12: anekehi akusalehi dhammehi saddhiṃ avijjāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0519a0:783_13: sabbesaṃ vā akusaladhammānaṃ avijjāpubbaṅgamattā idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthena siddhena tassa hetubhūto avijjāsavo siddho hoti.
atk-s0519a0:784_0: Yasmā pana āsavā eva paribuddhā vaṭṭasmiṃ ohananti osādentīti “oghā”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0519a0:785_4: Hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhantīti cittassa abbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ hadayaṃ āhantvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0519a0:785_6: Tena vuccanti sallāti yasmā ajjhāsayaṃ anupaviṭṭhā hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0519a0:785_9: “Eso me attā”ti gahaṇamukhena “esohamasmī”ti gahaṇaṃ hotīti diṭṭhiṃ nissāyapi mānaṃ jappentīti āha “diṭṭhoghena mānasallo”ti.
atk-s0519a0:786_0: Pariyādinnanti aññassa okāsaṃ adatvā samantato gahitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:786_1: Catūsu dhammesu saṇṭhahatīti ārammaṇapaccayatāya ārammaṇabhūtesu catūsu dhammesu patiṭṭhahati.
atk-s0519a0:786_2: Tāni sarūpato dasseti “rūpe vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresū”ti.
atk-s0519a0:787_0: Tattha rāgasallenāti rāgasallena hetubhūtena nandūpasecanena viññāṇenāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:787_7: tadā upanissayakoṭiyāva nandiyā upasittaṃ viññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:787_9: Yadā ca upanissayapaccayabhūtena dosasallena vedanūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:787_11: upanissayakoṭiyā vā nandiyā upasittaṃ viññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:787_12: Vedanā pana tissopi tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayabhāvato.
atk-s0519a0:787_13: Tattha paṭhamanayo domanassārammaṇassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa vasena vutto.
atk-s0519a0:788_3: Ettha ca anādimatisaṃsāre itthipurisā rūpābhirāmāti rāgasallavasena paṭhamā viññāṇaṭṭhiti yojitā.
atk-s0519a0:788_4: Sabbāyapi vedanāya dukkhapariyāyasabbhāvato dukkhāya ca doso anusetīti dosasallavasena dutiyā,
atk-s0519a0:788_6: saṅkhāresu samūhaghanaṃ dubbinibbhoganti mohasallavasena catutthī viññāṇaṭṭhiti yojitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a0:789_1: Tañca kammanti yaṃ “cetanā cetasika”nti pubbe vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:789_2: Ime ca kilesāti ime ca dasavatthukā kilesā.
atk-s0519a0:790_1: Idāni āhārādayo nayānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe disābhāvena vavatthapetuṃ “imā catasso disā”tiādi āraddhaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:790_3: Puna kabaḷīkāro āhārotiādi āhārādīsuyeva yassa puggalassa upakkilesā,
atk-s0519a0:790_5: Tattha dasannaṃ suttānanti ekadesesu samudāyavohārena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:790_6: Samudāyesu hi pavattā samaññā avayavesupi dissati,
atk-s0519a0:790_9: Eko atthoti ekassa atthassa nipphādanato vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:790_10: Byañjanameva nānanti ettha byañjanaggahaṇena byañjanatthopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:790_12: Taṇhā ca rāgacaritaṃ puggalaṃ khippaṃ dūsetīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:790_14: Yathā ca paṭhamadisābhāvena vuttadhammā rāgacaritassa upakkilesā,
atk-s0519a0:790_16: Tatiyacatutthadisābhāvena vuttadhammā yathākkamaṃ diṭṭhicaritassa mandassa tikkhassa ca upakkilesā vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:791_0: Āhāravipallāsādayo yadipi sabbehi tīhi vimokkhamukhehi pubbabhāge yathārahaṃ pariññeyyā pahātabbā ca.
atk-s0519a0:791_1: Yassa pana dukkhānupassanā purime āhāradvaye dukkhākārena bahulaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0519a0:791_2: tassa vasena yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
atk-s0519a0:791_4: ime appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pariññaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:791_8: Na hi ariyamaggānaṃ viya pahātabbesu vimokkhamukhānaṃ pariññeyyapahātabbesu koci niyamo sambhavati.
atk-s0519a0:791_12: iti evaṃ vuttappakārā sabbe āhārādayo lokasaṅkhātavaṭṭānusārino dhammā te lokabhūtā vaṭṭato niyyanti aniccānupassanādīhi tīhi vimokkhamukhehīti.
atk-s0519a0:792_1: Evaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtadhamme niddisitvā idāni vodānapakkhe disābhūtadhamme dassetuṃ “catasso paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:792_6: Indriyasaṃvaro tapasaṅkhāto puññadhammo bojjhaṅgabhāvanā sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānañcāti cattāro sukhabhāgiyā dhammā veditabbāti.
atk-s0519a0:793_1: Yadi evaṃ kasmā visuṃ gahaṇaṃ katanti?
atk-s0519a0:793_5: Kiñcāpi catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu “idaṃ nāma satipaṭṭhānaṃ imāya eva paṭipadāya ijjhatī”ti niyamo natthi,
atk-s0519a0:793_6: tathāpi paṭhamāya paṭipadāya paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ sambhavatīti sambhavavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a0:793_9: Yasmā pana āhāravipallāsādīnaṃ viya paṭipadāsatipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthato nānattaṃ natthi.
atk-s0519a0:793_10: Satipaṭṭhānāniyeva hi tathā tathā paṭipajjamānāni dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādināmakāni honti,
atk-s0519a0:793_11: tasmā yathā saṃkilesapakkhe “paṭhame āhāre paṭhamo vipallāso”tiādinā adhikaraṇabhedena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:794_0: Andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya kadācideva uppajjanakaṃ acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:794_4: Na hi mānappahānādito aññaṃ durabhisambhavataraṃ vimhanīyañca upalabbhatīti adhitiṭṭhati etena,
atk-s0519a0:794_5: ettha vā adhiṭṭhānamattameva vā tanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:794_13: Ekassapi sattassa asubhabhāvanādayo viya ekadese avattitvā anavasesapariyādānato natthi etissā pamāṇanti appamaññā.
atk-s0519a0:795_0: Paṭhamā paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūretīti paṭhamāya paṭipadāya bhāvanābahulīkāro
atk-s0519a0:795_3: Yathā hi ariyamagge bhāvite satipaṭṭhānādayo bodhipakkhiyadhammā sabbepi bhāvitā eva honti,
atk-s0519a0:796_0: Kāyānupassanāya kāmarāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato “paṭhamo satipaṭṭhāno bhāvito bahulīkato kāmapaṭipakkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripūretī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:796_2: sappītikassa dutiyajjhānassa cittassa abhippamodanavasena pavattamānaṃ tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṃsagatasukhassa
atk-s0519a0:796_3: tatiyajjhānassa aniccavirāgādivasena pavattiyā saṅkhāresu upekkhakaṃ catutthaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvato
atk-s0519a0:797_2: tatiyajjhānaṃ pītivirāgena sukhena vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ ariyavihārānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:797_3: catutthajjhānaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiāneñjappattaṃ āneñjavihārānaṃ visesato paccayo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:797_4: tasmā “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ paṭhamaṃ vihāraṃ paripūretī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:798_1: Idāni paṭipadādayo vodānapakkhe disābhāvena vavatthapetuṃ “tattha imā catasso disā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:798_3: Puna “paṭhamā paṭipadā”tiādi paṭipadācatukkādīsu yena yassa puggalassa vodānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:798_6: Yadipi tīsu vimokkhamukhesu “idaṃ nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ imāya eva paṭipadāya ijjhatī”ti niyamo natthi.
atk-s0519a0:798_7: Yesaṃ pana puggalānaṃ purimāhi dvīhi paṭipadāhi appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena ariyamaggādhigamo.
atk-s0519a0:798_9: yassa ca catutthāya paṭipadāya animittavimokkhamukhena ariyamaggādhigamo,
atk-s0519a0:799_0: Tesaṃ vikkīḷitanti tesaṃ asantāsanajavaparakkamādivisesayogena sīhānaṃ buddhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ buddhasāvakānañca vikkīḷitaṃ viharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:799_3: taṃ nesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ dassento “cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso paṭipadā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:799_4: Tattha tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvo pahātabbabhāvo pahāyakabhāvo ca āhāraviññāṇaṭṭhitīnañcettha pahātabbabhāvo tappaṭibandhachandarāgavasena daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a0:799_5: Tattha “vikkīḷitaṃ bhāvanā sacchikiriyā cā”tiādi tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0519a0:799_6: tesaṃ vikkīḷitanti ettha yadetaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ nāma bhāvetabbānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ bhāvanā,
atk-s0519a0:799_8: Tathā pahātabbassa dasavatthukassa kilesapuñjassa tadaṅgādivasena pahānaṃ byantīkiriyā anavasesananti.
atk-s0519a0:799_9: Idāni taṃ saṅkhepena dassento “indriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ vipariyāsānadhiṭṭhāna”nti āha.
atk-s0519a0:800_0: Indriyādhiṭṭhānanti indriyānaṃ pavattanaṃ bhāvanā sacchikiriyā ca.
atk-s0519a0:800_2: Indriyāni saddhammagocaroti indriyāni cettha saddhammassa gocarabhūtāni pavattihetūti adhippetāni saddhindriyādīnīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:800_3: Vipariyāsā kilesagocaroti vipallāsā saṃkilesapakkhassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ pavattihetūti.
atk-s0519a0:800_4: Ayaṃ vuccati sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmīti yāyaṃ “cattāro āhārā”tiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:800_5: “catasso paṭipadā”tiādinā vodānapakkhepi dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ taṇhācaritādīnaṃ upakkilesavodānavibhāvanāmukhena niddhāraṇā,
atk-s0519a0:801_1: Idāni ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayavasena tipukkhalanayassa bhūmiṃ vibhāvetukāmo yasmā pana nayānaṃ aññamaññānuppavesassa
atk-s0519a0:801_3: tasmā paṭipadāvibhāgato cattāro puggale sīhavikkīḷitanayassa bhūmiṃ niddisitvā tato eva ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattaye
atk-s0519a0:801_5: Tattha ime dve puggalāti ime purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena dve puggalā.
atk-s0519a0:801_7: Puna “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādi yathāvuttapuggalacatukkato ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayaṃ niddhāretuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:801_12: Ekassa puggalassa ekasmiṃ dve paṭipadā sambhavantīti.
atk-s0519a0:801_13: Yathāvuttāsu pana dvīsu paṭipadāsu yo yāya kāyaci niyyāti,
atk-s0519a0:801_15: Yasmā pana aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ paṭipadā calati na calatīti vicāraṇāyaṃ “calatī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:801_16: tasmā ekassapi puggalassa jhānantaramaggantaresu paṭipadābhedo icchitovāti.
atk-s0519a0:802_4: Tena adhicittasikkhañca adhipaññāsikkhañca vipañcitaññussa paññapetīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:803_0: Cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavantīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:803_1: cattāro puggalā hutvā tayo puggalā hontīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:804_0: Ayaṃ saṃkilesoti ayaṃ akusalamūlādidvādasattikasaṅgaho saṃkilissati etenāti saṃkilesoti katvā.
atk-s0519a0:805_0: Tīṇi hutvā dve bhavantīti nandiyāvaṭṭanayassa disābhūtadhammadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:806_0: Kasmā panettha nayānaṃ uddesānukkamena niddeso na katoti?
atk-s0519a0:806_3: tatiyanayato ca dutiyanayassa sambhavoti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ paṭhamanayānantaraṃ tatiyanayo,
atk-s0519a0:806_6: dutiyanayato paṭhamanayopi sambhavatīti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ ante “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādinā paṭhamanayassa bhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0519a0:806_11: tīṇi hutvā cattāri bhavantī”ti ayampi nayo vattabbo siyāti?
atk-s0519a0:806_13: ayaṃ pana nayo atthato dassito evāti katvā na vutto.
atk-s0519a0:806_14: Yasmā tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anuppaveso icchito,
atk-s0519a0:806_15: sati ca anuppavese tato viniggamopi sambhavati evāti.
atk-s0519a0:807_1: cattāro puggalā taṇhācarito duvidho mudindriyo tikkhindriyo ca.
atk-s0519a0:807_3: Tattha taṇhācarito mudindriyo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti,
atk-s0519a0:807_5: diṭṭhicarito pana mudindriyo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti,
atk-s0519a0:807_7: Iti imāsu paṭipadāsu yathārahaṃ ṭhitehi taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritehi cattāro āhārā tappaṭibandhachandarāgappahānena pahātabbā.
atk-s0519a0:807_8: Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetvā cattāro vipallāsā daṭṭhabbāti sabbo yathāvuttanayo anugantabbo.
atk-s0519a0:808_3: na ca ye kāmesu anusayā samūhatā,
atk-s0519a0:808_5: Tesaṃ satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī “kāmehi natthi attho”ti,
atk-s0519a0:808_12: tesaṃ satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā bhikkhu “kāmehi natthi attho”ti,
atk-s0519a0:808_15: Iti ime sabbe sattā dvīsu paṭipadāsu samosaraṇaṃ gacchanti dukkhāyañca sukhāyañca.
atk-s0519a0:809_1: te dvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca.
atk-s0519a0:809_7: Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā mudindriyā paṭhamaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ upādāya dandhataraṃ abhisamenti,
atk-s0519a0:809_12: Tattha taṇhācaritā sattā duvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca.
atk-s0519a0:809_18: Tattha ye taṇhācaritā sattā mudindriyā paṭhamaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ upādāya dandhataraṃ abhisamenti,
atk-s0519a0:809_24: Ye hi keci nibbutā nibbāyanti nibbāyissanti vā imāhi catūhi paṭipadāhi anaññāhi,
atk-s0519a0:810_1: cattāro vipallāsā upādānā yogā ganthā āsavā oghā sallā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo agatigamanānīti evaṃ imāni sabbāni dasa padāni.
atk-s0519a0:813_0: Tattha paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyati,
atk-s0519a0:813_2: Dutiye vipallāse ṭhito anāgataṃ bhavaṃ upādiyati,
atk-s0519a0:813_6: Catutthe vipallāse ṭhito khandhe attato upādiyati,
atk-s0519a0:814_0: Tattha kāmupādāne ṭhito kāme abhijjhāya ganthati,
atk-s0519a0:816_0: Te cattāro āsavā vepullaṃ gatā oghā honti,
atk-s0519a0:817_0: Te cattāro oghā āsayamanupaviṭṭhā anusayasahagatā vuccanti sallāti hadayamāhacca tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0519a0:818_0: Imehi catūhi sallehi pariyādinnaṃ viññāṇaṃ catūsu dhammesu tiṭṭhati rūpe vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu.
atk-s0519a0:818_2: Tattha rāgasallena nandūpasecanaṃ rūpūpagaṃ viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0519a0:819_0: Catūhi viññāṇaṭṭhitīhi catubbidhaṃ agatiṃ gacchanti chandā dosā bhayā mohā.
atk-s0519a0:819_5: iti imāni ca kammāni ime ca kilesā ayaṃ saṃsārahetu.
atk-s0519a0:820_0: Tatthimā catasso disā kabaḷīkāro āhāro “asubhe subha”nti vipallāso kāmupādānaṃ kāmayogo abhijjhākāyagantho
atk-s0519a0:820_1: kāmāsavo kāmogho rāgasallaṃ rūpūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti chandā agatigamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:821_0: Phasso āhāro “dukkhe sukha”nti vipallāso sīlabbatupādānaṃ bhavayogo byāpādakāyagantho bhavāsavo bhavogho
atk-s0519a0:822_0: Manosañcetanāhāro “anattani attā”ti vipallāso diṭṭhupādānaṃ diṭṭhiyogo parāmāsakāyagantho diṭṭhāsavo
atk-s0519a0:822_1: diṭṭhogho diṭṭhisallaṃ saññūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti bhayā agatigamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:823_0: Viññāṇāhāro “anicce nicca”nti vipallāso attavādupādānaṃ avijjāyogo idaṃsaccābhinivesokāyagantho avijjāsavo
atk-s0519a0:823_1: avijjogho mohasallaṃ saṅkhārūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti mohā agatigamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:823_3: Iti imesaṃ dasannaṃ suttānaṃ paṭhamena padena paṭhamāya disāya ālokanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:823_8: Iminā nayena sabbe kilesā catūsu padesu pakkhipitabbā.
atk-s0519a0:824_3: cattāro vihārā dibbo brahmā ariyo āneñjo,
atk-s0519a0:824_7: cattāro samādhayo chandasamādhi vīriyasamādhi cittasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhi,
atk-s0519a0:824_8: cattāro dhammā sukhabhāgiyā nāññatra bojjhaṅgā nāññatra tapasā nāññatra indriyasaṃvarā nāññatra sabbanissaggā,
atk-s0519a0:825_0: Tattha dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā bhāviyamānā bahulīkariyamānā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a0:825_1: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a0:825_2: paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vihāraṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a0:825_3: paṭhamo vihāro paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a0:825_4: paṭhamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ dhammaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a0:825_5: paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a0:825_9: Evaṃ yāva sabbanissaggā catutthaṃ appamāṇaṃ paripūreti.
atk-s0519a0:826_0: Tattha paṭhamā ca paṭipadā paṭhamañca jhānaṃ paṭhamañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ dibbo ca vihāro paṭhamañca sammappadhānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:826_1: paṭhamo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca chandasamādhi ca indriyasaṃvaro ca mettā ca appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:827_0: Dutiyā ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā dutiyañca jhānaṃ dutiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ brahmā ca vihāro dutiyañca sammappadhānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:827_1: dutiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo cāgādhiṭṭhānañca cittasamādhi ca tapo ca karuṇā ca appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:828_0: Tatiyā ca paṭipadā dandhābhiññā tatiyañca jhānaṃ tatiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ ariyo ca vihāro tatiyañca sammappadhānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:828_1: tatiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca vīriyasamādhi ca bojjhaṅgā ca muditā ca appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:829_0: Catutthī ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā catutthañca jhānaṃ catutthañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ āneñjo ca vihāro catutthañca
atk-s0519a0:829_1: sammappadhānaṃ catuttho ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo upasamādhiṭṭhānañca vīmaṃsāsamādhi ca sabbanissaggo
atk-s0519a0:830_19: cattāri ca agatigamanāni cattāri ca appamāṇāni.
atk-s0519a0:832_1: Paṭipadāvibhāgena catūsu puggalesu yo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti,
atk-s0519a0:833_2: neyyassa adhisīlasikkhā ca adhicittasikkhā ca adhipaññāsikkhā ca.
atk-s0519a0:833_3: Iti imesaṃ puggalānaṃ catūhi paṭipadāhi niyyānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:836_0: Tattha lobho akusalamūlaṃ manāpikena ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati.
atk-s0519a0:836_1: Tadeva manāpikārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhavedanīyo phasso,
atk-s0519a0:836_2: sukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhā vedanā,
atk-s0519a0:836_7: rāgajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati uppādo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:837_1: Tadeva amanāpikārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhavedanīyo phasso,
atk-s0519a0:837_2: dukkhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhā vedanā,
atk-s0519a0:837_7: dosajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:837_8: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhadukkhatā.
atk-s0519a0:838_1: Tadeva upekkhāṭhāniyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhavedanīyo phasso,
atk-s0519a0:838_2: adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā,
atk-s0519a0:838_7: mohajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati vayo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:838_9: Iti ayaṃ tīhi ākārehi kilesānaṃ niddeso.
atk-s0519a0:840_1: Sutamayi paññā paripuṇṇā savitakkasavicāraṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a0:843_0: Iti ime tayo dhammā akusalapakkhikā kusalapakkhikā ca tikaniddesehi niddiṭṭhā tipukkhalanayassa disā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:843_1: Tassa pariyosānaṃ tayo vimokkhā appaṇihito suññato animitto,
atk-s0519a0:844_0: Tattha ye ime tayo puggalā ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ dve puggalā sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya,
atk-s0519a0:844_5: Te visesena dve honti diṭṭhicarito ca taṇhācarito ca.
atk-s0519a0:844_9: avijjā ca taṇhā ca ahirīkañca anottappañca asati ca asampajaññañca nīvaraṇāni ca saṃyojanāni ca ajjhosānañca
atk-s0519a0:844_10: abhiniveso ca ahaṃkāro ca mamaṃkāro ca assaddhiyañca dovacassatā ca kosajjañca ayonisomanasikāro ca vicikicchā
atk-s0519a0:844_11: ca avijjā ca asaddhammassavanañca asamāpatti ca.
atk-s0519a0:845_0: Tattha avijjā ca ahirīkañca asati ca nīvaraṇāni ca ajjhosānañca ahaṃkāro ca assaddhiyañca kosajjañca vicikicchā ca asaddhammassavanañca,
atk-s0519a0:846_0: Taṇhā ca anottappañca asampajaññañca saṃyojanāni ca abhiniveso ca mamaṃkāro ca dovacassatā ca ayonisomanasikāro ca avijjā ca asamāpatti ca,
atk-s0519a0:846_2: Dasannaṃ dukānaṃ dasa padāni paṭhamā disāti kātabbāni.
atk-s0519a0:846_3: Saṃkhittena atthaṃ ñāpenti paṭipakkhe kaṇhapakkhassa dasannaṃ dukānaṃ dasa padāni dutiyakāni,
atk-s0519a0:847_1: Samatho ca vipassanā ca vijjā ca caraṇañca sati ca sampajaññañca hirī ca ottappañca ahaṃkārappahānañca
atk-s0519a0:847_2: mamaṃkārappahānañca sammāvāyāmo ca yonisomanasikāro ca sammāsati ca sammāsamādhi ca paññā ca nibbidā
atk-s0519a0:847_3: ca samāpatti ca saddhammassavanañca somanassañca dhammānudhammapaṭipatti ca.
atk-s0519a0:848_0: Dasannaṃ dukānaṃ samathādīni somanassapariyosānāni paṭhamāni dasa padāni paṭhamā disā,
atk-s0519a0:848_1: vipassanādīni dhammānudhammapaṭipattipariyosānāni dutiyāni dasa padāni dutiyā disā.
atk-s0519a0:848_2: Iti akusalapakkhe kusalapakkhe ca nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa catasso disā.
atk-s0519a0:849_0: Tāsu kusalapakkhe samathādīhi akusalapakkhe taṇhādayo pahānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a0:849_2: kusalapakkhe vipassanādīhi akusalapakkhe avijjādayo pahānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a0:849_4: Iti imā dve vimuttiyo nandiyāvaṭṭanaye pariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:850_0: Tattha taṇhā avijjā samatho vipassanāti cattāri padāni,
atk-s0519a0:850_2: Samatho ca alobho ca adoso ca asubhasaññā ca dukkhasaññā cāti imāni pañca padāni samathaṃ bhajanti,
atk-s0519a0:850_3: vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā ca anattasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni vipassanaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0519a0:850_4: Evaṃ nava padāni kusalāni dvīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a0:850_5: Taṇhā ca lobho ca doso ca subhasaññā ca sukhasaññā cāti imāni pañca padāni taṇhaṃ bhajanti,
atk-s0519a0:850_6: avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni avijjaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0519a0:850_7: Evaṃ nava padāni akusalāni dvīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a0:850_8: Iti tipukkhalo ca sīhavikkīḷito ca nandiyāvaṭṭanayaṃ anuppavisanti.
atk-s0519a0:851_0: Kathaṃ tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti?
atk-s0519a0:851_1: Vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā ca anattasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni amoho,
atk-s0519a0:851_2: samatho ca alobho ca asubhasaññā ca dukkhasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni alobho,
atk-s0519a0:851_4: Evaṃ nava padāni kusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a0:851_5: Taṇhā ca lobho ca subhasaññā ca sukhasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni lobho,
atk-s0519a0:851_6: avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni moho,
atk-s0519a0:851_8: Evaṃ nava padāni akusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a0:851_9: Iti tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti.
atk-s0519a0:852_0: Kathaṃ catūsu padesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni samosaranti?
atk-s0519a0:852_9: Iti nava padāni akusalāni catūsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a0:852_10: Samatho ca asubhasaññā ca paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:852_11: alobho ca dukkhasaññā ca dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:852_12: vipassanā ca aniccasaññā ca tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:852_13: amoho ca anattasaññā ca catutthaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:852_14: Iti nava padāni kusalāni catūsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a0:852_15: Evaṃ sīhavikkīḷitanaye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti.
atk-s0519a0:852_18: Tasmā ekekassa nayassa akusale vā dhamme viññāte kusale vā paṭipakkho anvesitabbo.
atk-s0519a0:852_20: Tamhi naye niddiṭṭhe yathā ekamhi naye itaresaṃ nayānaṃ mūlapadāni anuppaviṭṭhāni,
atk-s0519a0:853_0: Tattha ekekasmiṃ dhamme viññāte sabbe dhammā viññātā honti.
atk-s0519a0:853_1: Imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ nayānaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa cattāri phalāni pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:854_0: Tipukkhalassa nayassa tayo vimokkhā pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya appaṇihito,
atk-s0519a0:855_0: Nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa dve vimuttiyo pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya taṇhāvirāgā cetovimutti,
atk-s0519a0:855_2: Imesu tīsu nayesu yā aṭṭhārasannaṃ padānaṃ ālocanā,
atk-s0519a0:855_4: Yā āloketvā kusalapakkhe akusalapakkhe ca “ayaṃ dhammo imaṃ dhammaṃ bhajatī”ti jānantena sammā yojanā,
atk-s0519a0:855_5: ayaṃ aṅkuso nayoti ime pañca nayā.
atk-s0519a0:858_1: Evaṃ sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā idāni sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajanto yasmā saṅgahavārādīsu mūlapadeheva
atk-s0519a0:858_4: evaṃ paṭṭhānatopi mūlapadāni niddhāretabbānīti dassanatthaṃ “aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā?
atk-s0519a0:858_10: tassā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ pakārehi ṭhānaṃ pavatti sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:858_16: Tesaṃ pana samūhabhāvato ayaṃ pakaraṇappadeso paṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a0:859_3: “Ye te goṭṭhā paṭṭhitagāvo”ti āgataṭṭhānasmiñhi yena paṭṭhānena te “goṭṭhā paṭṭhitagāvo”ti vuttā,
atk-s0519a0:859_5: Iti nātivitthāritanayesu hāranayesu anissaṅgagamanassa desanāñāṇassa saṃkilesabhāgiyādilokiyādibhedesu
atk-s0519a0:859_6: tadubhayavomissakabhedesu ca vitthāritanayalābhato nissaṅgavasena pavattagamanattā te saṃkilesabhāgiyādayo
atk-s0519a0:859_7: lokiyādayo ca visuṃ visuṃ vomissā ca adhikaraṇavasena paṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a0:859_8: Tesaṃ pakāsanato ayaṃ pakaraṇappadeso paṭṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:861_0: Tāni pana cha dukā cattāro tikā ekaṃ catukkaṃ aparampi ekaṃ catukkanti dvādasa honti.
atk-s0519a0:861_1: Tesu cattāro dukā dve ca tikā uddhaṭā,
atk-s0519a0:861_4: Iminā nayena tepi gahetuṃ sakkāti pāḷiyaṃ saṃkhittāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:861_8: Tattha yasmā katthaci sutte taṇhāsaṃkilesova niddisīyati,
atk-s0519a0:861_11: tasmā saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ tidhā vibhajitvā uddiṭṭhaṃ “taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:861_12: Tathā vodānaṃ nāma saṃkilese sati hotīti vodānabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesavibhāgena tidhāva uddiṭṭhaṃ “taṇhāvodānabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādinā.
atk-s0519a0:861_13: Taṃ pana atthato vāsanābhāgiyādi eva hoti.
atk-s0519a0:862_0: “Tattha saṃkileso tividho”tiādi saṃkilesapaṭipakkhato samathādiniddhāraṇavasena vāsanābhāgiyādisuttānaṃ visayadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:862_1: Tattha yadi āsatti uppajjati bhavesūti bhavesu chandarāgaṃ pajahituṃ asakkontassa yadi bhavapatthanā uppajjati.
atk-s0519a0:862_2: Evaṃ sāyanti evamassa puggalassa ayaṃ samathavipassanābhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu bhavati pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato.
atk-s0519a0:862_3: Tatrūpapattiyā saṃvattatīti tatra tatra bhave upapattiyā saṃvattati.
atk-s0519a0:862_4: Imāni cattāri suttānīti imāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīni cattāri suttāni.
atk-s0519a0:862_8: vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañcāti evaṃ padantarasaṃyojanavasena missitāni katāni.
atk-s0519a0:862_9: Aṭṭha bhavantīti purimāni cattāri imāni cattārīti evaṃ aṭṭha bhavanti.
atk-s0519a0:863_0: Tāniyeva aṭṭha suttāni sādhāraṇāni katāni soḷasa bhavantīti tāniyeva yathāvuttāni aṭṭha suttāni vāsanābhāgiyañca
atk-s0519a0:863_8: navāsanābhāgiyañca nanibbedhabhāgiyañca na asekkhabhāgiyañcāti evaṃ sādhāraṇāni katāni purimāni aṭṭha imāni aṭṭhāti soḷasa bhavanti.
atk-s0519a0:863_12: aparopi eko catukkoti ayampi vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:863_14: dve catukkā ca pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a0:864_0: Idāni imassa paṭṭhānassa sakalasāsanasaṅgahitabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “imehi soḷasahi suttehi bhinnehi navavidhaṃ suttaṃ bhinnaṃ bhavatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:864_2: imehi saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi soḷasahi suttehi paṭṭhānanayena vibhattehi suttageyyādinavavidhaṃ pariyattisāsanasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a0:864_4: Iminā soḷasavidhena paṭṭhānena asaṅgahito pariyattisāsanassa padeso natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:864_7: Tattha gāthāya gāthā anuminitabbāti ayaṃ gāthā viya gāthā saṃkilesabhāgiyāti vā vāsanābhāgiyāti vā nibbedhabhāgiyāti
atk-s0519a0:864_9: anu anu minitvā takketvā jānitabbāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:864_11: Ettha ca gāthāveyyākaraṇavinimuttā sabbā pariyatti “suttenā”tipadena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a0:865_1: Idāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīni suttāni yathāniddiṭṭhāni udāharaṇavasena vibhāvetuṃ “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:865_2: Tattha “kāmandhā jālasañchannā”ti gāthāya attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0519a0:865_4: evaṃ ito parānampi heṭṭhā vuttatthānaṃ uttānapadānañca atthaṃ na vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0519a0:867_0: “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti gāthāyaṃ manoti yadipi kāmāvacarakusalādibhedaṃ sabbampi catubhūmakacittaṃ mano,
atk-s0519a0:867_1: imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cakkhupālattherassa purimajātiyaṃ vejjabhūtassa uppannavasena niyamiyamānaṃ paṭighasampayuttacittameva labbhati.
atk-s0519a0:867_5: te pana vedanādayo tayo arūpino khandhā.
atk-s0519a0:867_7: Kathaṃ panetehi saddhiṃ ekasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ekasmiñca ārammaṇe ekakkhaṇe uppajjamāno mano pubbaṅgamo nāma hotīti?
atk-s0519a0:867_9: Yathā hi bahūsu ekato gāmaghātādikammāni karontesu “ko etesaṃ pubbaṅgamo”ti vutte yo tesaṃ paccayo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:867_10: yaṃ yaṃ nissāya te taṃ kammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0519a0:867_11: so datto vā mitto vā tesaṃ pubbaṅgamoti vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:867_13: Iti uppādapaccayaṭṭhena mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā.
atk-s0519a0:867_14: Na hi te mane anuppajjante uppajjituṃ sakkuṇanti,
atk-s0519a0:867_15: mano pana ekaccesu cetasikesu anuppajjantesupi uppajjati eva.
atk-s0519a0:868_1: Yathā hi corādīnaṃ corajeṭṭhakādayo adhipatino seṭṭhā,
atk-s0519a0:868_3: Yathā pana dāruādīhi nipphannāni bhaṇḍāni dārumayādīni nāma honti,
atk-s0519a0:868_4: tathā etepi manato nipphannattā manomayā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:868_5: Paduṭṭhenāti abhijjhādīhi dosehi paduṭṭhena dūsitena bhāsati vā karoti vā.
atk-s0519a0:868_6: So hi bhāsanto catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritameva bhāsati,
atk-s0519a0:868_8: abhāsanto akaronto tehi abhijjhādīhi paduṭṭhamanatāya tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0519a0:868_10: Tato naṃ dukkhamanvetīti tato tividhaduccaritato taṃ puggalaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti duccaritānubhāvena catūsu apāyesu dukkhaṃ anugacchati.
atk-s0519a0:868_13: yathā nāma sakaṭaṃ vahato balībaddassa padaṃ paharantaṃ cakkaṃ anugacchati,
atk-s0519a0:869_5: Gharasūkaro hi bālakālato paṭṭhāya posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehato bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu
atk-s0519a0:869_8: yadā puriso middhī ca hoti mahagghaso ca,
atk-s0519a0:869_9: nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho viya aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṃ asakkonto niddāsīlo saṃparivattasāyī,
atk-s0519a0:869_10: tadā so “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasi kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a0:869_11: Tesaṃ amanasikārā mandapañño punappunaṃ gabbhaṃ upeti,
atk-s0519a0:870_3: Atidhonacārinanti dhonā vuccati cattāro paccaye idamatthitāya alametenāti paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanapaññā,
atk-s0519a0:870_6: yathā ayato malaṃ samuṭṭhāya yato taṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:870_8: evamevaṃ cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ sāni kammāni attano santāne
atk-s0519a0:870_9: uṭṭhitattā attano santakāneva tāni kammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti.
atk-s0519a0:871_0: “Coro yathā”ti gāthāyaṃ coro yathā sandhimukhe gahītoti yathā coro gharasandhiṃ chinditvā gehaṃ pavisanto gharasandhimukhe eva rājapurisehi gahito.
atk-s0519a0:871_1: Sakammunā haññati bajjhate cāti tena attanā katakammena kasābhitāḷanādinā haññati ceva addubandhanādinā bajjhati ca.
atk-s0519a0:871_2: Evaṃ ayaṃ pecca pajā paratthāti evampi ayaṃ pāpakārinī pajā ito cavitvā paraloke.
atk-s0519a0:871_3: Sakammunā haññati bajjhate cāti attanāva katena pāpakammena nirayādīsu nānappakārehi kammakāraṇādīhi haññati ceva paribajjhati cāti.
atk-s0519a0:872_0: “Sukhakāmānī”ti gāthāyaṃ yo daṇḍena vihiṃsatīti yo puggalo daṇḍena vā leḍḍuādīhi vā vibādhati.
atk-s0519a0:872_1: Pecca so na labhe sukhanti so puggalo paraloke manussasukhaṃ vā dibbasukhaṃ vā na labhati,
atk-s0519a0:873_0: Gunnaṃ ce taramānānanti gāvīsu mahoghaṃ tarantīsu.
atk-s0519a0:873_1: Jimhaṃ gacchati puṅgavoti yadi yūthapati usabho kuṭilaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0519a0:873_2: Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchantīti sabbāpi tā gāviyo kuṭilameva gacchanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:873_3: Nette jimhaṃ gate satīti nettari kuṭilaṃ gate sati,
atk-s0519a0:873_5: So hi tāsaṃ paccayiko upaddavaharo ca.
atk-s0519a0:875_0: Kukkuccajanakeneva pattavaṭṭippabhavassa upacchinnattā phaluppatti kadaliyā parābhavāya hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a0:875_2: Tathā phalapariyosānattā osadhīnaṃ “phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:875_3: Vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassa jātā assatarī nāma,
atk-s0519a0:875_4: sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a0:875_6: athassa cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti,
atk-s0519a0:875_13: evaṃ attano kammaphalabhūto sakkāro asappurisaṃ vināsetīti.
atk-s0519a0:876_1: paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇaṃ makkhañca garuṃ katvā uddhaṃ katvā ukkhipitvā caranto.
atk-s0519a0:879_6: Taṃ kathaṃ nu bhavissatīti taṃ dhanaṃ kena nu pakārena tesaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0519a0:879_7: Adhammena tesaṃ sambhatattā tesu naciraṭṭhitikaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:879_8: Antarāyā su bhavissantīti adhammiyavohārādito rājantarāyādayo bhavissanti.
atk-s0519a0:879_10: Sambhatassa vinassatīti imassa sambhataṃ sajjitaṃ vinassati.
atk-s0519a0:879_12: Sā hi rūpādīhi sobhanehi aggoti saggoti adhippetā.
atk-s0519a0:880_1: Lobhā khaṇati attānanti lobhahetu apuññāni karonto kāyavisamādiyogena attānaṃ khaṇati nāma.
atk-s0519a0:881_0: Carantīti catūhi iriyāpathehi akusalameva karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0519a0:881_1: Bālāti idhalokatthaṃ paralokatthañca ajānantā idha bālā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:881_3: Na hi paññāya duṭṭhattaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0519a0:881_4: Amittenevāti amittabhūtena viya verinā viya hutvā.
atk-s0519a0:881_8: yaṃ katvā anutappatīti yaṃ kammaṃ nirayādīsu nibbattanasamatthaṃ dukkhudayaṃ katvā anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe anutappati anusocati,
atk-s0519a0:881_9: taṃ kataṃ na sādhu na sundaraṃ na bhaddakaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:881_10: Yassa assumukhoti yassa assūhi tintamukho rodanto vipākaṃ paṭisevati anubhoti.
atk-s0519a0:882_0: Dukkaranti vattapaṭivattapūraṇādivasena ābhisamācārikasīlassa kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0519a0:882_1: Samādānato paṭṭhāya khaṇḍaṃ akatvā visesato ādibrahmacariyakassa carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya duttitikkhaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:882_2: sīlasaṃvarādayo vā aparikkhate katvā sampādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0519a0:882_9: Atha vā dukkarantipadassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ duttitikkhanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:882_14: yaṃ paṇḍitā kulaputtā dasapi vassāni vīsatipi…pe…
atk-s0519a0:882_15: saṭṭhipi vassāni dantebhi dantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṃ āhacca cetasā cittaṃ abhiniggaṇhitvā ekāsanaṃ ekabhattaṃ
atk-s0519a0:882_16: paṭisevamānā āpāṇakoṭikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantā sāmaññaṃ karonti,
atk-s0519a0:882_17: taṃ bālā abyattā kātuṃ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0519a0:882_18: Bahūhi tattha sambādhāti tasmiṃ sāmaññasaṅkhāte ariyamagge bahū sambādhā,
atk-s0519a0:883_0: Appameyyaṃ paminantoti appameyyaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ “ettakasīlo ayaṃ ettakasamādhi ettakapañño”ti evaṃ minanto.
atk-s0519a0:883_1: Kodha vidvā vikappayeti ko idha vidvā medhāvī vikappeyya,
atk-s0519a0:883_3: Nivutaṃ maññeti yo pana puthujjano minetuṃ ārabhati,
atk-s0519a0:884_2: Visaṃ halāhalaṃ ivāti halāhalasaṅkhātaṃ visaṃ iva.
atk-s0519a0:884_3: Evaṃ viraddhaṃ pātetīti viraddhaṃ aparaddhaṃ khalitapuggalaṃ evaṃ apāyesu vinipāteti.
atk-s0519a0:884_4: Vācā dubbhāsitā yathāti yathā vācā ariyūpavādanavasena dubbhāsitā.
atk-s0519a0:885_2: Taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyoti yo guṇavisiṭṭhatāya pasaṃsāraho puggalo,
atk-s0519a0:885_3: taṃ vā so pāpicchatādīni āropetvā garahati.
atk-s0519a0:885_8: Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanāti sabbena attano dhanenāpi attanāpi saddhiṃ.
atk-s0519a0:885_14: tassa ayaṃ manopadoso eva mahattaro kalīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:885_19: Pañca cāti abbudagaṇanāya pañca ca abbudāni.
atk-s0519a0:885_21: yaṃ kālaṃ ariyagarahivācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya pāpakaṃ nirayaṃ upeti,
atk-s0519a0:886_8: Pesuṇiyaṃ anuyuttoti pesuṇiyasmiṃ anuyutto aggasāvakānaṃ bhedanena.
atk-s0519a0:886_9: Kokālikañhi mīyamānaṃ ovadantena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena bhāsitā imā gāthāti.
atk-s0519a0:886_17: Mā bahubhāṇidha nerayikosīti idāni bahubhāṇī mā hohi,
atk-s0519a0:887_0: Idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyanti idaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ sabhāvabhedato avatthābhedato ca anekabhedakaṃ dassetuṃ anekehi
atk-s0519a0:887_1: suttapadehi udāharaṇavasena dassitaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:889_2: Phītanti telamadhuphāṇitādīhi ca dhanadhaññādīhi ca vipulaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:890_0: Pecca so labhateti yo bhūte daṇḍena na hiṃsati,
atk-s0519a0:890_1: so puggalo paraloke manussabhūto manussasukhaṃ devabhūto dibbasukhaṃ ubhayaṃ atikkanto nibbānasukhaṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:891_3: Sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0519a0:891_6: bhāvakānaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nibaddhavāsapariharaṇaṃ attano ca tattha anāsaṅgadassanaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:891_9: avuṭṭhiādiupaddavūpasamanañcāti imehi sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ carantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:892_4: Magge purisaṃ ṭhapesunti tesaṃ kira gāmadvārena bhagavato gamanamaggo,
atk-s0519a0:892_5: tasmā “sace bhagavā amhākaṃ suttānaṃ vā pamattānaṃ vā gaccheyya,
atk-s0519a0:892_6: atha passituṃ na labheyyāmā”ti maggamajjhe purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0519a0:892_9: Bhagavā hi sakaṭamaggassa majjhe jaṅghamaggena agamāsi,
atk-s0519a0:892_11: Maggā okkammāti buddhā hi kenaci saddhiṃ gacchantāva paṭisanthāraṃ karonti kenaci saddhiṃ ṭhitā kenaci saddhiṃ divasabhāgampi nisinnā,
atk-s0519a0:892_14: imehi saddhiṃ nisīditvā divasabhāgaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:892_16: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti te kira chattupāhanakattaradaṇḍapādabbhañjanatelāni ceva aṭṭhavidhañca pānakaṃ sarabhapādapallaṅkañca gāhāpetvā āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0519a0:892_19: Ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsūti “chattupāhanādīni bhikkhusaṅghassa dethā”ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0519a0:893_0: Sāvatthiyā kosalesu cārikaṃ pakkamissatītiādi sabbaṃ majjhimadesavaseneva vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:893_8: Āsanne no bhagavā bhavissatīti ettha na kevalaṃ āsannattā eva tesaṃ somanassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:893_9: atha kho “idāni dānaṃ dātuṃ gandhamālādipūjaṃ kātuṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ labhissāmā”ti nesaṃ somanassaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:894_0: Tasmātiha thapatayo sambādho gharāvāsoti thapatayo yasmā tumhākaṃ mayi dūrībhūte anappakaṃ domanassaṃ āsanne anappakaṃ somanassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a0:894_2: Gharāvāsassa hi dosena tumhākaṃ evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:894_3: Sace pana gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitā assatha,
atk-s0519a0:894_4: evaṃ vo mayā saddhiṃyeva gacchantānañca āgacchantānañca taṃ na bhaveyyāti imamatthaṃ dīpento evamāha.
atk-s0519a0:894_6: Mahāghare vasantassāpi hi sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhova.
atk-s0519a0:894_9: Abbhokāso pabbajjāti pabbajjā pana akiñcanaapalibodhaṭṭhena abbhokāso.
atk-s0519a0:894_10: Caturatanikepi hi gabbhe dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭṭetvā nisinnānampi akiñcanāpalibodhaṭṭhena pabbajjā abbhokāso nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a0:894_11: Alañca pana vo thapatayo appamādāyāti evaṃ sambādhagharāvāse vasantānaṃ tumhākaṃ appamādameva kātuṃ yuttanti attho.
atk-s0519a0:895_2: Ekaṃ purato ekaṃ pacchato nisīdāpemāti te kira dvepi janā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā dvīsu nāgesu tā itthiyo
atk-s0519a0:895_3: evaṃ nisīdāpetvā rañño nāgaṃ majjhe katvā ubhosu passesu gacchanti,
atk-s0519a0:895_5: Nāgopi rakkhitabboti yathā kiñci visesitaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0519a0:895_9: Attāpīti sitakathitavikkhepitādīni akarontehi attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti.
atk-s0519a0:895_10: Evaṃ karonto hi “sāmidubbhako eso”ti niggahetabbo hoti.
atk-s0519a0:896_0: Tasmātiha thapatayoti yasmā tumhe rājā niccaṃ rājabhaṇḍaṃ paṭicchāpeti,
atk-s0519a0:896_2: Yasmā pana paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ paṭicchāpento natthi,
atk-s0519a0:897_6: Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti etena appamattakampi kiñci labhitvā tatopi saṃvibhāge rato.
atk-s0519a0:897_10: Imehi kho thapatayo catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hotīti sotāpanno imehi dhammehi samannāgato hotīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:897_11: Etena sotāpannena imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekantato labbhamānataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:898_0: Evaṃ tesaṃ thapatīnaṃ imehi catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ pariyāyena dassetvā idāni nippariyāyena taṃ dassetuṃ “tumhe kho thapatayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:899_1: Sahassaṃ kappakoṭiyoti sahassaṃ attabhāvā ahesunti attho.
atk-s0519a0:899_9: Ajja tiṃsaṃ tato kappāti tato kappato ajja sampati ayaṃ kappo tiṃsatimo.
atk-s0519a0:899_10: Tassā saññāya vāsanāti tassa buddhagatāya saññāya vāsanato.
atk-s0519a0:900_9: Yassa sabbadhammesu ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhattā sadā ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
atk-s0519a0:900_10: So sabbaññū bhagavā theraṃ ānandaṃ etadabravīti sambandho.
atk-s0519a0:900_11: Rājā raṭṭhe bhavissatīti sabbasmiṃ raṭṭhe rājā bhavissati.
atk-s0519a0:901_1: Suvaṇṇacchadanaṃ nāvanti ubhosu passesu suvaṇṇālaṅkārehi paṭimaṇḍitavasena chāditaṃ suvaṇṇanāvaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:901_3: sakkassa iti me sutanti yathā sā devatā pañhaṃ puṭṭhā sakkassa byākāsi,
atk-s0519a0:901_4: evaṃ mayāpi sutanti āyasmā mahāmoggallāno attanā yathāsutaṃ taṃ bhagavato vadati.
atk-s0519a0:902_0: Paṃsuthūpesūti sarīradhātuṃ abbhantare ṭhapetvā paṃsūhi katathūpesu.
atk-s0519a0:902_1: Evañhi te bhagavantaṃ uddissakatā nāma honti,
atk-s0519a0:903_3: Uḷāraṃ vata taṃ āsīti taṃ mayā kataṃ puññaṃ uḷāraṃ vata ahosi.
atk-s0519a0:903_6: mudito thūpaṃ apūjesīti thūpaṃ pūjetvā satasahassaṃ āyukappe ahaṃ muditoti attho.
atk-s0519a0:904_3: Tasmiñca okappayi dhammamuttamanti tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe uttamadhammaṃ paccekabodhiṃ “uttamadhammena nāma imasmiṃ bhavitabba”nti saddahiṃ.
atk-s0519a0:904_4: “Tasmiñca dhamme paṇidhesiṃ mānasa”nti iminā paṭiladdhadhammaṃ ahampi sacchikareyyanti cittaṃ paṇidahiṃ.
atk-s0519a0:904_5: Bhave kudāsupi ca mā apekkhavāti katthaci bhave apekkhavā mā bhaveyyanti ca paṇidhesiṃ mānasanti sambandho.
atk-s0519a0:905_10: Paccakkhaṃ khvimanti paccakkhaṃ kho imaṃ vacananti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:906_2: Patitassa ekanti tassa hatthato ekapupphaṃ patitaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:907_2: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā cāti ajjhattavisayā ca bahiddhavisayā ca.
atk-s0519a0:907_3: Ye me vijjiṃsūti ye me pubbe vijjamānā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0519a0:907_5: natthi dāni punabbhavoti punappunaṃ jāyanamīyanabhūto saṃsāro punabbhavoti ca vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:908_0: Idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti idaṃ vāsanābhāgapuññavibhāvanānaṃ nānāsuttapadānaṃ udāharaṇavasena dassitaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:909_2: apunabbhavāyā”ti idaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttanti vuttaṃ oghataraṇassa ariyamaggakiccattā.
atk-s0519a0:909_3: Na cetanā karaṇīyāti na cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:910_9: Jhāyatoti ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena ca jhānena jhāyantassa.
atk-s0519a0:910_11: Athassa kaṅkhā vapayanti sabbāti athassa evaṃ pātubhūtadhammassa yā tā “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0519a0:910_13: No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā nayena “katamaṃ nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0519a0:910_16: No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā ca nayena paccayākārakaṅkhā vuttā.
atk-s0519a0:910_17: Yā ca paccayākārasseva appaṭividdhattā “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādikā soḷasakaṅkhā “buddhe
atk-s0519a0:910_18: kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatī”tiādikā aṭṭha ca kaṅkhā āgatā,
atk-s0519a0:910_19: tā sabbā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhanti, kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:910_21: yasmā avijjādikena hetunā sahetukaṃ imaṃ saṅkhārādiṃ kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ pajānāti aññāsi paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0519a0:911_0: Yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedīhi yasmā paccayānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0519a0:911_1: tasmā yadāssa ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa vuttappakārā dhammā pātubhavanti.
atk-s0519a0:911_2: Athassa yā nibbānassa aviditattā kaṅkhā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0519a0:912_1: Aññātuñchena yāpentanti kulesu aññāto niccanavoyeva hutvā uñchena piṇḍacariyāya yāpentaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:912_2: Atha vā abhilakkhitesu issarajanagehesu kaṭukabhaṇḍasambhāraṃ sugandhabhojanaṃ pariyesantassa uñchanaṃ ñātuñchanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0519a0:912_3: gharapaṭipāṭiyā pana dvāre ṭhitena laddhamissakabhojanaṃ aññātuñchanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a0:913_1: Sukhaṃ setīti kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamānattā sukhaṃ sayati.
atk-s0519a0:913_2: Na socatīti kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanassattā na socati.
atk-s0519a0:913_4: Madhuraggassāti yaṃ akkuṭṭhassa paccakkositvā pahaṭassa paṭippaharitvā sukhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0519a0:915_4: Cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭho ummaṭṭho maṭṭho vimaṭṭhoti.
atk-s0519a0:915_5: Tattha upari ṭhatvā adhomukhaṃ dinnappahāro omaṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0519a0:915_6: adho ṭhatvā uddhaṃ mukhaṃ dinnappahāro ummaṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0519a0:915_7: aggaḷasūci viya vinivijjhitvā kato maṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0519a0:915_10: So hi sabbadāruṇo duruddharaṇasallo duttikiccho antodoso antopubbalohito ca hoti.
atk-s0519a0:915_12: Pubbalohitaṃ nīharitukāmehi mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā adhosiro kātabbo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:915_13: maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0519a0:916_1: Yathā sattiyā omaṭṭhapuriso sallubbāhanavaṇatikicchanānaṃ atthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati payogaṃ karoti parakkamati.
atk-s0519a0:916_2: Yathā ca dayhamāne matthake ādittasiro tassa nibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati payogaṃ karoti parakkamati,
atk-s0519a0:916_3: evamevaṃ bhikkhu kāmarāgappahānāya sato appamatto hutvā vihareyya bhagavāti kathesi.
atk-s0519a0:917_0: Evaṃ devatāya kathite atha bhagavā cintesi –
atk-s0519a0:917_3: Punappunaṃ kathentīpi hi esā kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānameva katheyya,
atk-s0519a0:917_4: yāva ca kāmarāgo maggena na samugghāṭiyyati,
atk-s0519a0:917_5: tāva anubandhova hotī”ti tameva upamaṃ gahetvā paṭhamamaggavasena devatāya vinivaṭṭetvā dassento “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”ti dutiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0519a0:918_4: Virato kāmasaññāyāti yāya kāyaci sabbato kāmasaññāya catutthamaggasampayuttāya samucchedaviratiyā virato.
atk-s0519a0:918_8: Catūhi maggehi dasannampi saṃyojanānaṃ atītattā sabbasaṃyojanātīto.
atk-s0519a0:918_9: Catutthamaggeneva vā uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanātīto tatra tatrābhinandanato nandisaṅkhātāya taṇhāya tiṇṇañca bhavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā nandibhavaparikkhīṇo.
atk-s0519a0:918_10: So tādiso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na sīdati.
atk-s0519a0:919_1: aparabhāge ca sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā.
atk-s0519a0:919_2: Taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ dhammaṃ nibbānappattiyā lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhati,
atk-s0519a0:919_8: tasmā upasaṅkamanato paṭṭhāya yāva dhammassavanena sussūsaṃ labhate paññaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:920_1: Taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvāpi vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā
atk-s0519a0:920_3: Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti evaṃ sussūsampi ca satiavippavāsena appamatto
atk-s0519a0:920_4: subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva labhati, na itaro. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a0:921_0: Patirūpakārīti desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa dhammassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ karotīti patirūpakārī.
atk-s0519a0:921_6: Dadanti paresaṃ yaṃ kiñci icchitaṃ patthitaṃ dento mittāni ganthati sampādeti karotīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:921_11: sa ve pecca na socatīti yassa puggalassa ime saddhādayo dhammā vijjanti,
atk-s0519a0:921_12: so imasmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gantvā na socati,
atk-s0519a0:923_0: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti. –
atk-s0519a0:924_1: Āḷavakasutte hi imā gāthā āḷavakena “kathaṃ su labhate pañña”ntiādinā puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhāsitāti.
atk-s0519a0:925_0: Yena kenaci vaṇṇenāti yena kenaci kāraṇena,
atk-s0519a0:925_4: Manasā ce pasannenāti karuṇāsamussāhitena pasādena pasannena manasā.
atk-s0519a0:925_5: Na tena hoti saṃyuttoti tena yathāvuttena anusāsanena kāmacchandādīnaṃ saṃyojanavasena saṃyutto nāma na hoti.
atk-s0519a0:926_1: Rāgo ca doso cāti rāgadosā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva.
atk-s0519a0:926_5: Aratī ratī lomahaṃso kutojāti yāyaṃ pantesu senāsanesu,
atk-s0519a0:926_7: yā ca pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rati abhirati āsatti kīḷanādi,
atk-s0519a0:926_9: ime tayo dhammā kuto jātā kuto nibbattāti pucchā.
atk-s0519a0:926_13: Kumārakā dhaṅkamivosajantīti yathā kumārakā kīḷantā kākaṃ suttena pāde bandhitvā osajanti khipanti,
atk-s0519a0:926_14: evaṃ kusalamanaṃ akusalavitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya osajantīti pucchā.
atk-s0519a0:927_3: arati rati lomahaṃsā ca attabhāvato jātā.
atk-s0519a0:927_4: Kāmavitakkādayo attabhāvato eva samuṭṭhāya kusalamanaṃ osajanti.
atk-s0519a0:928_0: Idāni yvāyaṃ “itonidānā”tiādīsu attabhāvanidānā attabhāvato jātā attabhāvato samuṭṭhāyāti attho vutto,
atk-s0519a0:928_3: Ete hi rāgādayo vitakkapariyosānā taṇhāsnehena jātā.
atk-s0519a0:928_4: Tathā jāyantā ca pañcupādānakkhandhabhede attabhāvasaṅkhāte attani sambhūtā. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a0:928_9: yathā nigrodhassa khandhajasaṅkhātā pārohā āporasasaṅkhāte snehe sati jāyanti,
atk-s0519a0:928_10: jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva nigrodhe tesu tesu sākhappadesesu sambhavanti,
atk-s0519a0:928_11: evaṃ ete rāgādayo ajjhattaṃ taṇhāsnehe sati jāyanti,
atk-s0519a0:928_12: jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva attabhāve tesu tesu cakkhādippadesesu iṭṭhārammaṇesu sambhavanti.
atk-s0519a0:928_15: Puthu visattā kāmesūti yasmā rāgopi pañcakāmaguṇikādivasena,
atk-s0519a0:928_16: dosopi āghātavatthuādivasena aratiādayopi tassa tassa bhedassa vasenāti sabbathā sabbepime kilesā puthu
atk-s0519a0:928_17: anekappakārā hutvā vatthudvārārammaṇādivasena tesu tesu kāmesu tathā tathā visattā laggā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitā. Kimiva?
atk-s0519a0:928_18: Māluvāva vitatā vane yathā vane vitatā māluvā tesu tesu rukkhasākhappasākhādibhedesu visattā hoti laggā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitā,
atk-s0519a0:928_20: tasmā ettha puthupabhedesu vatthukāmesu visattaṃ kilesagahanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:929_3: ye sattā naṃ kilesagahanaṃ “itonidānaṃ esa uppajjatī”ti jānanti,
atk-s0519a0:929_4: te naṃ taṇhāsinehasinehite attabhāve uppajjatīti ñatvā taṃ taṇhāsinehaṃ ādīnavānupassanādibhāvanāñāṇagginā visosentā vinodenti pajahanti,
atk-s0519a0:929_7: atiṇṇapubbaṃ apunabbhavāyāti ye hi saṃkilesagahanaṃ vinodenti,
atk-s0519a0:929_9: Na hi maggabhāvanaṃ vinā kilesavinodanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0519a0:929_10: Evaṃ maggaṃ bhāventā te pakatiñāṇena duttaraṃ kāmoghādiṃ catubbidhaṃ oghaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā supinantenapi
atk-s0519a0:930_0: Dukkaraṃ bhagavāti eko kira devaputto pubbayogāvacaro bahalakilesatāya sappayogena kilese vikkhambhento
atk-s0519a0:930_1: samaṇadhammaṃ katvā pubbahetumandatāya ariyabhūmiṃ appatvāva kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0519a0:930_2: so tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā dukkarabhāvaṃ ārocento evamāha.
atk-s0519a0:930_4: saṭṭhipi vassāni ekantaparisuddhassa samaṇadhammassa karaṇaṃ nāmetaṃ dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0519a0:931_1: Te chetvā maccuno jālanti ye rattindivaṃ indriyūpasame ratā,
atk-s0519a0:931_8: te ariyā maccuno jālasaṅkhātaṃ kilesajālaṃ chinditvā gacchanti.
atk-s0519a0:932_8: te ariyā maccuno jālasaṅkhātaṃ kilesajālaṃ chinditvā gacchanti.
atk-s0519a0:932_10: ayaṃ pana duggamo “bhagavā visamo maggo”ti āha.
atk-s0519a0:932_11: Tattha kiñcāpi ariyamaggo neva duggamo na visamo,
atk-s0519a0:932_15: Ariyamaggaṃ ārohituṃ asamatthatāya eva te magge papatantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0519a0:932_16: Ariyānaṃ samo maggoti sveva maggo ariyānaṃ samo hoti.
atk-s0519a0:932_17: Visame samāti visamepi sattakāye samā eva.
atk-s0519a0:933_1: Idañhi taṃ jetavananti anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto jetavanassa ceva buddhādīnañca vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ āgantvā evamāha.
atk-s0519a0:933_3: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni ariyamaggassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento “kammaṃ vijjā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:933_8: Sīlaṃ jīvitamuttamanti sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitañca uttamanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:933_12: Jīvitamuttamanti etasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ nāma uttamanti.
atk-s0519a0:933_13: “Etena maccā sujjhantī”ti etena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sattā visujjhanti.
atk-s0519a0:934_2: Yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena bodhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0519a0:934_3: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tasmiṃ ariyamagge visujjhati.
atk-s0519a0:934_4: Atha vā yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena ariyasaccadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0519a0:934_5: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu ariyasaccesu visujjhati.
atk-s0519a0:934_14: na therā uttaritaro nāma sāvako atthīti vadati.
atk-s0519a0:935_10: Tattha tatthāti paccuppannampi dhammaṃ yattha yattheva so uppanno,
atk-s0519a0:935_11: tattha tattheva naṃ aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi anupassanāhi vipassati,
atk-s0519a0:935_14: Vipassanā hi rāgādīhi na saṃhirati na kuppatīti asaṃhīrā asaṃkuppā,
atk-s0519a0:935_15: taṃ anubrūhaye vaḍḍheyya paṭivipasseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:935_16: Atha vā nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi na saṃhirati na kuppatīti asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:935_18: punappunaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appento vaḍḍheyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:936_0: Tassa pana anubrūhanassa atthāya ajjeva kiccamātappanti kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanena “ātappa”nti laddhanāmaṃ vīriyaṃ ajjeva kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:936_1: Ko jaññā maraṇaṃ suveti sve jīvitaṃ vā maraṇaṃ vā ko jānāti.
atk-s0519a0:936_6: sve vā punadivase vā jānissāmī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvā “ajjeva karissāmī”ti evaṃ vīriyaṃ kātabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a0:936_7: Mahāsenenāti ahivicchikavisasatthādīni hi anekāni maraṇakāraṇāni tassa senāti tāya mahatiyā senāya vasena
atk-s0519a0:936_8: mahāsenena evarūpena maccunā saddhiṃ “katipāhaṃ tāva āgamehi,
atk-s0519a0:936_9: yāvāhaṃ buddhapūjādiṃ attano avassayaṃ kammaṃ karomī”ti evaṃ mittasanthavākārasaṅkhāto vā “idaṃ sataṃ
atk-s0519a0:936_10: vā sahassaṃ vā gahetvā katipāhaṃ āgamehī”ti evaṃ lañjānuppadānasaṅkhāto vā “iminā balarāsinā paṭibāhissāmī”ti
atk-s0519a0:936_15: Evaṃ paṭipannattā bhaddo ekaratto assāti bhaddekaratto.
atk-s0519a0:936_16: Itīti evaṃ paṭipannaṃ puggalaṃ “bhaddekaratto aya”nti rāgādisantatāya santo buddhamuni ācikkhati.
atk-s0519a0:937_0: Cakkhunā paññāya cāti cakkhunā ca paññāya ca.
atk-s0519a0:937_2: Satiyā paññāya cāti satiyā ca paññāya ca,
atk-s0519a0:939_1: Yassa selūpamaṃ cittanti ekaghanaṃ selaṃ viya pakativātehi lokadhammavātehi akampanīyato yassa cittaṃ selūpamaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a0:939_5: Kuto naṃ dukkhamessatīti taṃ evaṃ bhāvitacittaṃ vītikkantalokadhammaṃ uttamapurisaṃ lokadhammahetukaṃ dukkhaṃ nānugamissati.
atk-s0519a0:940_1: na diṭṭhamaṅgalikatāya huṃhuṅkārakasāvādipāpadhammayutto hutvā kevalaṃ jātimattena brāhmaṇoti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0519a0:940_8: Dhammena so brahmavādaṃ vadeyyāti so “brāhmaṇo aha”nti etaṃ vādaṃ vadeyya.
atk-s0519a0:940_9: Yassa sakalalokasannivāse kuhiñci ekārammaṇepi rāgussado dosussado mohussado mānussado diṭṭhussadoti ime ussadā natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:941_3: tamo eva ca siyāti āsaṅkamāne sandhāyāha “tamo tattha na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0519a0:941_4: Yadā ca attanāvedītiādīsu evaṃvidhaṃ nibbānaṃ attapaccakkhena ñāṇena yadā vindati,
atk-s0519a0:941_5: atha rūpārūpadhammato sukhadukkhato ca vippamutto hotīti.
atk-s0519a0:943_0: Nābhinandati āyantinti purāṇadutiyikaṃ āgacchantiṃ aññaṃ vā na abhinandati cittena na sampaṭicchati.
atk-s0519a0:943_2: Saṅgā saṅgāmajiṃ muttanti pañcavidhāpi saṅgato muttaṃ saṅgāmajiṃ bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0519a0:944_0: Bahvetthāti bahu ettha nhāyati jano, na tena so suddho nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a0:945_1: Sahāyā vatāti samathavipassanābhāvanāya saha ayanavasena sahāyā vata.
atk-s0519a0:945_2: Kālena kālaṃ sappāyadhammassa savanavasena cirarattaṃ sameti samāgamo etesanti cirarattasametikā.
atk-s0519a0:946_3: ko visesoti satthu sāvakassa ca pañcasveva upādānakkhandhesu nibbidādayoti pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyaṃ anupādāvimuttiyañca
atk-s0519a0:947_3: yadipi sāvakassa satthu ca vimuttiyaṃ viseso natthi,
atk-s0519a0:947_4: sayambhuñāṇena pana savāsanasabbakilese khepetvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā anuppannassa ariyamaggassa
atk-s0519a0:947_9: Antarā añño satthā uppādetā nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0519a0:947_10: tasmā ayaṃ bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:947_15: Magge ca amagge ca kovidoti maggakovido.
atk-s0519a0:949_0: Na taṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrāti ettha dhīrāti buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā.
atk-s0519a0:949_1: Yaṃ saṅkhalikasaṅkhātaṃ ayena nibbattaṃ āyasaṃ addubandhanasaṅkhātaṃ dārumayañca pabbajatiṇehi rajjuṃ katvā katarajjubandhanañca,
atk-s0519a0:949_2: taṃ asiādīhi chindituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya “thira”nti na vadantīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:950_0: Ohārinanti ākaḍḍhitvā catūsu apāyesu pātanato avaharati heṭṭhā haratīti ohārinaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:950_1: Sithilanti bandhanaṭṭhāne chaviādīni akopetvā bandhanabhāvampi ajānāpetvā jalapathathalapathādīsu kammaṃ kātuṃ detīti sithilaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:950_2: Duppamuñcanti lobhavasena hi ekavārampi uppannaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ daṭṭhaṭṭhānato kacchapo viya dummocayaṃ hotīti duppamuñcaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:950_3: Etampi chetvānāti etaṃ daḷhampi kilesabandhanaṃ ñāṇakhaggena chinditvā anapekkhino hutvā kāmasukhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0519a0:951_2: Pakappetīti tameva akusalacetanaṃ kāyavacīkammabhāvaṃ pāpanavasena kappeti.
atk-s0519a0:951_4: Ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyāti yadetaṃ cetanaṃ pakappanaṃ anusayanañca,
atk-s0519a0:951_5: etaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ṭhitiyā pavattiyā paccayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:951_6: Ārammaṇe sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hotīti yathāvuttapaccaye sati abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa kammaṃ javāpetvā
atk-s0519a0:951_8: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hotīti āyatiṃ punabbhavasaṅkhātā viññāṇādīnaṃ abhinibbatti hoti.
atk-s0519a0:952_6: te kusalassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa patiṭṭhā honti yevāti.
atk-s0519a0:952_7: Sati ca abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇe āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hotīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0519a0:953_2: ariyassa vinaye samuddo”tiādi yadi duppūraṇaṭṭhena saṃsīdanaṭṭhena duratikkamanaṭṭhena sāgaro “samuddo”ti vucceyya,
atk-s0519a0:953_3: tato satabhāgenapi sahassabhāgenapi cakkhuādīsveva ayaṃ nayo labbhatīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “cakkhu,
atk-s0519a0:953_7: rūpesu sattānaṃ āviñchanato rūpāyatanameva vego cakkhussa vegoti attho.
atk-s0519a0:954_0: Yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahatīti yo bhikkhu saha visayena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato sammasanto
atk-s0519a0:954_1: tattha ca nibbindanto virajjanto tappaṭibaddhato kilesajālato vimuccanto abhibhavati.
atk-s0519a0:954_4: atari cakkhusamuddanti ayaṃ bhikkhu cakkhusaṅkhātaṃ samuddaṃ tiṇṇoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:955_2: ariyassa vinaye samuddoti yadipi duppūraṇaṭṭhena yadi vā samudanaṭṭhena samuddo,
atk-s0519a0:955_4: Tassa hi pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā nīlādiārammaṇaṃ samosarantaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a0:955_6: Cakkhu ca tesu tesu nīlādiārammaṇesu samudeti asaṃvutaṃ hutvā osaramānaṃ kilesuppattiyā kāraṇabhāvena
atk-s0519a0:955_8: Tathā cakkhuṃ taṇhāsotādīnaṃ uppattidvāratāya tehi santānassa samudanaṭṭhena temanaṭṭhena samuddo.
atk-s0519a0:955_9: Tassa rūpamayo vegoti samuddassa appamāṇo ūmimayo vego viya tassāpi cakkhusamuddassa samosarantassa nīlādibhedassa
atk-s0519a0:955_10: ārammaṇassa vasena appameyyo rūpamayo vego veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:955_11: Yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahatīti yo taṃ cakkhusamudde samosarantaṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ manāpe rūpe rāgaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:955_13: asamapekkhane mohanti evaṃ rāgādikilese anuppādento upekkhakabhāvena sahati.
atk-s0519a0:957_0: Saūmibhayaṃ duttaraṃ accatarīti aniccatādiūmibhayena sabhayaṃ duratikkamaṃ atikkami.
atk-s0519a0:958_0: Baḷisāti sattānaṃ anatthahetutāya baḷisā viya baḷisā.
atk-s0519a0:958_3: Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā apariyiṭṭhā vā sukhārammaṇatāya iṭṭhā.
atk-s0519a0:958_10: nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnampi hi rūpāyatanaṃ rūpārammaṇabhāvena cakkhuviññeyyabhāvena ca ekavidhataṃ
atk-s0519a0:958_19: kilesamārassa baḷisabhūtaṃ rūpataṇhaṃ gilitvā ṭhitoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:959_1: Ayaṃ loko santāpajātoti ayaṃ sattaloko jātasantāpo ñātibyasanādivasena uppannasokasantāpo ca rāgādivasena uppannapariḷāhasantāpo cāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:959_3: Rodaṃ vadati attatoti taṃ taṃ attanā phuṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ abhāvitakāyatāya adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “aho dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:959_4: īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ sattunopi mā hotū”tiādinā vilapanto vadati. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a0:959_7: yasmā ete sattā yena yena pakārena attano dukkhassa paṭikāraṃ maññanti āsīsanti,
atk-s0519a0:959_8: taṃ dukkhaṃ tato aññena pakārena tikicchitabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:959_9: Yena vā pakārena attano vaḍḍhiṃ maññanti,
atk-s0519a0:959_10: tato aññathā avaḍḍhi eva pana hoti.
atk-s0519a0:959_15: Yadabhinandati taṃ bhayanti yaṃ kāmādibhavaṃ abhinandati,
atk-s0519a0:959_18: taṃ dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhadukkhatāya ca dukkhanti.
atk-s0519a0:960_3: ekanteneva kāmādibhavassa samudayappahānena pahānatthaṃ idaṃ mayā adhigataṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ vussatīti.
atk-s0519a0:961_0: Evaṃ ariyassa maggassa ekaṃseneva niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni aññamaggassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipanto “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a0:961_1: Tattha bhavenāti rūpabhavena vā arūpabhavena vā.
atk-s0519a0:961_7: taṃnibbattena ca upapattibhavena bhavavisuddhiṃ vadantā bhavena bhavavippamokkhaṃ vadanti nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a0:961_10: bhavati tiṭṭhati sassatanti hi pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi “bhavadiṭṭhī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:961_11: Bhavadiṭṭhi eva uttarapadalopena “bhavo”ti vuttā bhavataṇhātiādīsu viya.
atk-s0519a0:961_12: Bhavadiṭṭhivasena hi idhekacce bhavavisesaṃyeva bhavavippamokkhaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0519a0:961_19: Vibhavati vinassati ucchijjatīti hi pavattanato ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttanayena “vibhavo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:963_9: taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbupādānakkhayā natthi dukkhassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:964_0: Lokamimaṃ passāti bhagavā attano cittaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0519a0:964_5: puriso itthiyāti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ sattesu rataṃ,
atk-s0519a0:964_7: Ye hi keci bhavāti ittarakhaṇā vā dīghāyukā vā sātavanto vā asātavanto vā bhavā.
atk-s0519a0:964_10: Sabbe te bhavātiādīsu “sabbepi bhavā aniccā”tiādinā vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya aviparītaṃ passato bhavataṇhāpi pahīyati nirujjhati,
atk-s0519a0:964_12: tassa sabba taṇhānaṃ anavasesato maggena nirujjhanato nibbānaṃ nibbuti hoti.
atk-s0519a0:964_13: Tassa evaṃ nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anupādānato aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti.
atk-s0519a0:964_14: Evaṃbhūtena ca abhibhūto pañcavidhopi māro vijito assa anena mārena saṅgāmo,
atk-s0519a0:965_0: Anusotagāmī andhaputhujjano paṭisotagāmī kalyāṇaputhujjano. Ṭhitatto sekkho. Itaro asekkho.
atk-s0519a0:966_3: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti kāḷakaṃ dasavidhaṃ dussīladhammaṃ pasavati karoti,
atk-s0519a0:966_5: Sukkaṃ dhammanti “ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīce kule nibbatto,
atk-s0519a0:966_6: idāni puññaṃ karissāmī”ti puññasaṅkhātaṃ sukkaṃ paṇḍaraṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyati,
atk-s0519a0:966_8: Akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbānanti nibbānañhi sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0519a0:966_17: “Kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipāka”ntiādikassa kammacatukkassa attho heṭṭhā hārasampātavāre vibhatto eva.
atk-s0519a0:968_4: Kasmā panettha āmisapariccāgo arahattena samadhuro niddiṭṭhoti?
atk-s0519a0:968_6: Yena yena vā pana vatthunāti ucchedādivatthunā.
atk-s0519a0:968_8: Dutiye yena yena vā pana vatthunāti amarāvikkhepavatthuādinā.
atk-s0519a0:969_0: Iminā asubhena kammavipākenāti asubhassa kāyaduccaritādikammassa vipākattā asubhena asivena kammavipākena.
atk-s0519a0:969_1: Idaṃ bālalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattatīti purimasmiṃ bhave duccaritasamaṅgitāya bālo ayaṃ bhavatīti upalakkhaṇaṃ jāyati.
atk-s0519a0:969_2: Idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttanti idaṃ evaṃ pavattaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ nāma suttaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:970_0: Iminā subhenāti ettha vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a0:970_3: Sānusayassa pariyuṭṭhānaṃ jāyatīti appahīnānusayassa paccayasamāyoge rāgādayo pariyuṭṭhānavasena pavattanti.
atk-s0519a0:971_1: Evaṃ soḷasavidhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttehi udāharaṇavasena vibhajitvā idāni aṭṭhavīsatividhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a0:971_2: dassentena yasmā ayampi paṭṭhānavibhāgo mūlapadehi saṅgahito,
atk-s0519a0:971_3: na imassāpi tehi asaṅgahito padeso atthi,
atk-s0519a0:971_4: tasmā mūlapadaṃ vibhajitabbatañca dassetuṃ “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā”ti pucchāya vasena mūlapadāni
atk-s0519a0:971_9: Idha pana lokiyo attho yasmiṃ sutte vutto,
atk-s0519a0:971_20: Buddhādīnaṃ pana guṇābhitthavanavasena pavattaṃ suttaṃ thavo nāma.
atk-s0519a0:972_0: Tattha sajjukhīranti taṅkhaṇaṃyeva dhenuyā thanehi nikkhantaṃ abbhuṇhakhīraṃ.
atk-s0519a0:972_3: yathā dhenuyā thanato nikkhantaṃ khīraṃ taṅkhaṇaṃyeva na muccati na pariṇamati na dadhibhāvaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0519a0:972_4: takkādiambilasamāyogato pana parato kālantarena pakatiṃ jahati dadhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a0:972_14: Yathā hi chārikāya paṭicchanno vītaccitaṅgāro akkantopi chārikāya paṭicchannattā na tāva ḍahati,
atk-s0519a0:972_15: chārikaṃ pana tāpetvā cammādīni ḍahanavasena yāva matthaluṅgā ḍahanto gacchati,
atk-s0519a0:972_17: taṃ bālaṃ dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve nirayādīsu nibbattaṃ ḍahantaṃ anugacchatīti.
atk-s0519a0:973_1: yassa bhikkhuno chekena sārathinā sudantā assā viya cha indriyāni samathaṃ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni,
atk-s0519a0:973_2: tassa navavidhaṃ mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā pahīnamānassa catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa tādibhāve ṭhitassa tathārūpassa devāpi pihayanti,
atk-s0519a0:973_4: Āhāre satīti āhārapaṭibaddhe chandarāge appahīne sati.
atk-s0519a0:974_1: Sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasāti parito dasapi disā cittena anugantvā.
atk-s0519a0:974_5: Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti evaṃ kassacipi attanā piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena visuṃ visuṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo.
atk-s0519a0:974_7: tasmā na hiṃse paraṃ attakāmo attano sukhakāmoti.
atk-s0519a0:976_1: suparisuddhāya ca diṭṭhisampattiyā samannāgato piyo piyāyitabbo hoti.
atk-s0519a0:978_0: Attano kammakubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti. ;
atk-s0519a0:979_6: bhikkhu ‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā’ti,
atk-s0519a0:980_0: Vattāti “kālena vakkhāmī”tiādipañcadhamme attani upaṭṭhāpetvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ ullumpanabhāve ṭhatvā vattā.
atk-s0519a0:980_1: Vacanakkhamoti sabrahmacārīhi yena kenaci vuccamāno subbaco hutvā padakkhiṇaggāhitāya tesaṃ vacanaṃ khamatīti vacanakkhamo.
atk-s0519a0:980_3: Vacanakkhamoti dhammaṃ saṃvaṇṇento parehi asaṃhīro hutvā tesaṃ pucchāvacanakkhamatāya vacanakkhamo.
atk-s0519a0:980_6: Na caṭṭhāne niyojakoti dhammavinayādiṃ adhammāvinayādivasena avatvā dhammavinayādivaseneva dīpanato na ca aṭṭhāne niyojako.
atk-s0519a0:981_0: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvāti ettha “taṇhā janeti purisa”nti vacanato tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ jananato taṇhā mātā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:981_2: rājamahāmattassa vā putto”ti pitaraṃ nissāya asmimānassa uppajjanato asmimāno pitā nāma.
atk-s0519a0:981_3: Loko viya rājānaṃ yasmā sabbadiṭṭhigatāni dve sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo bhajanti,
atk-s0519a0:981_4: tasmā sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dve khattiyā rājāno nāma.
atk-s0519a0:981_6: Āyasādhako āyuttakapuriso viya taṃnissito nandirāgo anucaro nāma.
atk-s0519a0:982_2: Etena hi taṇhādayo arahattamaggañāṇāsinā hatā bāhitā.
atk-s0519a0:982_3: Yātīti so brāhmaṇo niddukkho hutvā yātīti.
atk-s0519a0:983_5: Cittepi kāyaṃ samodahatīti yadā sīghaṃ gantukāmo hoti,
atk-s0519a0:983_8: Kāye sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvāti “seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0519a0:983_9: pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyyā”ti vuttanayena iddhimā kāye sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā paresaṃ
atk-s0519a0:983_10: dissamānena kāyena ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādīni pekkhamāno cittakkhaṇeneva icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0519a0:984_1: Yaṃ taṃ lokuttaraṃ ñāṇanti sabbaṃ lokaṃ uttaritvā abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:984_5: Na hi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ bhagavato sabbasmiṃyeva kāle uppajjatīti sakkā vattunti.
atk-s0519a0:985_0: Kittayissāmi te santinti sabbakilesavūpasamahetutāya santiṃ nibbānaṃ dassessāmi.
atk-s0519a0:985_3: Anītihanti itihāsāti evaṃ na itikirāya pavattaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:985_5: Yaṃ viditvā sato caranti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena sato hutvā caranto ariyamaggena yaṃ santiṃ viditvā.
atk-s0519a0:985_6: Tare loke visattikanti saṅkhāraloke visappanato visattikasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ tare tareyya samatikkameyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:986_0: Tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmīti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ santijotakaṃ tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ ahaṃ patthayāmi,
atk-s0519a0:986_1: taṃ eva vā santiṃ uttamaṃ abhinandāmīti dhotako vadati.
atk-s0519a0:986_2: Uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjheti ettha uddhanti anāgataṃ upari ca.
atk-s0519a0:986_5: Etaṃ viditvā saṅgotīti etaṃ anāgatādiṃ saṅgajananaṭṭhānanti ñatvā.
atk-s0519a0:987_5: Mamañceva tumhākañcāti mayā ceva tumhehi ca.
atk-s0519a0:987_6: Atha vā sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritanti sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca ahosīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:988_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti paccayehi saṅkharīyantīti “saṅkhārā”ti laddhanāmā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-s0519a0:988_1: Ādiantavantato aniccantikato tāvakālikato khaṇaparittato ca na niccāti aniccā.
atk-s0519a0:988_2: Yadā paññāya passatīti yadā vipassanāpaññāya passati.
atk-s0519a0:988_5: Esa maggo visuddhiyāti yvāyaṃ vuttanayena saccappaṭivedho,
atk-s0519a0:988_7: Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti sabbe saṅkhārā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena khayaṭṭhena ca dukkhāti.
atk-s0519a0:988_9: Sabbe dhammā anattāti sabbepi tebhūmakadhammā parato tucchato suññato asārato avasavattanato ca anattāti.
atk-s0519a0:989_3: Omānopi hi attano avaṅkaraṇamukhenapi saṃpaggaṇhanavaseneva pavattati.
atk-s0519a0:989_5: Kimaññatra yathābhūtassa adassanāti sarasapabhaṅgutāya ekanteneva anavaṭṭhitasabhāvehi rūpadhammehi seyyādivasena
atk-s0519a0:989_6: attano ukkhipanassa tesaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adassanaṃ aññāṇaṃ vinā kiṃ aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ siyā,
atk-s0519a0:989_7: aññaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ tassa natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:990_1: Ye ariyasaccāni vibhāvayantīti dukkhādīni ariyasaccāni paññāobhāsena saccappaṭicchādakakilesandhakāraṃ vidhametvā attano pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti.
atk-s0519a0:990_2: Gambhīrapaññenāti appameyyapaññatāya sadevakassapi lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhapaññena sabbaññunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:990_3: Sudesitānīti saṅkhepavitthārādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni.
atk-s0519a0:990_4: Kiñcāpi te honti bhusaṃ pamattāti te vibhāvitaariyasaccā puggalā kāmaṃ devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā honti,
atk-s0519a0:990_5: tathāpi sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0519a0:990_6: tesaṃ niruddhattā na aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ ādiyanti,
atk-s0519a0:990_7: sattamabhaveyeva pana vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:991_1: Indakhīloti nagaradvārathirakaraṇatthaṃ ummārabbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathaviṃ khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa
atk-s0519a0:991_3: Pathavissito siyāti gambhīranemitāya anto pavisitvā bhūminissito siyā bhaveyya.
atk-s0519a0:991_5: Asampakampiyoti kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0519a0:991_7: passatīti yo cattāri ariyasaccāni paññāya ajjhogāhetvā passati,
atk-s0519a0:991_8: taṃ sappurisaṃ uttamapurisaṃ tathā dassanato sabbatitthiyavādavātehi asampakampiyatāya tathūpamaṃ yathāvuttaindakhīlūpamaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:992_1: Ariyasāvakoti ariyassa buddhassa bhagavato saddhammassavanante jātattā ariyasāvako.
atk-s0519a0:992_4: Nirayādayo hi vaḍḍhisaṅkhātato ayato apetattā apāyā.
atk-s0519a0:992_7: Sotaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ādito patto adhigatoti sotāpanno.
atk-s0519a0:992_8: Akuppadhammatāya maggaphalānaṃ puthujjanabhāvasaṅkhāte virūpe na nipatanasabhāvoti avinipātadhammo.
atk-s0519a0:992_10: Uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi avassaṃ pattabbatāya assa paraṃ ayanaṃ gati paṭisaraṇanti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0519a0:993_3: Pañca sīlāni hi ariyasāvakānaṃ kantāni honti,
atk-s0519a0:993_9: Yato sabbesampi sikkhāpadāvirodhena yuttaṭṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ anuññātamevāti.
atk-s0519a0:994_2: Ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cāti orambhāgiyānaṃ uddhambhāgiyānañca saṃyojanānaṃ pajahanavasena.
atk-s0519a0:995_1: Anabhijjhā dhammapadaṃ nāma alobho vā alobhasīsena adhigatajhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni vā dasaasubhavasena
atk-s0519a0:996_0: Pañca chindeti heṭṭhā apāyupapattisaṃvattanikāni pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pāde baddharajjuṃ viya puriso satthena heṭṭhā maggattayena chindeyya.
atk-s0519a0:996_1: Pañca jaheti uparidevalokasampāpakāni pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjuṃ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya chindeyyevāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:996_2: Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānatthāya saddhādīni pañcindriyāni uttari bhāveyya.
atk-s0519a0:996_3: Pañca saṅgātigoti evaṃ sante pañcannaṃ rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā bhikkhu “oghatiṇṇo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:997_1: amatapadaṃyeva vā ñassāmi jānissāmīti paṭipannassa paṭhamamaggaṭṭhassa indriyanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:997_3: Ājānāti paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānātīti añño,
atk-s0519a0:997_6: upari tīsu maggesu ca ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a0:997_7: Aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitakiccassa arahato indriyanti aññātāvindriyaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:998_4: “Duccintitacintī”tiādīsu duccintitaṃ abhijjhaṃ byāpādaṃ micchādassanañca cintetīti duccintitacintī.
atk-s0519a0:999_7: Puna kiñci kātuṃ vattuṃ vā asamatthaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:1000_1: Yo sato upasammatīti yo satimā hutvā upasammati,
atk-s0519a0:1000_2: tassa upasamaṃyevāhaṃ bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ maññāmīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:1001_1: Yadā naṃ maññatīti yasmā naṃ maññati.
atk-s0519a0:1001_3: Gova bhiyyo palāyinanti yathā goyūthe tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhante gogaṇo olokento tiṭṭhati yāva na eko palāyati,
atk-s0519a0:1001_5: atha taṃ palāyīnaṃ sabbo gogaṇo bhiyyo ajjhottharati,
atk-s0519a0:1001_6: evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti attho.
atk-s0519a0:1002_1: Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti tesu sakatthaparamesu atthesu khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati.
atk-s0519a0:1002_2: Tamāhu paramaṃ khantinti yo balavā titikkhati,
atk-s0519a0:1002_7: na taṃ balanti āhu kathenti dīpenti.
atk-s0519a0:1002_8: Dhammaguttassāti dhammena rakkhitassa dhammaṃ vā rakkhantassa.
atk-s0519a0:1002_10: paṭipparitvā vā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vadeyyāsi.
atk-s0519a0:1002_11: Dhammaṭṭhaṃ pana cāletuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a0:1002_12: Tasseva tena pāpiyoti tena kodhena tasseva puggalassa pāpaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a0:1002_19: Janā maññantīti evarūpaṃ attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ tikicchantaṃ nipphādentaṃ puggalaṃ “bālo aya”nti andhabālaputhujjanā evaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0519a0:1002_20: Ye dhammassa akovidāti ye catusaccadhamme akovidā acchekā,
atk-s0519a0:1003_1: Pattanti adhigataṃ etarahi anubhuyyamānaṃ kāmūpakaraṇaṃ pattabbanti tadeva anāgate adhigantabbaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a0:1003_5: Ye ca sikkhāsārāti ye yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlavatādisaṅkhātaṃ sikkhaṃ sārato gahetvā ṭhitā. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a0:1003_14: Etehi eva saṃsārasuddhīti tāni sārato gahetvā ṭhitāti attho.
atk-s0519a0:1004_0: Iccete ubho antāti iti sīlabbataparāmāsamukhena attakilamathānuyogo,
